Text: Unique. Cold-dragon. May be played at Thunder Cleft. 2 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played keyed to Forrhun, Grey Mountains, Iron Hills, Northern Rhovanion, and Withered Heath; may also be played at sites in these regions. +2 prowess against Dwarves.

Name: Khuzadrepa3
Text: Unique. Cold-dragon. May be played at Thunder Cleft. Two strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played keyed to Forrhun, Iron Hills, Grey Mountains, Northern Rhovanion, and Withered Heath; and at sites in these regions. Unless the attack is cancelled, you may take one Memories Stolen from your play deck to your hand (before resolving any strikes).

Name: Kelvar Enraged2
Text: All attacks by Apes, Bears, Boars, Eagles, andWhales receive +1 strike and -2 body. Each character wounded by a strike from such an attack must make an additional body check. Discard this card if such an attack is defeated.

Name: Insatiable Hunger
Text: Playable on a Dragon. If during his untap phase target Dragon bears items with a combined normal mp greater than his prowess (use the maximum mp as given on the card), he must remove one such item of his choice and place it in his out of play pile. Discard this card after a hazard creature played against the Dragon's company was defeated.

Name: Imagination Run Away
Text: All burglary and flattery attempts are modified by -2. Additionally, any card effect that forces a player to show opponent his hand also forces opponent to show his hand. Any Will Shaken revealed from the play deck as result of an opponent's action or card effect, affects opponent as if revealed from hand. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Greater Storms2
Text: Environment. Playable on a company using flying movement. Make a roll. If the result is less than 7, tap all characters and allies in the company. Otherwise, the company is not considered flying for the rest of the turn (change the site path accordingly; if the company cannot reach the new site, defender must choose a new site within 2 regions of the original site of destination).

Name: Great Northern Bear2
Text: Animal. Bear. 1 strike. +4 prowess against Dragons. May be played keyed to Anduin Vales, Dragon Gap, Grey Mountains, Grey Mountain Narrows, Gundabad, Heart of Mirkwood, High Pass, Northern Rhovanion, Western Mirkwood, Withered Heath, and Woodland Realm; and may also be played non-Haven sites in these regions. May not be played against a company containing a character with Beorn's House as a home site. Cannot be duplicated on a given movement/hazard phase.

Name: Frightful Guardian
Text: Playable on a site. Until the end of the turn, each time after a company at the site has played an item, it immediately faces all of the site's automatic-attacks again, with the attack's prowess modified by +1 for each item played at the site this turn. This card may be revealed as an on-guard card in response to an item being played at the site. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Frightful Guardian2
Text: Playable on a site. Until the end of the turn, the company must face all of the site's automatic- attacks each time an item is played at the site; these attacks receive +1 prowess per item played at the site this turn. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Dragon's Vengeance
Text: Playable on a company that has faced an attack froma unique Dragon manifestation this turn. You may play Foes Shall Fall or Bring Our Curses Home on the company as if played (normally) on the attack; it may also be played from the discard pile.

Name: Dragon's Sleep2
Text: Playable on a Dragon character moving awayfrom his home site or any Dragon's Den [K]. Unless opponent discards Hunger or a manifestation of target Dragon from his hand, the Dragon must return to his site of origin.

Name: Dragon's Breath2
Text: Playable on an attack by True Fire-drake, Winged Fire-drake, or on any Fire-dragon attack (before strikes are assigned). Each character in the company being attacked must immediately face a strike equal to the attack's prowess. Instead or using prowess against the strike, each character uses his body modified by +1 if he has a shield, by +1 if he has a helmet, and by +3 if he taps. The target attack which follows receives +1 body and -2 prowess. Cannot be duplicated on a given attack.

Name: Dragon Hunters2
Text: Dwarves. 4 strikes. +4 prowess and -1 to target's body against companies containing a Dragon or Drake. May only be played against an overt company. Dragon Hunters receives an additional +1 prowess for each Gathered Bones of Dwarf characters or Dwarf factions in opponent's mp. May be played keyed to any region containing a Dragon's lair or Dwarf-hold, and keyed on any non-Haven site in those regions.

Name: Cursed Treasure2
Text: Corruption. May only be played and revealed as an on-guard card at a Dragon's Lair whose normal automatic-attack (as given on the site card) is non-existent. After a character has played a treasure item or item that was stored at (any version of) the site, reveal this card and place it with that character: he receives 4 corruption points and immediately makes a CP.

Name: Corlagon at Home
Text: Unique. Unless Corlagon Ahunt is in play, Cirith Helkaloke has an additional automatic- attack: Fire-dragon -- 2 strikes at 13/8. In addition, each rune item and each hoard minor item gives an additional corruption point.

Name: Corlagon Ahunt
Text: Unique. Name: Corlagon
Text: Unique. May be played at Cirith Helkaloke. Fire-dragon. 2 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played keyed to Angmar, Dragon Gap, Forochel, Gundabad, and Misty Mountains - Northern Spur; and at sites in these regions.

Name: Birth-spot2
Text: Playable on a Dragon character. He receives -3 body. When the Dragon does not tap to face a strike of an attack, he receives an additional -3 prowess penalty. If at his home site (or any Dragon's Den [K]) during his organization phase, target Dragon may tap to discard this card. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Black Crows

Name: Big Bats
Text: Animals. Six strikes. As a creature, playable at any Shadow-hold [S]. As a short-event, playable on an Orc or Wolf attack not keyed to a site; does not count against the hazard limit. Attacker chooses defending characters for this attack, and also for the next hazard creature attack against the same company this turn.

Name: Elven Custody
Text: Playable on a non-avatar character facing a non-detainment strike from an Elf attack. The strike receives +2 prowess; if successful, target character is not harmed but taken prisoner at the Elf-hold closest to the company's current or new site (nearest Haven [H] as listed on the site's hero version if tied). Rescue-attack: Elves -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess. During his untap phase, the resource player makes a roll for target character, modified by +1 for every character at a site in the same or an adjacent region (or at an adjacent site) that taps; if the result is greater than 10, target character regains normal status at the site of rescue (discard this card).

Name: Pit Trap
Text: Playable on-guard at an ancient Dwarf-ruin or site with a Dwarf, Orc, or Trap automatic-attack. Reveal this card after the company has faced all automatic-attacks. Make a roll and add 1 for every scout and every ranger in the company; if the result is less than 13, the company faces an attack: Trap -- 1 strike with 12 prowess, which must be assigned to the character with the random number closest to the roll's result (defender's choice if tied). +1 to the defending character's prowess for any armor, helmet, or shield he bears. Any resulting body check is modified by +1.

Name: Arda Angered
Text: The number of strikes and prowess of each Pukel-creature, Rock Fall and Lava Flow attack are each increased by one (by two if Doors of Night is in play). Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Call of the Deeps
Text: Playable on a company containing a greater or treasure item and a Dwarf majority, if moving to a non-Dwarf-hold, non-Under-deeps site. Opponent must replace the company's new site with a site from his location deck that is an Under-deeps site or surface site. The company must be able to legally move to this site (from their site of origin). If no such site is available, discard this card; otherwise, place it in opponent's mp.

Name: Crossing the Border
Text: Playable on a company that is not moving. This card creates an attack against the company, which is a duplicate of one automatic-attack of a site in the same or an adjacent region as the company's current site, or of an adjacent Under-deeps site (attacker's choice; cannot be a non-combat attack). If not in play, reveal the site from either location deck to establish the attack. The site must be a version which target company is allowed to use. Cannot be revealed as an on-guard card. Cannot be duplicated during a given movement/hazard phase.

Name: Dawn Comes Early
Text: Environment. Playable on a Troll at or moving to a non- Under-deeps, non-Darkhaven site if Doors of Night is not in play. Target Troll makes a body check, modified by +1 for each Gates of Morning, Sun, or The Sun Shone Fiercely in play, and by -1 if he is wounded, is at a surface site, or is an Olog-hai or Half-troll. Failing this check wounds the Troll, or eliminates him if already wounded (treat a discard result as failing).

Name: Bolg, Son of Azog
Text: Unique. Orc. Manifestation of Bolg. One strike. May be played keyed to Gundabad and Dragon-gap; and may also be played at sites in these regions and at The Under- leas. Against a company that has faced a Wolf attack the same turn, Bolg, Son of Azog may also be keyed to Anduin Vales, Angmar, Forovirkain, Grey Mountains, Grey Mountain Narrows, Misty Mountains - Northern Spur, Northern Rhovanion; and to sites in these regions. One strike must always be assigned to the highest mind Dwarf in the company.

Name: Dwarven Warparty
Text: Dwarves. Three strikes. Detainment against hero companies. May be played keyed to any Dwarf-hold or ancient Dwarf-ruin; and also to the regions containing such a site and to High Pass. If Hunting Orcs or The Watchful Peace is in play, may also be played at any Under-deeps site. If The Dark Days is in play, the attack becomes non-detainment against hero companies that do not contain a Dwarf or a Wizard.

Name: Eagles Ahunt
Text: Unique. +2 prowess against Dragons. Each overt company moving in Anduin Vales, Misty Mountains (Northern and Southern Spur), High Pass, and/or Redhorn Gate faces an attack (considered a hazard creature attack): Animals. Eagles. Flying -- 4 strikes at 11/6 (attacker chooses defending characters). If Gates of Morning or The Watchful Peace is in play, this attack also affects Dunland, Enedwaith, Gap of Isen, Grey Mountain Narrows, and Wold & Foothills. Unless this attack is defeated, no character in the company may use cards requiring scout or ranger skill this turn, and any ongoing effects of such cards are cancelled.

Name: Expert Treasure-hunter
Text: Hobbit. One strike. +3 prowess against Dragons. Attacker chooses defending character; all strikes of Expert Treasure-hunter must be assigned to the same character. May only be played against minion and overt companies, following a non-detainment Dwarf creature attack or at any version of a site where a hero company with a Dwarf majority is present. Make a roll for a successful strike instead of a body check (character is not harmed): discard an item from the company with a random number closest to the result (defender's choice if tied).

Name: Fear of Kin
Text: Playable on a Dwarven Ring, treasure, or greater item borne by a Dwarf-lord. The item gives two fewer corruption points (to a minimum of one) and cannot be transferred during the organization phase. The Dwarf-lord receives 3 P. At the end of the organization phase, if the Dwarf-lord's P total is greater than his mind, the highest mind Dwarf in the company (other than the Dwarf-lord) and any of his followers must split from the company: either of the companies must move to another site this turn. Otherwise, if there are no non-follower Dwarves in the company, the company must move. Cannot be duplicated on a given item. Discard if the item is stored.

Name: Flooded to the Surface
Text: Playable on an Under-deeps surface site. The hazard player may replace one of the site's automatic-attacks with one of the automatic-attacks of an adjacent Under-deeps site. Additionally, if The Reach of Ulmo is in play, any Animal or Drake creature keyable to Coastal Seas [c] may be played at the site. Discard this card if such an (automatic-)attack is defeated or when the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Gollum's Cave
Text: Playable on a (grey) agent at an Under-deeps surface site. The agent may use Under-deeps movement (as an agent action; no movement roll required). If target agent is My Precious, he receives +2 prowess while at an Under-deeps site. If this card is in your discard pile, you may play it as if it were in your hand.

Name: Hard to Tame
Text: Corruption. Playable on a treasure or ring special item borne by a Dwarf. The item gives two fewer corruption points (to a minimum of one). The hazard player may tap this card (costing one against the hazard limit) to take one Greed, Covetous Thoughts, or Grasping and Ungracious from his discard pile to his hand. Covetous Thoughts may be played on any Dwarf in the company (except the bearer of target item). Discard this card if there are no Dwarves in the company. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

Name: Hermit Troll
Text: Troll. One strike. If revealed as an on-guard creature, attacker chooses defending characters. May also be played at a Ruins & Lairs [R] that has at least two Wildernesses [w] or one Desert [e] in its site path or that is in a mountain region.

Name: All This Dwarvish Racket
Text: Each moving company with a Dwarf majority has its hazard limit increased by half the number of Dwarves in the company (round down fractions). Additionally, if Doors of Night, Eyes of the Shadow or Growing Shadow is in play, the hazard player may draw an additional card for every Dwarf with a mind of four or less in a moving company during the movement/hazard phase. Discard this card when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Hurling Rocks
Text: Any company moving in a mountain region or in High Pass, Redhorn Gate, Bosiri, Cleft of Goats, Clyan, Dragon Gap, or Narthalf faces an attack: Rock Fall -- 2 strikes with 9 prowess. Additionally, non-unique Giant hazard creatures may be played keyed to these regions, and to adjacent regions if Arda Angered or Doors of Night is in play.

Attack or strikes of King Spider cannot be cancelled by general card effects (e.g. Ruse), but a scout may tap to cancel a strike he is facing.

Name: Lord of the Eagles
Text: Unique. Animal. Eagle. Manifestation of Gwaihir. Flying. Three strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. As a creature, may be played keyed to Anduin Vales, High Pass, Misty Mountains (Northern and Southern Spur), Wold & Foothills; and also at sites in these regions. May only be played against overt companies. If The Watchful Peace is in play, may also be played keyed to any non-Dark-domain region adjacent to one of the above named regions.As a short-event, bring Eagles Ahunt or one hazard creature with an asterisk (*) from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Naugol
Text: Dwarves. Three strikes. +2 prowess against Orcs. Detainment against hero companies. As a creature, may be played at any Dwarf-hold or site where a Dwarf-lord is present; and may also be played keyed to the region containing such a site. As a long-event, Naugol gives +1 to strikes and prowess of any Dwarf attack created by Old Enemies, and it causes Ride Against the Enemy to give +1 to strikes and prowess of any Dwarf attack created by it. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Naugrim
Text: All Dwarf attacks receive +1 prowess and +1 body; all Dwarf attacks with no body have 5 body. Discard this card when a Dwarf attack is defeated. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Wyrmsiege
Text: Playable on a Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F] (not in a Free- domain [f]). Place a non-unique Drake creature from hand with this card; the creature must be able to attack in regions in the site's site path or in the region containing the site. Companies at any version of this site must face an attack by the attached creature (considered keyed to the site) at the beginning of their site phase. At the end of the organization phase, a company at this site must make a roll and subtract one from the result for every non-warrior character it contains: if the result is less than 5, the company may not move this turn. Discard this card when the site leaves active play or when the attached creature is defeated. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Threat of Many Feet
Text: Does not count against the hazard limit. Against moving companies hazard creatures may be played keyed to the site of origin (or the last site moved to this turn). Cannot be duplicated.

Name: The Back Door
Text: Non-unique Orc hazard creatures may be played keyed to any mountain region or region containing an Orc-hold; and also at sites in such regions. If Doors of Night or Shadow of Mordor is in play, they may also be played at any Under-deeps surface site.

Name: Terror from the Deeps
Text: Any Animal or Drake hazard creature playable keyed to Coastal Seas [c] may be played keyed to non-Desert regions adjacent to a Coastal Sea region (not adjacent to Mouths of the Anduin or Sea of Rhun). Discard this card when such a creature played keyed to such a region (by name) is defeated, or when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Ta-Fa-Lisch
Text: Undead. Three strikes. May be played at any ancient Dwarf-ruin or site containing a hoard. Unless the attack is cancelled or defeated, place Ta-Fa-Lisch with the site. After an item is played at the site, place this card with the item. The bearer of target item faces an attack from this creature at the start of each of his movement/hazard phases (as if a single character company) until it is defeated, or until the item is stored or leaves active play (then remove this card from the game).

Name: Ninevet
Text: Animal. One strike. Attacker chooses defending characters. May also be played at any swamp or site in a Coastal Sea [c] region. If Terror from the Deeps is in play, may also be played at any Under-deeps site.

Name: Out of Practice
Text: Playable on a non-Hobbit character with two or more skills. Target character must attempt to move to a different site each turn or tap at the end of his organization phase. Once per turn during his organization phase, another character in the company may tap to attempt to remove this card. Make a roll: if the result is greater than 6, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Orcish Marauders
Text: Orcs. Two strikes. If all strikes against a moving company are successful, the company's new site is tapped.

Name: Orc-tortured
Text: Playable on a character facing a strike from an Orc creature attack. If the strike is successful, target character is not harmed and is taken prisoner at a Dark-hold [D], Shadow-hold [S], or Ruins & Lairs [R]. At the start of his untap phase, make a body check for that character modified by -1. Rescue-attacks (2): Orcs -- 2 strikes with 7 prowess, Orcs -- 1 strike with 10 prowess.

Name: Ibun
Text: Unique. Undead. Dwarf. One strike. May also be played keyed to a Shadow-land [s] or Ancient Dwarf-ruin against a company containing a treasure item. May also be played at Bar-en-Ibun, Cameth Brin, and The Worthy Hills.

Name: Orc-archers
Text: Playable on an Orc attack with at least four strikes (before strikes are assigned); does not count against the hazard limit. Each character in the attacked company must immediately face a strike with 6 prowess; he receives +1 prowess against this strike for each armor, helmet, and/or shield he bears. Afterwards the Orc attack is resolved normally.

Name: Old Enemies
Text: Playable on a unique hero faction in active play. Each overt company moving through the region containing the site where the faction was played (or region adjacent) faces an attack: same type as the faction, with a number of strikes equal to the faction's normal mp. Each strike has a prowess of 10, and a body of 9 minus the number of strikes assigned. If the attack is defeated, the faction is eliminated (an overt character in the company may take the faction as a trophy). Cannot be duplicated on a given faction.

Name: Wake of War
Text: The number of strikes and prowess of each Wolf, Spider, and Animal attack are increased by one (by two for Wolves if Doors of Night is in play). Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Wargs
Text: Wolves. Two strikes.

Name: Watcher in the Water
Text: Animal. Each character in the company faces one strike. May also be played at Moria. Two Wildernesses [{w}] in the site path are required.

Name: Weariness of the Heart
Text: The prowess of a character is modified by -1 until the end of the turn. Alternatively, the target character is forced to make a corruption check. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: William (Wuluag)
Text: Unique. Troll. One strike. If played after Bert or Tom and if keyed to the same site path against the same company, each character wounded by William must discard all non-special items he bears. {green} DCE: Add a body value of 8.

Name: Witch-king of Angmar
Text: Unique. Nazgul (1st). May be played as a hazard creature (with one strike) or as a permanent-event. As a creature, may also be played keyed to Angmar, Gundabad, Gorgoroth, and Imlad Morgul; and may also be played at sites in these regions. If played as a permanent-event, it will remain in play until tapped during the opponent's movement/hazard phase (tapping counts against the hazard limit). When tapped, Witch-king of Angmar becomes a long-event and causes all Shadow-holds [{S}] to become Dark-holds [{D}].

Name: Wolves
Text: Wolves. Three strikes.

Name: Words of Power and Terror
Text: Modify the prowess of all characters in a company attacked by a Nazgul by -1 until the end of the turn. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Gimli, Son of Gloin
Text: Unique. Longbeard. Manifestation of Gimli.+1 prowess against Orcs. +1 prowess when Hunting Orcs is in play (+2 if an Elf is in his company).

Name: Eodoric
Text: Unique. +1 prowess against Animals and Wolves. tap: during your organization phase at a site in Northern Rhovanion to force an opponent to reveal three cards at random from his hand.

Name: Grimbeorn the Old
Text: Unique. +2 prowess against Orcs. +2 EI against the Beornings faction. Grimbeorn is considered Beorn for the purpose of playing and interpreting Skin-changer. Discard if you have Bad Company in play.

Name: Heladil
Text: Unique. Silvan. +2 prowess against Spiders. +2 EI against the Elf factions playable in Mirkwood. Heladil may take spider creatures as trophies if he faced a strike from the attack. Discard a Greenwood the Great from his company to heal Heladil.

Name: The Master

Text: Unique. Firebeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to all of his corruption checks. -1 to influence checks against factions.

Name: Bilbo
Text: Unique. Unless he is one of the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site. All of his corruption checks are modified by +4. -2 marshalling points if eliminated.

Name: Bifur
Text: Unique. Firebeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to all of his corruption checks. -1 to influence checks against factions.

Name: Bergil
Text: Unique.

Name: Beretar
Text: Unique. +2 direct influence against the Rangers of the North faction.

Name: Beregond
Text: Unique. -1 to all of his corruption checks. -1 to influence checks against factions.

Name: Beorn
Text: Unique. +2 direct influence against the Beornings faction.

Name: Fili
Text: Unique. Longbeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to all of his corruption checks. -1 to influence checks against factions.

Name: Barliman Butterbur
Text: Unique. -1 to all of his corruption checks. -1 to influence checks against factions.

Name: Balin
Text: Unique. Longbeard. +2 prowess against Orcs. +1 direct influence against Dwarves and Dwarf factions.

Name: Arwen
Text: Unique. Noldo. +7 direct influence only usable against Aragorn II.

Name: Arinmir
Text: Unique. Nando. +2 direct influence against the Variags faction. {green} DCE: Replace with: Change +2 direct influence against Falathrim faction

Name: Aragorn II
Text: Unique. +2 direct influence against the Rangers of the North faction. -3 marshalling points if eliminated.

Name: Annalena
Text: Unique. Silvan.

Name: Anborn
Text: Unique. +2 direct influence against the Men of Lebennin faction.

Name: Alatar
Text: Unique. During the movement/hazard phase, the number of cards that opponent draws based on Alatar's company's movement is reduced by one. If in a Haven when a hazard creature is played on another company, he may join tha company and face one of the hazard creature's strikes; he must make a corruption check immediately following the attack, and, if untapped, he must tap.

Name: Adrazar
Text: Unique. +1 direct influence against all factions.

Name: Bard Bowman
Text: Unique. +2 direct influence against the Men of Northern Rhovanion faction.

Name: Boromir II
Text: Unique. +2 direct influence against the Men of Anorien faction. -1 to all of his corruption checks.

Name: Thranduil
Text: Unique. Sinda. +2 direct influence against the Wood-elves faction.

Name: Celeborn
Text: Unique. Sinda. +5 direct influence that is only usable against Galadriel.

Name: Dwalin
Text: Unique. Longbeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to all of his corruption checks. -1 to influence checks against factions.

Name: Elrohir
Text: Unique. Noldo. +1 prowess against Orcs.

Name: Dori
Text: Unique. Longbeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to all of his corruption checks. -1 to influence checks against factions.

Name: Denethor II
Text: Unique. +2 direct influence against the Tower Guard of Minas Tirith faction.

Name: Elrond
Text: Unique. Noldo. When Elrond is at Rivendell, his controlling player may keep one more card than normal in his hand. -3 marshalling points if eliminated.

Name: Damrod
Text: Unique. +2 direct influence against the Men of Lamedon faction.

Name: Erkenbrand
Text: Unique. +2 direct influence against the Riders of Rohan faction. {green} DCE: Replace with: Home site: Hornburg

Name: Eowyn
Text: Unique. Against Nazgul, +6 to her prowess, and his body is halved (round up).

Name: Dain II
Text: Unique. Longbeard. +2 direct influence against Iron Hill Dwarves, +2 prowess against Orcs. +1 direct influence against Men and Man factions.

Name: Elladan
Text: Unique. Noldo. +1 prowess against Orcs.

Name: Eomer
Text: Unique. +2 direct influence against the Riders of Rohan faction.

Name: Cirdan
Text: Unique. Sinda. When Cirdan is at Grey Havens, his controlling player may keep one more card than normal in his hand. May tap to cancel one attack keyed to a Coastal Sea region. +2 direct influence against the Elves of Lindon faction. -3 marshalling points if eliminated.

Name: Linyuile
Text: Unique. Maia. Playable at Annuminas. Discard if her company is overt or moves to a site not in Eriador. May not be attacked. Characters in her company are considered a sage for the purpose of playing and interpreting light enchantments. They may play light enchantments at any non-Haven site (even if tapped), if they have moved there the same turn. tap: cancel a River or Enchanted Stream played against her company.

Name: When You Know More
Text: Light enchantment. Playable on a sage during the site phase at a site where "Information" is playable. Tap sage and site. Tap sage to modify one influence attempt by a character in his company by +2. Sage makes a corruption check.

Name: Vein of Arda
Text: Ore. Sage or Dwarf only during the site phase at any Under-deep site. Tap the sage or Dwarf. Tap the site if it is not already tapped. Sage or Dwarf may not untap until Vein of Arda is stored at a Haven. Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

Name: Mearas
Text: Unique. Playable at Edoras or Dunharrow if the influence check is greater than 12.Standard Modifications: Men with a home site in Rohan (+2), each Wild Horses in play (+1), each Shadowfax or Snowmane in the company (+3). tap: at any time to tap all horse allies in an opponent's company moving through Rohan or at a site in Rohan.

Name: To the Uttermost Foundations
Text: Playable on a company at an Under-deeps site during its organization phase; tap site if untapped. This card is played tapped and can only be untapped during your organization phase if the company is at a different Under-deeps site. If untapped and at a Haven [h], this card may be stored in your marshalling point pile-only if stored do you receive its marshalling points. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Men of Harrowdale
Text: Unique. Playable at Dunharrow if the infuence check is greater than 7.Standard Modifications: none. tap: take a horse ally playable at a site in Rohan from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: The Windlord Found Me
Text: Playable at an untapped Isengard, Shadow-hold, or Dark-hold during the site phase. Tap the site. The company faces an Orc attack (4 strikes with 9 prowess). Afterwards, a character may tap and place this card under him. If you do not place this card with a character after the attack, discard it. That character may not untap until after this card is stored in a Haven during the organization phase. When this card is stored, and if your Wizard is not already in play, you may search your play deck or discard pile for a Wizard and play him at that Haven (does not count towards the one character per turn limit). Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Men of Westfold
Text: Unique. Playable at Helm's Deep if the infuence check is greater than 7.Standard Modifications: none. tap: take a battle-gear item playable at a site in Gap of Isen from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Mighty Steed
Text: Horse. Playable at any tapped or untapped Border- hold [B]. May not be controlled by a Dwarf, Hobbit, Ringwraith or overt character. If each character in the company controls a horse ally, the company may move up to two additional regions. tap: cancel a strike (not from an automatic-attack) against itself.

Name: Miraearon
Text: Playable at the end of the organization phase with a company that can legally move to Taur Romen and discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. This card is used as a site card: Border- hold [B] in Taur Romen (draw: 2/2). Elves may heal at this site. Wandlimb, Willowshanks and Entwives are playable at this site without further requirements: discard any Man factions you have in play. Place this card in your mp instead of discarding it from play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Mounted Lance
Text: Weapon. If the bearer is a Dunadan, Elf, or Man warrior and controlls a horse ally: +1 to his prowess (to a maximum of 8), and +1 to the ally's prowess and body. Discard this item to give -1 body to a strike bearer faces; another weapon may be used against the same strike.

Name: Token of Goodwill
Text: Offering Attempt. Playable on a diplomat whose company is facing an attack of the type listed below. Target diplomat makes a corruption check. If he does not fail, discard an item from his company (as listed below), and make a roll (or draw a #) adding the diplomat's unused direct influence. If the result is greater than the listed values, the attack is cancelled, and you may take one resource from your play deck or discard pile into your hand (reshuffle play deck if searched). Against a Dragon: greater item/5, against a Drake: major item/6, against Men, Slayer, or any Agent: minor item/7.

Name: Withdrawn to Mordor
Text: Playable on a face-up agent. If the agent has a mind of 5 or less, it is discarded. If its mind is 6 or greater, return it to its owner's hand. Alternatively, an on-guard card is discarded.

Name: Lumerane
Text: Playable on a Palantir (not Palantir of Elostirion). If the bearer is able to use the Palantir and this card is not inverted, discard a Far Sight or All Thought Bent upon It from hand to invert this card. During any of your next turns, re-invert this card to either take a resource from your play deck to your hand or cancel the effects of one hazard in play that turn. Bearer then makes a CP for each Palantir in active play (modified by -2 if its bearer has a higher mind or if opponent is Sauron). Cannot be duplicated on a given Palantir.

Name: Woses of Old Pukel-land
Text: Unique. Playable at Wose Passage-hold if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: none.

Name: Proven in Battle
Text: Playable on a character controlling at least two Valour in Battle. Target character receives +1 prowess and +1EI. If he bears a battle-gear item, his CP are modified by +1. You may invert this card: target character becomes a leader and he may tap during your end-of-turn phase to take Captain of the Guard or a warrior only resource event from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Proven in Battle2
Text: Playable on a character controlling two or more Valour in Battle. Target receives +1 prowess and +1 EI and leader skill if you so choose (invert the card to mark leader skill). Additionally, when you play this card he may take control of a non-unique, non-hoard minor or major battle-gear item, which may come from your hand, discard pile, or sideboard. Tap character if untapped. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Refugees
Text: Playable at any time if one of your factions must leave active play but is not eliminated. Place this card with the faction, which gives no mp in any case (not even to a Fallen- wizard). Discard if the faction leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated for a given faction.

Name: Rohir Weregild
Text: Playable on a company, if a character with a home site in Northern Rhovanion, Anduin Vales, or Rohan has been eliminated by a strike from an Orc, Troll, or Wolf attack this turn. +2 prowess against attacks and strikes of these types for all characters in the company with a home site in these regions. Discard this card during the end-of-turn phase when such an attack was defeated by the company that turn, or if an opponent's character of these types was eliminated in CvCCC. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Say It And Have Done
Text: Diplomat only. +3 prowess to all characters in the diplomat's company against a detainment attack by Elves, Dwarves, Dunedain, Men, Hobbits, or Maia; and +3 prowess against the next detainment attack of the same type against the company this turn.

Name: Seats of Seeing and Hearing
Text: Playable if you have a company at Amon Hen or Amon Lhaw. Search your sideboard, discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) fora copy of this card and bring it in play for your opponent. You may rotate this card 90deg (or place a token) and look at a number of cards from the top of opponent's play deck equal to the times rotated. To do so, a hero player must tap a character at Amon Hen, a minion player must tap a character at Amon Lhaw. Return the cards to the top of opponent's deck in any order you choose; character makes a CP. When rotating, opponent's copy of this card is rotated 90deg backwards (or remove a token). Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: On the Precious
Text: Playable during the site phase on a character bearing a ring special item. You may take a manifestation of Gollum from your discard pile to your hand. Additionally, if My Precious is face up and at a site in the same or an adjacent region, or if the ringbearer is at one of My Precious' home sites, he now attacks the ringbearer's company. The ringbearer must face at least one strike from the attack. If still in play afterwards, My Precious is considered at this site (no site card is required if none is available).

Name: Son of Eomund
Text: Unique. Playable on Eomer. You may start the game with this card in lieu of a minor item. Eomer becomes a leader. While another character with a home site in Rohan or Gondor is in his company, he receives +2 to his mind, prowess, and EI, and is considered Aragorn II for interpreting Captains of the West.

Name: The Spell Endured
Text: Lore. Playable on your avatar or a sage with a mind of 8 or more. Tap target character. Whenever one of your resources must be discarded as the result of exhausting a play deck, you may make a CP for target character and (if still in play afterwards) discard this card instead. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: The Three Hunters
Text: Playable on a company containing Aragorn II, Gimli, and Legolas. If these three characters are in the company and no other characters or allies, the company may move up to two additional regions and you may play Fellowship on the company (at any site, as if four characters were present). Discard to bring one Fellowship or Lucky on His Friends from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Tokens of War
Text: Diplomat only. Playable on an influence attempt. All battle-gear items (except Wizard's Staff) in the diplomat's company are placed "off to the side": the influence attempt receives a bonus equal to the combined normal mp of all items thus placed aside. Afterwards, if the attempt was successful, the items are returned to their previous bearers; otherwise they are discarded. May also be played during opponent's site phase.

Name: Old Toby
Text: Playable during the organization phase on a character at a Ruins & Lairs [R]. Tap the character and take a resource, character or hazard playable at the site from your sideboard to your hand (show opponent); if a resource, it cannot be normally worth more than 1 mp. Remove this card from the game.

Name: Wandlimb
Text: Unique. Ent. Playable at any tapped or untapped site where Entwives was brought into play. May not be attacked by automatic-attacks or hazards keyed to her site. Discard Wandlimb if her company moves and does not contain another Ent. tap: cancel the effects of an environment hazard that targets her company's current site or region.

Name: Wild Boar of Everholt
Text: Unique. Trophy. Playable at the start of the movement/ hazard phase (before any hazards are played) on a company moving through at least 2 Wilderness [ww]. The company faces an attack: Animal -- 1 strike with 12/6 prowess/body. If the attack is not defeated, discard this card. Otherwise, ttap a Man character to put this card under his control. No mp are received until this card in stored at a Man-hold.

Name: Willowshanks
Text: Unique. Ent. Playable at a tapped or untapped Miraearon. May not be attacked by hazards keyed to her site or by automatic-attacks. May not move, unless Cast aside Regret and Fear is successfully played on her (as if a character). Discard if she moves to a Man-hold or is not in the company of an Elf, Ent, or Wizard. You may wound Willowshanks to wound a Man character at her current site (both must make a body check). tap: take one Memories of Axe-wielders from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Wood-elves
Text: Unique. Playable at Thranduil's Halls if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Men (-1), Elves (+1), Dwarves (-2).

Name: Woodmen
Text: Unique. Playable at Woodmen-town if the influence check is greater than 7. Standard Modifications: Men (+1).

Name: Woses of the Druadan Forest
Text: Unique. Playable at Druadan Forest if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: none.

Name: Valour in Battle
Text: Warrior only. Trophy. Playable during the site phase on an untapped warrior, if you have a Dwarf, Dunadan, Elf, or Man faction in play normally worth 2 mp or more; must be played at a Ruins & Lairs [R], Shadow-hold [S], or Dark-hold [D] in the region containing the site where the faction is playable (or an adjacent region). The warrior faces an attack: Troll -- 1 strike with 12 prowess. If the attack is not defeated, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

Name: Schwarzer Pfeil
Text: Warrior only. Tap Black Arrow to give -1 to the prowess and body of any one attack against bearer's company. When Black Arrow is tapped, discard it if its bearer is not a Man.

Name: The Dwarves Are upon You!
Text: Playable on a company containing Dwarves facing an attack. All Dwarves in the company receive +2 prowess and -1 body against the attack. Cannot be duplicated against a given attack.

Name: Annayulma
Text: Unique. Treasure. Playable at Goblin-gate. t tap: if bearer is an Elf or sage with a mind of 6 or more, to play and interpret Healing of Nimrodel this turn as though his company's current or new site in a Wilderness [w] were a Haven [H]. This item does not untap normally. Untap Annayulma if its bearer is at a Haven [H] and taps, or if Enchanted Stream or River is played against the company.

Name: Necklace of Girion
Text: Unique. Jewel. Only playable at The Lonely Mountain. Bearer receives +3 direct influence against Dwarves/Men and Dwarf/Man factions. If bearer is at a Free- hold or Border-hold, he can make a corruption check, and, if successful, you may discard Necklace of Girion to play any non-special item from your hand with its bearer.

Name: Ancient Druedain Wisdom
Text: Lore. Playable on a Wose character with a mind of four or more, if you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card from the company. Target character may tap to make non-unique hoard items playable at any Ruins and Lairs [R] with a Pukel-creature automatic-attack.

Name: Ancient Rite
Text: Magic. Spirit-magic. Playable on a Ruins & Lairs [R] or Wose-hold if you have a spirit-magic user or a Wose character at the site. Any of opponent's companies entering a version of the site faces an attack (after facing any automatic-attacks): Pukel-creature -- 2 strikes with 9 prowess. Discard this card after the attack. Target site does not leave active play until this card is discarded. Unless he is a Ringwraith, your Wose or spirit-magic user makes a CP modified by -3. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Ancient Rite2
Text: Magic. Spirit-magic. Playable on a Ruins & Lairs [R] or Wose-hold by a spirit-magic user or a Wose character. All versions of the site gain an additional automatic-attack: Pukel-creature -- 2 strikes with 9 prowess (cancelled against your companies). Unless he is a Ringwraith, your Wose or spirit-magic user makes a CP modified by -3. Until this card is discarded, the site cannot be discarded or returned to the location deck. Discard this card if the associated attack is faced.

Name: Archer of Ithilien
Text: Playable on Anborn, Damrod, or Mablung. +2 to target character's mind, prowess and body (to a maximum of 8), and he gains a home site Henneth Annun. If in a company with another of the above named characters or with Faramir, he receives +1 to his CP, requires one less influence to be controlled, and may tap to untap such a character. You may start the game with this card in lieu of a minor item. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Banner of Elendil's House
Text: Unique. Playable by Arwen at Minas Tirith or Rivendell, if Aragorn II controls Return of the King, Ring of Barahir, or Sceptre of Annuminas. Discard if not borne by Arwen or a Dunadan. Bearer receives +1 to his CP. You may play Choice of Luthien at any site. Each Dunadan in the company requires 1 less influence to control (to a minimum of 1). If borne by a leader, all Orc, Troll, and Man attacks against the company receive -1 to prowess and strikes (to a minimum of 1).

Name: Beyond All Towers Strong and High
Imagefile: Beyond All Towers Strong and High.jpg
Text: Ritual. Song. Playable on a company at or moving to a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D], if two or more characters in the company are wounded. Play to cancel one attack against the company or to discard one hazard played on a character or associated entity in the company. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

Name: Blood-stone Amulet
Text: Jewel. Rune item. May not be included with a starting company unless the company contains a Wose character. May only be played after you successfully influence a Wose faction. +1 EI against Woses. tap: cancel a strike from a Pukel-creature attack against bearer's company.

Name: Annayulma2
Text: Unique. Treasure. Playable at Goblin-gate. tThe bearer of this item need not tap to play Miruvor (and may play Miruvor even if he is tapped). If he is an Elf or sage with a mind of 6 or more, his current site in a Wilderness [w] is considered a Haven [H] for the purpose of playing and interpreting Healing of Nimrodel. This item gives 2 mp if stored at Lorien.

Name: More Alert than Most
Text: The number of strikes of any attack that chooses defending characters is reduced by one (to a minimum of one)-by 2 if Gates of Morning is in play. Discard when such an attack is defeated. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Cause of the Free Peoples
Text: Unique. Playable on an untapped diplomat at the same site as a revealed (non-hazard) agent who cannot use any type of magic. Tap the diplomat and make an influence check against the agent (as if a character in play by opponent). Modify this attempt by +2 if the agent is wounded or tapped, and by -1 for each revealed agent opponent has in play. If the influence check is successful and you have a copy of the agent in your hand, you may play him as an ally worth 1 less mp (to a minimum of 1) under the control of the influencing character. Place this card with the ally.

Name: Challenge
Text: Playable during CvCC before strikes are assigned. Choose one of opponent's characters and one of yours: CvCC now proceeds as if they were single character companies. Additionally, if your company consists of one character and no more than one ally, CvCC is not cancelled as per any site card of the companies involved. If CvCC is cancelled by your opponent, place this card in your mp; it is worth 1 mp.

Name: Counsellors of the North Kingdom
Text: Unique. Playable if at least two of the following cards are in play: Master of Buckland, The Thain, or The Mayor. The characters controlling these cards receive +2 EI against Dunedain, may use any Palantir they bear, and may tap to take one Arthadan Rangers or Rangers at Sarn Ford from your discard pile to your hand. Any Mischief in a Mean Way in play at sites in The Shire is discarded.

Name: Crown of Earnur
Text: Unique. Treasure. Playable at Minas Tirith by a Dunadan if Return of the King is in play. +2 EI against characters with a home site in Greater Gondor. If bearer is not Aragorn II, this item gives 2 corruption points. If you have a First Settlers faction in play at a site in Harondor, Ithilien, or Southern Rhovanion, this item gives 2 mp. tap: take a song from your discard pile or play deck to your hand (reshuffle).

Name: Dirwood Spear
Text: Weapon. +1 prowess against Animals, Spiders, Wolves, Orcs, and Undead. Wose only: bearer gains the warrior skill. If he already is a warrior, he may always be assigned a strike from an attack (regardless of his status or the attack's ability).

Name: Earnil I Pheriannath
Text: Unique. Playable on Pippin if he controls To Fealty Sworn and you have Return of the King or Steward of Gondor in play. Pippin receives +1 to his prowess and requires only two influence to be controlled if controlled by Aragorn II or the Steward of Gondor Dunadan. When facing an attack, you may always assign a strike to Pippin, regardless of his status or the attack's abilities. Discard if you have neither Return of the King nor Steward of Gondor in play.

Name: Eithel Ulmo
Text: Unique. Playable on Pelargir if you have a Dunadan faction in play. For each Coastal Sea [c] in any of your companies' site path you may place a token on Eithel Ulmo. tap: during your organization phase to look at a number of cards from the top of your play deck equal to the number of tokens on this card and replace them in any order you choose. Afterwards, remove the tokens. Discard Eithel Ulmo if Pelargir leaves active play or you do not have a Dunadan faction in play.

Name: Elendilmir
Text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at Tolfalas if you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card from the company;may also be played at Isengard if opponent has a manifestation of Saruman in play. +3 EI against Dunedain and Men with a home site in Gondor. Dunadan only: tap: give +2 to a CP made by a Dunadan in the company.

Name: Engines of Defense
Text: Playable as a hero resource on a Border-hold [B], Free-hold [F], Wizardhaven or Lordhaven [H]. All automatic-attacks at minion versions of the site receive +2 prowess against overt companies. Siege cannot be played on the site. Alternatively, playable as a minion resource on a Shadow-hold [S], Dark-hold [D], or Darkhaven [K]. All automatic-attacks at hero versions of the site receive +2 prowess. Tower Raided cannot be played on any version of the site. Discard if target site leaves active play.

Name: Captains of the West
Text: Command. Playable at Minas Tirith on Aragorn II, Boromir II, Faramir, or Imrahil. Your Man and Dunadan warriors in the company with a mind of two or less do not require any influence to be controlled. You may bring any number of these into play during the organization phase, and there is no limit to the company's size or the number of leaders it may contain. Discard when there are more than two non-Man, non-Dunadan characters in the company, or when you move to a site not in Greater Gondor or Mordor. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: The Hunt
Text: Playable on Alatar during the organization phase. Name a specific hazard creature card your opponent revealed to you through a mechanism of the game and discarded. Unless eliminated or prevented from being in play, your opponent then finds this particular card (reshuffling his play deck if it was searched). This creature immediately attacks Alatar as though he were a one-character company. Alatar cannot use or benefit from spells against the attack. If untapped, tap Alatar afterwards.

Name: Beffraen
Text: Unique. Playable at any Ruins & Lairs [R] in Eriador that is a hidden site if the influence check is greater than 7.Standard Modifications: none.

Name: No Waiting to Wonder
Text: Playable on an untapped Hobbit when another character in his company is facing a strike (during other character's strike sequence). Tap Hobbit. The prowess of the strike is modified by -4 and its body by -1. If the strike is successful, the Hobbit must make a body check (in addition to the other effects of the successful strike).

Name: Smoke Rings
Text: Bring one resource or character from your sideboard or discard pile into your play deck and shuffle.

Name: Sentinels of Numenor
Text: Place this card in your marshalling points pile. Any attempt (by any player) to influence a faction playable at a site in Anorien, Lebennin, Lamedon, Belfalas, or Anfalas is modified by -2 and cannot be attempted with Muster. Place any such faction you successfully influence (while this card is in play) under this card. All factions under this card give an additional marshalling point. Discard when any faction under this card is discarded (all other contained factions remain). Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Secret Ways
Text: The roll required to move between adjacent Under-deep sites is decreased by 4. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Saw Further and Deeper
Text: Playable only if your Wizard is not revealed. Your general influence is increased by 5. Your Wizard may only be brought into play at his home site. Discard when you bring your Wizard into play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. May not be played by a lord player.

Name: Rebuild the Town
Text: Playable during the site phase on a non-Dragon's lair, non-Under-deeps Ruins & Lairs. The site becomes a Border-hold and loses all automatic-attacks. Discard Rebuild the Town when the site is discarded or returned to its location deck.

Name: Phial of Galadriel
Text: Unique. Playable on a non-Wizard, non-Dwarf bearer of Star-glass at a Haven in the same company as an untapped Galadriel. Tap Galadriel, replace Star-glass with Phial of Galadriel, and remove Star-glass from play. Tap Phial to cancel any Undead attack. Tap Phial to modify the prowess of any hazard creature attack keyed to a Dark-domain, Shadow-land, Dark-hold, or Shadow-hold by -2-you choose targets of such an attack's strikes (regardless of tapped status, wounded status, and the normal abilities of the attack). Tap Phial to give +2 to any corruption check by its bearer. Cannot be transferred.

Name: Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur
Text: Stolen Knowledge. Playable on a company if the company discards (for no effect) a Stolen Knowledge card it controls. You can tap this card during the same site phase the company successfully plays Rescue Prisoners at Dol Guldur (or rescues characters taken prisoner if the rescue site is Dol Guldur); this card never untaps. If tapped, this card can be stored at a Haven-only if stored do you receive its marshalling points. If stored, all automatic-attacks at all Dark-holds and all Shadow-holds are with one less prowess and one less strike (to a minimum of one). Once tapped, no other copy of this card can be tapped.

Name: Palm to Palm
Text: Playable on a company without a Wizard at a Haven. Any character designated as tapping in support gives +1 to an influence attempt or to an attempt to remove a corruption card by any other character in the company. The mind of each character and ally in the company is increased by one. Discard when any play deck is exhausted, a Wizard joins the company, or any character in the company splits off into another company.

Name: Ordered to Kill
Text: Each face up agent must attack if a company enters a site where he is located. Additionally, any unrevealed on-guard cards are discarded instead of being returned to their owner's hand. Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Thorongil
Text: Unique. Grey agent. Manifestation of Aragorn II.+2 prowess against Nazgul and Ringwraiths. Agent only: May move to a Darkhaven [K]. May take another agent action (not counting against the hazard limit) each time he takes an agent action. tap: add an extra strike to his attack. tap: attack a company moving to his site during the movement/hazard phase.

Name: Glory of Arnor Restored
Text: Playable on a company containing a Dunadan with a a home site in Eriador. Tap this card when the company successfully plays a unique hero faction at a site in Arthedain, Rhudaur, Cardolan, or Angmar. This card never untaps. If tapped, invert it if the company successfully plays a Stolen Knowledge card at a site in Angmar. If inverted, this card may be stored at a Dunadan-hold in Eriador. It then gives 3 mp and you may play Tower Raided at Carn Dum as if it were a Shadow-hold [S]. This card gives 2 additional mp if you also receive any mp from Reunited Kingdom; it is worth full mp to an Atani-lord or Elrond player. Once inverted, no other copy of this card can be inverted.

Name: Ghostbane
Text: Unique. Staff. Playable at The Riddle-caves.+2 prowess against Undead. This item affects a Ringwraith. If bearer defeats a strike from an Undead attack, he may immediately take control of a non-food minor item (which may be played from sideboard or hand). Shadow-magic user only: tap: assign a strike from an Undead attack his company faces to any character at a site in the same or an adjacent region. Bearer makes a CP modified by -2.

Name: Ghost-warriors of Dunfearan
Text: Unique. Playable at the Ghost-caves by a sage bearing Ghostbane, or by Aragorn II if Return of the King is in play. tap: any Gold Chains in the Wind you have in play is not discarded until the end-of-turn phase. tap: and discard an Undead creature from hand to cancel an attack against one of your companies.

Name: Dagnirdraug
Text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at Osteledan. Also playable at any site in Hollin if you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card from the company. +2 prowess to a maximum of 9. Warrior only: +4 to prowess against Wolves (to a maximum of 10). tap: if Wake of War is in play to take a strike from a Wolf attack assigned to another character in the company. Bearer makes a CP.

Name: Noldo-lantern
Text: Treasure. Playable at any Under-deep site. +2 to all rolls required for bearer's company to move to an adjacent site in the Under-deeps. Tap Noldo-lantern to give -2 prowess and one less strike (to a minimum of one) to any Undead, Nazgul, Orc, or Troll attack.

Name: Concealed Entrance
Text: Playable during the site phase on a hidden site. Unless they tap a scout, your opponent's companies cannot enter the site. Discard when any play deck is exhausted or when the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Clan-bound
Text: Grey or white player only. Playable on a starting company in lieu of a minor item. If the starting company contains two or more unique characters with the same home site, at which a unique faction is playable that has at least two manifestations (or is a dual resource), you may play as a normal character any character with the same home site (mind restrictions still apply).

Name: Causeways and Canals
Text: Playable on a port or swamp (not "sieged") if you have a faction in play at the site under Profitable Trade. The site's type moves one step closer to a Free-hold [F]. If already a Free-hold, it becomes a Battleground and you receive this card's mp. During your end-of turn phase, if target site is "sieged", place a token on this card. Discard this card when there are 3 tokens are on it.

Name: Noble Hound
Text: Playable at any tapped or untapped Border-hold. In all cases, Noble Hound must be assigned a strike before any strike can be assigned to its controlling character. Discard Noble Hound to cancel any effect that would take its controlling character prisoner (does not protect other characters from being taken prisoner). If Noble Hound is tapped or wounded, treat it as though it were untapped for the purposes of assigning strikes.

Name: Lord of the Mark
Text: Unique. Playable on Theoden, Theodred, or Eomer at a site in Greater Gondor. This card must be transferred to the first character in active play in this order (or discarded if he is in play by opponent). +2 to target's mind, and + 2 EI against characters and factions playable at sites in Rohan, Gap of Isen, Anduin Vales, and Anorien. He may automatically influence the Riders of Rohan. +1 to his CP if a character with a home site in Rohan is in his company. If not played on an avatar, this card gives 1 mp.

Name: Ghostbane2
Text: Unique. Staff. Playable at The Riddle-caves.+2 prowess against Undead. This item affects a Ringwraith. If bearer defeats a strike from an Undead attack, he may immediately take control of a non-food minor item (which may be played from sideboard or hand). Shadow-magic user only: tap: assign a strike from an Undead attack his company faces to any character at a site in the same or an adjacent region. Bearer makes a CP modified by -2.

Name: Last March of the Ents
Text: Unique. Playable on a company containing a Hobbit and an Ent. taAt the start of their movement/hazard phase, when moving to a site in The Shire or a Wilderness [w] region, you may tap a Hobbit and an Ent in the company to prevent any Ent allies in the company from being discarded as per their card effect. Additionally, any Ent in the company may face strikes from attacks keyed to his site and from automatic-attacks. Discard if the company does not contain a Hobbit and an Ent.

Name: Almost Felt You Liked the Forest!?
Imagefile: Almost Felt You Liked the Forest.jpg
Text: Playable on an Ent ally. The ally may face strikes from automatic-attacks and attacks keyed to his company's site this turn. Alternatively, play to cancel an Animal, Spider, or Awakened Plant attack against your company.

Name: Horse Mane's Helm
Text: Unique. Helmet. +1 body to a maximum of 9. tap: shuffle one warrior only resource event used by the bearer of this item this phase into your play deck instead of discarding it.

Name: Grim Voiced and Grim Faced
Text: Unique. Playable on Bard Bowman. +2 to his mind, prowess, and body, and +2 to his EI. He gains Dale as an additional home site. Except when facing an attack or strike, Bard may tap to untap a Black Arrow he bears. You may start the game with this card in lieu of a minor item.

Name: Hollow by the Left Breast
Text: Information. Stolen Knowledge. Ranger or scout only. Playable during the site phase at a Dragon's Lair, or a Border-hold [B] in Northern Rhovanion. Tap the character and the site (if not already tapped). When facing a Dragon in CvCC its body is halved (round up). Discard this card if a dark enchantment is played on the character or after a Dragon has been defeated by the company in CvCC. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Hollow by the Left Breast2
Text: Information. Stolen Knowledge. Playable on a character during the site phase at a site where Information is playable in the same or an adjacent region as an opponent's Dragon's Den [K]. May also be played after CvCC involving an opponent's Dragon. Tap the character and the site (if untapped). Discard this card during CvCC involving an opponent's Dragon: one body check made by the Dragon is automatically successfull. Discard if a dark enchantment is played on target character. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Hollow by the Left Breast3
Text: Information. Stolen Knowledge. Ranger or scout only. Playable during the site phase at a Dragon's Lair, any Border-hold [B] or Information site within the same region as a Dragon's Lair. Tap the character and the site (if not already tapped). When facing a Dragon in CvCC its body is halved (round up). Discard this card if a dark enchantment is played on the character or after a Dragon has been defeated by the company in CvCC. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Honey
Text: Treasure. Food item. Playable at Beorn's House or Ligr Wodaize Berne. This card gives 2 mp to a grey or black player. May be stored at the following holds for a different effect: Dwarf-hold + 2 to all influence attempts against faction or characters at this site that turn; Elf-hold: take one Knowledge card from your sideboard to your hand; Atani-hold (other then where it was played): place any one food item with a character in the company from your sideboard; any other hold: place one non-unique special item playable at the hold on the storing character, the item may come from hand, discard pile or sideboard.

Name: Horn of Defiance
Text: Unique. Hoard item. Instrument. +2 EI. A stored Reforging may be placed with this item to "restore" it. Once restored, Horn of Defiance gives 3 mp and 2 corruption points. tap: if restored and if bearer is the first to face a strike of an attack, to face all strikes of the attack. The character faces a separate strike sequence for each strike.

Name: King of Dale
Text: Unique. Playable on Bard Bowman, Bain, or Brand,if you have in play at least 3 unique hero factions playable at sites in Northern Rhovanion or its adjacent regions, and if you have defeated a unique Dragon manifestation with an associated Dragon's Lair in one of these regions. +3 to his EI and his CP are modified by +1. Each of your factions only playable at sites in these regions gives +1 mp. Automatic-attacks at sites in Northern Rhovanion attack normally (not as detainment) and with +2 prowess against minion companies.

Name: King of Dale2
Text: Unique. Playable on Bard Bowman, Bain or Brand,if you have at least 3 unique hero factions in play at sites in Northern Rhovanion or its adjacent regions, and you have defeated a unique Dragon manifestation with a home site in one of these regions. +3 EI and his CP are modified by +1. Factions playable at sites in these regions are worth +1 mp to you. Automatic-attacks at sites in Northern Rhovanion attack normally (not as detainment) and with +2 prowess against minion companies.

Name: Lesser Minds Daunted
Text: Offering Attempt. Playable on a diplomat whose companyis facing a hazard creature attack of the type listed below,if another company is at a site in the same or an adjacent region. Tap the diplomat and make a roll (considered an influence attempt), adding his unused EI. If the result is greater than the listed values, the attack is cancelled and the hazard creature immediately attacks a company of your choice at a site in the same or an adjacent region. Against Hobbits, Orcs, Men, and Slayers: 8. Against Elves, Dunedain, Dwarves, Giants, and Trolls: 9. Against Drakes or Dragons: 10.

Name: Great Cup of Thror
Text: Unique. Hoard item. Treasure. May be played at a tapped site if the company has faced an attack from a unique Dragon manifestation that turn. +2 EI against Dwarves. Discard this item to make one roll for a burglary attempt automatically successful.

Name: Lulled by His Words
Text: Flattery attempt. Playable during the site phase ona character making an influence attempt against an opponent's character of the type listed below. Make a roll (instead of the normal influence attempt), modified by +2 if the character is a diplomat and +2 if a Dragon. If the result is greater than the listed values, the influence attempt is automatically successful. Against Men, Orcs, or Trolls 10; against Dwarves and Hobbits 11; against Dunedain, Elves and Woses 12.

Name: Make Use of His Desire
Text: Offering Attempt. Diplomat only. Playable during opponent's site phase when CvCC i ap is declared involving an opponent's Dragon. Target diplomat makes a CP. If still in play afterwards, discard an item from the company (as listed below) and make a roll, adding his unused EI. If the result is greater than the listed values, CvCC is cancelled and you may take one resource from your play deck (reshuffle) or discard pile to your hand. Greater item/5, major item/6, gold ring item/7, minor item/8.

Name: No Match in Your Treasuries
Text: Playable on a unique stored item. Target item gives no mp. Your opponents' item mp totals are reduced by the amount of mp target item would normally give you (to a minimum of 1). If target item is not a treasure, this card only affects opponents of your alignment. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

Name: Die Eiserne Krone
Text: Unique. Whenever bearer makes an influence check, he must also make a corruption check. If the bearer is not a Hobbit: he receives +1 to body to a maximum of 10; he receives +4 to direct influence; and he may tap The Iron Crown to cancel an attack by Orcs, Trolls, or Men against his company.

Name: Of the Race of Dale
Text: Playable on Bard Bowman, Bain, or Brand. Any Black Arrow target character bears gives a -3 modification (instead of its normal modification) when tapped to modify a Dragon or Drake attack. Discard if there is more than one Black Arrow in the company. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Old Winyards
Text: Playable at any tapped or untapped Border-hold [B]. Discard Old Winyards during the site phase at a Free- hold [F] to make one minor item playable at the site. You may play a major item instead if you discard two copies of Old Winyards, or a non-hoard greater item if you discard three copies.

Name: Power of Persuasion
Text: Diplomat only. Tap a diplomat during the organization phase at a tapped Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F]. Diplomat's company may not move this turn. During the site phase at this site, a character in the diplomat's company may make an influence attempt (modified by -3) against a faction playable at the site (even though it is tapped).

Name: Ringil
Text: Unique. Hoard item. Weapon. +1 body. Warrior only: +1 prowess (to a maximum of 8). A stored Reforging may be placed with this item to "restore" it. Once restored, Ringil gives 4 mp, 3 corruption points, and +5 prowess (to a maximum of 11).

Name: Share of the Treasure
Text: Hoard item. Treasure. Discard to cancel a detainment attack by Dwarves, Dunedain, Orcs, or Men against the bearer's company. You may include up to 14 copies of Share of the Treasure in your play deck and sideboard combined. This items gives 2 corruption points if used as a minion resource.

Name: Thane's Attire
Text: Unique. Hoard item. Weapon. Shield. Helmet. Two- handed. Cannot be used by a Hobbit. Warrior only: +2 prowess (to a maximum of 8) and +2 body (to a maximum of 10). You may invert this item (or place a token) instead of making a body check for its bearer; remove it from the game if inverted twice. You may discard a Reforging from the company to re-invert this item (or remove a token). tap: take the next Block played on the bearer of this item this phase to hand instead of discarding it.

Name: Magical Toys
Text: Treasure. Playable at any tapped or untapped Dwarf-hold if you discard (for no other effect) a Dwarven Cunning from the site. May be stored at any Free-hold [F] or Border-hold [B] that is not a Dwarf-hold; if stored this item gives 1 mp.

Name: Army of the Dead
Text: Unique. Playable at Vale of Erech. May only be played by Aragorn II on the same turn that he plays Paths of the Dead. May not be influenced by an opponent. {cyan} UEP: Unique. Playable at the Vale of Erech. May only be played by Aragorn II on the same turn that he uses the special movement of Paths of the Dead. May not be influenced by an opponent.

Name: Feud with the Dragon
Text: Dragon-lord only. Playable on an item in your hoardwith a race specific bonus. Keep this card with the item.You may not play the item from your hoard. Choose a race for which the item gives a bonus: while you control this item, each of opponent's characters in play of given race has its CP modified by -1 and receives +2 prowess against Dragons. CvCC at your Dragon's Den [K] cannot be cancelled. Invert this card when the item comes into active play again: it is worth 3 mp to any player controlling the item (even a Lord or Fallen-wizard player). Cannot be duplicated on a given item and for a given race.

Name: Aryen
Text: Unique. Grey agent. +3 EI against Animal and Wolf factions. tap: cancel an Animal, Spider, or Wolf attack against his company. Agent only: tap: allow one non-unique Animal or Wolf hazard creature to be played at his Border-hold [B] or Ruins & Lairs [R] this phase; it must be keyable to a non-Coastal Sea region by type.

Name: The Road Goes Ever On
Text: Playable during the organization phase on a company if you discard from the company a food item. Whenever you play a card on the company with 'Fair Travels' in its title, you may untap up to two characters in the company or remove one corruption card from such a character. Discard this card to cancel an effect that would replace the company's new site with another site. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: There Is Always Vengeance
Text: Unique. Playable on Aragorn II if you have revealed a Wizard and your Wizard is not in play. +1 to his mind, prowess, and body, and +3 EI. Target character may tap during the organization phase to shuffle one resource or character from your sideboard into your play deck. When eliminated, he gives -5 mp (instead of -3; place this card in your mp). You may take this card from your sideboard or discard pile to your hand when you play Sacrifice of Form. Discard this card when your Wizard enters play.

Name: There's Queer Folk About
Text: Opponent must reveal to you any (grey) agent or hazards playable on a (grey) agent he has in his hand. If none are available, he must reveal his whole hand. If you are Fallen-Pallando, Fallen- Saruman, or The Necromancer, you may also play this card as a hazard.

Name: Travel Far and Wide
Text: Playable on a company. During their organization phase, discard from hand a Forod, Rhun, Harad, or Belegaer to allow the company to move one extra region that turn if moving to a site in respectively The Northern Waste, the Great Central Plains, The Sun-lands, or a Coastal Sea [c] region; their hazard limit is reduced by one (to a minimum of two). You may start the game with this card in lieu of playing a minor item.

Name: Troll-shaws
Text: Lore. Playable on a character at Ettenmoors. If target character is: a Hobbit, he gains the sage skill, and this card may be stored at Bag End for 1 mp; If a ranger, he may tap to shuffle one Many Turns and Doublings from your discard pile into your play deck; If a sage, he may tap to take one Dawn Take You All! from your discard pile to your hand; If a scout, he may tap to make major items (even hoard items) playable at a non-Haven Ettenmoors this turn.Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Troll-shaws2
Text: Lore. Playable on a character at Ettenmoors. If target character is a Hobbit, he gains the sage skill, and this card may be stored at Bag End for 1 mp. If a ranger, he may tap to shuffle one Many Turns and Doublings from your discard pile into your play deck. If a sage, he may tap to take one Dawn Take You All! from your discard pile to your hand. If a scout, he may tap to make major items (even hoard items) playable at a non-Haven Ettenmoors this turn.Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: True-hearted Man
Text: Unique. Playable on Boromir II if his company faces a creature attack with more than one strike (before strikes are assigned). Boromir receives +1 prowess against the attack and must face all strikes of the attack alone, in separate strike sequences. After the attack, discard this card if Boromir is wounded. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Many Foes He Fought from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Weather It
Text: Playable on a character. Rotate this card 90deg during the end-of-turn phase if target character has moved that turn and two or more environment hazards are in play. If rotated at least once, discard during the organization phase to allow the company to move one extra region that turn. If fully rotated, target character receives +1 prowess and body. If each character in the company controls a fully rotated Weather It, their company is not affected by Mirage, Mordo, Sandstorm, Snowstorm, or White Vision. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Where the Stars are Strange
Text: Place this card in your mp. Instead of discarding a site from play, you may place it with this card. This card gives 4 mp if you have placed sites with it located in the following territories (at least one site per territory): The Northern Waste, the Great Central Plains, The Sunlands, and The Sundering Seas. You may start the game with this card in lieu of playing a minor item. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Faster Than the Winds
Text: Playable during the organization phase on a company able to move with flying movement. The company may move with flying movement to any site in the same or an adjacent territory as their current site (no region maximum). The hazard limit for this company is increased by 1 for every 4 regions the company moves through (round up). Remove this card from the game.

Name: Whisking Youths on Mad Adventures
Text: Gandalf only. Playable on Gandalf at Bree or a site in The Shire. You may bring one Hobbit into play with Gandalf at a Ruins & Lairs [R] in Eriador. Place this card on the Hobbit when he enters play; he receives +1 to his mind and prowess. Cannot be duplicated on a given Hobbit.

Name: Wizard's Resolve
Text: Spell. Light Enchantment. Wizard only. One character or ally in the company receives +1 to all rolls made by/for him this phase. Wizard makes a CP modified by -1. Cannot be duplicated in a given phase.

Name: Beasts of the Wood
Text: Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Haven, non-Darkhaven, non-Dark-hold site in Woodland Realm, Western Mirkwood, Heart of Mirkwood, Southern Mirkwood, Fangorn, or Cardolan if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: if Radagast is your Wizard (+3). Tap this faction to cancel an attack keyed by name to one of the regions listed above. May also be used as a minion resource card that is only playable by a character in a covert company.

Name: Noble Steed
Text: Horse. Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Haven site in Rohan, Southern Rhovanion, Khand, Dorwinion, Horse Plains, or Harondor. If each character in a company controls a Noble Steed (or Bill the Pony or Shadowfax), the company may move up to two additional regions. Tap to cancel a strike (not from an automatic-attack) against its bearer or itself.

Name: Promptings of Wisdom
Text: Light Enchantment. Playable during the organization phase on a ranger. Target ranger may tap to cancel all hazard effects for the rest of the turn that: force his company to return to its site of origin or that tap his company's current or new site. If so tapped, target ranger makes a corruption check. Cannot be duplicated in a given company.

Name: The White Council
Text: Playable during your organization phase in your marshalling point pile if your Wizard is in a Haven and you have more marshalling points than your opponent. Your opponent must be a Fallen-wizard or a Wizard. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

Name: The White Wizard
Text: Unique. Playable on a Wizard with Sacrifice of Form. +2 to his direct influence, +1 to all of his corruption checks. Discard if Saruman is in play as an opposing Wizard.

Name: Wild Horses
Text: Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Haven site in Rohan, Southern Rhovanion, Khand, Dorwinion, Horse Plains, or Harondor if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: Men with home sites in the regions listed above (+3). Tap this faction to allow any company with one of the regions listed above in its site path to move up to 1 additional region.

Name: Wild Hounds
Text: Playable at any tapped or untapped Ruins and Lairs in a Wilderness if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: if Radagast is your Wizard (+3). Discard this faction to cancel an automatic-attack at a Ruins and Lairs or an attack keyed to Wilderness or Ruins and Lairs. May also be used as a minion resource card that is only playable by a character in a covert company.

Name: Driven into Exile
Text: Playable on a Dwarf. Target Dwarf receives +1 mind. Whenever he becomes wounded, you may take one Old Grudge from your discard pile to your hand. If target is a non-Longbeard Dwarf with a mind of 8 or more, King under the Mountain may be played on him (as if on Dain II) at sites not in Wilderland or its adjacent regions; you may play King under the Mountain and Returned Exiles at such a site even if in play by an opponent. Cannot be duplicated on a given Dwarf.

Name: Wizard's Cart
Text: Playable on a company containing a Wizard and a horse ally. Discard if these requirements are not met. When the company moves, the maximum company size is increased by two (to a maximum of 9) and you may tap this card to take one Fireworks from your sideboard to your hand. This card does not untap normally; instead, tap your Wizard to untap it. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Anduril, the Flame of the West
Text: Unique. Sage only during the site phase at an untapped site where information is playable. Tape the sage and the site. Sage makes a corruption check modified by -3. Keep sage tapped until Anduril is stored at a Haven [{H}]. Once stored, you may discard a stored Reforging and place Anduril with Narsil.
