In addition to Narsil's effects, Anduril gives its bearer 4 marshalling points, +4 prowess (to a maximum of 11), +1 direct influence, and one more corruption point. Anduril may be tapped to untap a Dunadan character in the same company, but its bearer must make a corruption check modified by -1.

Name: Anduin River
Text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company containing a ranger. If the company uses region cards for its site path, tap the ranger to move as if the following pairs of regions were adjacent: Rohan and Dagorlad, Anorien and Dagorlad, Anorien and Ithilien, Lebennin and Ithilien, Lebennin and Harondor. Otherwise, if the site moved to is in one of the regions listed above, the hazard limit is reduced by two (to a minimum of two). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Align Palantir
Text: Sage only if a Palantir is in his company. Keep with the Palantir; bearer now has the ability to use the Palantir. Discard Align Palantir if the company carrying the Palantir moves. May not be duplicated on a given  Palantir.

Name: Draw Swords Together
Text: Playable on a hero company. One grey agent may be played as character with the company at one of your Havens [H]; place this card with the agent. This card may be played with a starting company in lieu of a minor item (reveal it before playing a grey agent). Alternatively, playable during the organization phase on one of your face up grey agents bearing Deeds of Lonely Daring. Discard Deeds of Lonely Daring: target agent becomes one of your characters in active play.

Name: Elendil!
Text: Playable on Aragorn II or a Dunadan with a home site in Eriador, if he bears a weapon and makes a corruption check, influence attempt or faces a strike. Modify the roll by the prowess bonus the weapon gives him. Cannot be duplicated in a given turn.

Name: Ent-moot
Text: Ritual. Playable at the end of the organization phase with a moving company that contains an Ent ally and can legally move to Fangorn. This card is used as a site card: Free-hold [F] in Fangorn (you draw: 1, opponent draws: 3). When moving to this site, Fangorn is considered a Deep Wilderness [ww] region. Any resource normally playable at Wellinghall is playable at this site. Place this card in your mp instead of discarding it from play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Entwives
Text: Unique. Playable at any Border-hold [B] or non-Dragon's lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in a Wilderness [w]; this region must not be in Eriador, Gondor, Mordor, or Wilderland, nor be adjacent to a Shadow-land [s] or Dark-domain [d] and if the influence check is greater than 12. Standard Modifications: Ents of Fangorn (+4), each Ent ally in the company (+2), Wizards (-5). Muster or Threats has no effect on an attempt to influence this faction. You may reveal Entwives from hand during the movement/ hazard phase to cancel the discarding of any Ent allies moving to a site where Entwives is playable. This faction gives 4 mp if you have a Man faction in play at a site Entwives' current region.

Name: Entwives2
Text: Unique. Playable at any Border-hold [B] or non-Dragon's lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in a Wilderness [w]; this region must not be in Eriador, Gondor, or Wilderland, nor be adjacent to a Shadow-land [s] or Dark-domain [d] and if the influence check is greater than 12. Standard Modifications: each Ent ally in the company (+2), Wizards (-5). Muster or Threats has no effect on an attempt to influence this faction. You may reveal Entwives from hand during the organization phase to cancel the discarding of any Ent moving to a site where Entwives is playable that turn.

Name: Evermind
Text: Playable if a character with home site Helm's Deep ora site in Rohan was eliminated this turn. Cannot be duplicated for a given character. Discard this card to discard a corruption card from one of your characters with home site Helm's Deep or a site in Rohan.

Name: Olga-wama
Text: Unique. Playable at Barrow-downs or Cameth Brin. Armor. Jewel. +1 body to a maximum of 8. Bearer may attach or detach any non-armor minor item he controls with Olga Wama during the organization phase (invert it or place a token); if placed with Olga Wama it gives no corruption points and cannot be used (none of its abilities apply). For each minor item attached, bearer gains +1 EI against unique Man characters and factions playable at sites in Rhudaur, Cardolan, and Dunland.

Name: Fate Let Our Ways Meet
Text: Playable with a starting company in lieu of a minor item. Instead of a normal character, you may play one non-overt character (or two Hobbits) with the starting company regardless of his race. Additionally, the character's home site is not considered when determining the company's starting site. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Fated Individual
Text: Playable on a unique character or ally with a prowess less than 5. Target character receives +2 prowess against all attacks from agents, Nazgul, Slayers, and Assassin. Whenever he makes a body check, rotate this card 90deg (or place a token; maximum of 3 times). Discard this card to modify a CP for target character by the number of times it is rotated. This card gives -1 miscellaneous mp for each time rotated. When this card is discarded, place it in your mp. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Dernhelm
Text: Unique. Playable on Eowyn. You may start the game with this card in lieu of a minor item. +1 to Eowyn's prowess, body, and mind. While she is in the company with a Hobbit or character with home site Edoras: +1 to her CP, and you may play Helm of Her Secrecy as though Eowyn were in your hand. Discard if Eowyn taps during the site phase, or if Helm of Her Secrecy is in play during the end-of-turn phase.

Name: Fool of a Took
Text: Unique. Playable on Pippin if he bears a Palantir. He may tap to use a Palantir he bears; afterwards, reveal four random cards from your hand to opponent. During his end-of-turn phase, if Pippin has not used a Palantir, he makes a CP modified by -2. Discard if he does not bear a Palantir.

Name: Gulthalion
Text: Unique. Playable at Thuringwathost. Shield. +2 body to a maximum of 9. May also be used as a minion item by a minion Elf.Warrior or sage only: +2 prowess against non-combat attacks. tap: at any time to give -2 to the prowess and body of any character at the site that has used a magic or spell resource this turn.

Name: Guthwine
Text: Unique. Weapon. +1 prowess to a maximum of 8 (+2 if bearer is a warrior). Man or Dunadan warrior only: +3 prowess (to a maximum of 9) and -1 to target's body against Orcs and Wolves. Eomer or Eowyn only: +1EI.

Name: Guthwine2
Text: Unique. Weapon. +1 prowess to a maximum of 8. Man or Dunadan warrior only: +3 prowess (to a maximum of 9) and -1 to target's body against Wolves and Uruk-hai. Eomer or Eowyn only: +1EI.

Name: Herugrim
Text: Unique. Weapon. +1 prowess to a maximum of 8(+2 if bearer is a warrior). Man or Dunadan warrior only: +3 prowess (to a maximum of 9) and -1 to target's body against Orcs and Wolves. Theoden or Theodred only: +1 body (to a maximum of 10).

Name: Herugrim2
Text: Unique. Weapon. +1 prowess to a maximum of 8(+2 if bearer is a warrior). Man or Dunadan warrior only: +3 prowess (to a maximum of 9) and -1 to target's body against Orcs and Wolves. Theoden or Theodred only: +1 body (to a maximum of 10).

Name: Hew the Stone
Text: Unique. Playable during the site phase at Isengard if you have three or more Ent allies there. May be played regardless of The Fortress of Isen. May not be played if you are Saruman. The company faces 3 attacks (cannot be cancelled); Wolves -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess; Orcs -- 4 strikes with 9 prowess; Flame Traps -- 2 strikes with 12 prowess. After the attacks, tap a character or Ent and the site, or discard this card. Discard The Fortress of Isen if in play. Stage versions of Isengard cannot be used, and Isengard cannot untap. This card gives full mp if you are Gandalf, Radagast, or an Elf-lord.

Name: Hidden Valour
Text: Each of your characters with a mind of three or more and which normally does not give any mp now gives 1 mp (even if you are Fallen-Gandalf or an Atani-lord); such a character must have been in active play during the organization phase this turn.

Name: Hope Renewed
Text: Playable on a company during CvCC (even after strikes are assigned), if Gates of Morning is in play and at least two characters are wounded (or taken prisoner with opponent's company). May also be played during opponent's site phase. Any of your characters at sites in the same territory as the company's current site, or any character in your hand whose home site is in the same territory, may now join the company. Each of these characters may face a strike already assigned to another character in the company.

Name: Horn of Eorl
Text: Unique. Instrument. Playable by Merry at Edoras (even if the site is tapped). Cannot be transferred during the organization phase. tap: take one Charge!, The Rohirrim, or Reunion from your discard pile to your hand. Ttap: give +3 to an influence check the bearer makes against a hero faction.

Name: Golden Hall of Edoras
Text: Playable on Edoras. Any character at Edoras and with Edoras as a home site may tap during the organization phase to bring one Horses, Noble Steed, Shadowfax, or Wild Horses from the discard pile to their play deck. Any character that taps in this fashion makes a CP. Discard this card if the site leaves active play, or when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Collar of Spikes
Text: Armor. Playble on a wolf ally or Noble Hound. -1 body to all strikes against the ally. If the ally has faced a strike from a defeated creature he gains the warrior skill (invert this card or place a token). Cannot be duplicated on a given ally.

Name: Charge!
Text: Playable before strikes are assigned on a company facing an attack not at a site (or in CvCC), if all characters in the company control a horse ally. You assign all strikes from the attack; its prowess is modified by -1 for every 3 characters not assigned a strike, and its body is modified by -1 for every 5 characters not assigned a strike. If played in CvCC, your characters receive +1 prowess against the attack.

Name: Caught and Found Guilty
Text: Prisoner. Playable on a company after a failed attack or failed influence attempt by an opponent's face up agentat their current site this turn. Tap a character and take the agent prisoner with the company (place this card with the prisoner under control of the host character). You may store the prisoner and this card for 1 mp at a Haven [H] or Free-hold [F]. If stored and your opponent is a minion player, a Fallen-wizard, or a Lord of the same race as the agent, the prisoner is considered one of his characters in play. Discard this card if the prisoner is rescued.

Name: A Friend or Three
Text: For every character in the influencing character's company, A Friend or Three gives a +1 modification to an influence check or to a corruption check made by a character in the same company.

Name: A Chance Meeting
Text: A character (even a Hobbit) may be brought into play with direct influence at any Free-hold [{F}], Border-hold [{B}], or Ruins & Lairs [{R}].

Name: Walls Behind Walls
Text: Stolen Knowledge. Playable during the site phase on a hidden site. Unless Concealed Entrance is played on the site, tap a scout at the site. Discard this card to untap the site or to discard a Concealed Entrance played on any version of the site. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Wizard's Flame
Text: Spell. Wizard only. All attacks against Wizard's company suffer a -2 modification to prowess for the rest of the turn. Wizard makes a corruption check modified by -3.

Name: Wizard's Laughter
Text: Spell. Wizard only during opponent's site phase. Automatically cancels an influence check against one of the Wizard's player's characters, followers, factions, allies, or items. Wizard makes a corruption check modified by -2. {cyan} UEP: during any player's turn if an influence attempt is made against one of your resources or characters.

Name: Thieves of Tharbad
Text: Unique. Playable at Tharbad if the influence check is greater than 13.Standard Modifications: Dunlendings (-3), if you discard an item from the company: minor item (+3), major item (+6), ring or treasure (+9). Once in play, the number to influence this faction is zero. This faction cannot be tapped if Tharbad is not a Ruins & Lairs [R]. tap: take one An Article Missing or Brigands from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: The Dunmen's Dogs
Text: Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Haven site in Dunland, if the influence check is greater than 11.Standard Modifications: character with a home site in Dunland (+2), Dunlendings (+2), Wild Hounds (+3). While not with a creature, one non-unique wolf ally is playable at Dunnish Clan-hold each turn. You may tap a character to cancel an attack from a non- unique Wolf creature against his company: place this faction with the creature under his control. The creature becomes an ally with a mind of 1, body of 7, and a prowess equal to its normal prowess minus 7; it gives no mp.

Name: Wizard's Ring
Text: Wizard only. Playable only at a Haven [{H}]. Cannot be stored, stolen, or transferred. May not be duplicated on a given Wizard. Bearer makes a corruption check when this item is played.

Name: Sceptre of Annuminas
Text: Unique. Staff. Treasure. Playable at Rivendell by Elrond or Aragorn II if Return of the King is in play. +2 EI against Dunedain. This item is worth 3 mp if The White Tree is in play at Annuminas. Cannot be stored.

Name: Rast Vorn
Text: Playable on The Worthy Hills if Beffraen or Woses of Eryn Vorn is in play. tYou may play Drughu as a minion resource on a covert company containing a Wose character. Additionally, you may play Drughu on a company at The Worthy Hills without discarding a ranger character; if you do discard a ranger character (for no other effect), you may untap The Worthy Hills. Discard if the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Wizard's River-horses
Text: Spell. Wizard only. All Nazgul events are discarded or cancels an attack against a Wizard if he is the only character in the company. Wizard makes a corruption check modified by -2.

Name: Olga-wama2
Text: Unique. Playable at Barrow-downs or Cameth Brin. Armor. Jewel. +1 body to a maximum of 8. Bearer may attach or detach any non-armor minor item he controls with Olga Wama during the organization phase (invert it or place a token); if placed with Olga Wama it gives no corruption points and cannot be used (none of its abilities apply). For each minor item attached, bearer gains +1 EI against unique Man characters and factions playable at sites in Rhudaur, Cardolan, and Dunland.

Name: Wizard's Test
Text: Spell. Wizard only, and only if a character in his company has a Gold Ring. Play to test a Gold Ring; make two rolls (or draw two #'s) and choose one result to use for the test. Wizard makes a corruption check modified by -1.

Name: Wizard's Voice
Text: Spell. Wizard only. +6 to direct influence for the Wizard for the rest of the turn. Wizard makes a corruption check modified by -3. May not be duplicated on a given Wizard.

Name: Aglarond
Text: Playable during the site phase on Glittering Caves,if you have a Dwarf with mind of 5 or more at the site. The company faces an attack (cannot be cancelled): Pukel-creature -- 2 strikes with 8 prowess. Tap a Dwarf after the attack or discard this card. All versions of Glittering Caves become a Border- hold [B] and a Dwarf-hold; all automatic- attacks are cancelled for your companies. This site is never discarded and never untaps for you. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Escaped Slaves
Text: Playable at a (tapped) Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] during the same site phase you have played Rescue Prisoners if the influence check is greater than 7. After a successful influence check against this faction, place it with the company; it may be stored for 1 mp whenever the company is at a Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F]. The race of this faction is that of your avatar (Man for Wizards). Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

Name: Olga-wama3
Text: Unique. Playable at Barrow-downs or Cameth Brin. Armor. Jewel. +1 body to a maximum of 8. Bearer may attach or detach any non-armor minor item he controls with Olga Wama during the organization phase (invert it or place a token); if placed with Olga Wama it gives no corruption points and cannot be used (none of its abilities apply). For each minor item attached, bearer gains +1 EI against unique Man characters and factions playable at sites in Rhudaur, Cardolan, and Dunland.

Name: Amon Anwar
Text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a moving company that can legally move to Rohan. This card is used as a site card: Free-hold [F] in Rohan (draw: 1/1). During the site phase here you may tap Red Arrow or discard Oaths You Have Taken from hand (for no effect) to invert this card. If inverted, place this card in your mp instead of discarding it: it is worth 1 mp and whenever one of your Dunedain taps to support one of your Man characters with a home site in Greater Gondor (or vice versa) he give +2 to his prowess or CP (instead of +1). Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Beechbone
Text: Unique. Ent. Playable at any non-Haven site in Fangorn. When Beechbone becomes wounded, all other Ents in his company receive +3 prowess that turn and may face automatic-attacks and hazards keyed to the site. Discard Beechbone if his company moves to a site not in: Fangorn, Gap of Isen, Enedhwaith, Wold & Foothills, Redhorn Gate, or Misty Mountains - Southern Spur.

Name: Captain of the Guard
Text: Playable on a warrior with a mind of four or more at his home site. +1 to his mind and prowess. Target character becomes a leader. If you have a unique faction in play at his home site, he may tap to take one All the Bells Ringing, Engines of Defence, Incite Defenders, or Town Guard from your discard pile to your hand. Discard if target character moves to a site that is not in the same region as his home site (or region adjacent) and/or is not adjacent to his home site. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Cast aside Regret and Fear
Text: Spell. Wizard only. Playable during the organization phase, if your opponent is a Fallen-wizard or minion and his avatar is in play. Place this card on another character in your Wizard's company, or bring Denethor II or Theoden into play (if at their home site; from your hand or discard pile) under the Wizard's EI with this card. Both your and opponent's avatar now make a CP in turns (your Wizard going first), modifying the CP each round by an additional -1, untill one of them fails. A failed CP only results in tapping the avatar (if untapped; ignore any other effect). If your Wizard fails, discard this card. Otherwise, discard any corruption or disease on target character. +1 to his body. Cannot be duplicated on a given character. Wizard makes a CP modified by -3.

Name: Keeping of Good Faith
Text: Playable on a hazard creature with an asterisk (*) and with one strike for each of its attacks, attacking a non-overt company. All attacks are cancelled and the creature becomes an ally under the control of any character in the company that taps. Keep this card with the creature. The ally has a mind of 1, prowess equal to its normal prowess minus 7, and a body as listed on its card (8 if none is listed). This card is worth ally mp as listed on the creature's card.Alternatively, may be played as a short-event to cancel a detainment attack against a hero company.

Name: Fiefdom Reclaimed
Text: Playable if you have Raid on Umbar in play and neither Black Numenoreans nor Cult of the Dark Lord are in play. You may bring Umbarean Corsairs and Black Numenoreans from your sideboard to your deck; you may play these factions at Umbar as hero factions. Additionally, you need not play or discard The White Council to play The King's Men at sites in Hyrmenfalas or its adjacent regions.

Name: Leaf Brooch
Text: Only playable at Lorien. If a non-special item must be discarded from the company of Leaf Brooch's bearer (according to any hazard or resource effect), you may discard Leaf Brooch instead to fulfill this requirement.

Name: First Settlers
Text: Playable on a site with Rebuild the Town. Choose a race: Dwarf, Elf, Hobbit, Dunadan, or Man; the territory containing target site must contain a hold of the chosen race. Once per phase, you may tap a character at the site and make a roll (considered an influence attempt), adding the character's unused EI and +3 if he is a diplomat; if the result is greater than 7, rotate this card 90deg (or place a token). If rotated 270deg, place this card in your mp; it is considered a faction of the chosen race and gives 2 faction mp. Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

Name: Old Grudge
Text: All Dwarves in play receive +1 prowess against Orcs (+2 for Longbeards), Trolls, Drakes and Dragons (+2 for Ironfists). Discard this card when an attack of these types is defeated by a company containing at least one Dwarf. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Mornaugrim
Text: Unique. Playable at Mines of Angurath if the influence check is greater than 10.Standard Modifications: Dwarves (+3), overt and hero characters (-3), any one Orc faction in play at a site in Mordor or its adjacent regions (-3). This faction is worth 4 mp if you have a Dwarven Ring in active play. tap: take one Dark Forges, Reforging or The Iron-pit from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Miner's Pick
Text: Weapon. +1 to the company's Under-deeps movement rolls. +1 prowess to a maximum of 4. A Hobbit cannot use this item.

Name: Mighty Was the Fallen
Text: Playable on a company if a character from the company worth 2 mp or more has been eliminated this turn (not by a CP). Discard this card if the company contains less than 2 characters. Store this card when the company is at one of your Havens [H]; it is worth 1 mp. Cannot be duplicated for an eliminated character.

Name: Lock nor Bar May Hinder
Text: Playable during the organization phase on a company with a character controlling Rescue Prisoners. You may bring one character into play with the company, regardless of the company's current site, the presence of an avatar, or the one character per turn limit. The character may be taken from your hand or discard pile.

Name: Kingdom of Old Restored
Text: Playable on a site where you have defeated an at home Dragon manifestation or you have Return to Old Dwellings in play. +3 to your GI. The site become a Border-hold [B] and a Dwarf- hold. While you have a Dwarf at the site, rotate this card 90deg (or place a token) during your end-of-turn phase. This card is worth 1 mp for each time rotated (to a maximum of 8), reduced by the number of factions (and cards played on these) any opponent has in play at sites in the same territory (or in an adjacent region) as target site. Discard this card if it is worth less than -1 mp, or if the site is a Ruins & Lairs [R]. This card is worth full mp to a Dwarf-lord player. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Khazadshathur
Text: Unique. Helmet. Playable at Goblin-gate. +2 body to a maximum of 9. +1 EI against Dwarves. Dwarf only: Cancels all dark enchantments targeting bearer or any cards he controls. tap: +3 to bearer's prowess against a non-combat attack.

Name: Ironfists
Text: Unique. Playable at Nurunkhizdin, or at Mount Gundabad if Return to Old Dwellings is played on the site if the influence check is greater than 11Standard Modifications: Ironfist Dwarf (+3), Longbeard Dwarf (-3) tap: make a non-unique ore resource playable at the above named sites this turn.

Name: All the Bells Ringing
Text: Playable during opponent's site phase before strikes are assigned at a Free-hold or Border-hold if a minion company attacks. Attack is canceled and the minion company must face all automatic-attacks - which attack normally, not as detainment. Afterwards, the minion company may attack the hero company again.

Name: Alliance of Free Peoples
Text: If at least one hero Dwarf, Elf and Man faction is in play, all hero Dwarf, hero Elf and hero Man factions give +1 MP. Discard when any hero Dwarf, Elf or Man faction is discard from play. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Angmarim
Text: Unique. Manifestation of minion Angmarim. Playable at Carn Dum if the influence check is greater than 11 (Muster has no effect). Modifications: Wizards (-5), Men (+1)

Name: Biter and Beater!
Text: Playable on a company facing an Orc attack or in combat with an overt company. Also playable during opponent's site phase. Every Sword of Gondolin, Orcrist, and Glamdring in target company give an additional +2 prowess bonus and lower the body of strikes their bearers face by 1.

Name: Bow of the Galadhrim
Text: Unique. Bow. If bearer is an Elf Warrior in company vs. company combat, make a roll for each non-unique minion ally in the opposing company. If the result for an ally is greater than the ally's mind plus five, discard the ally.

Name: Drughu
Text: Playable on a hero company during your organization phase if you discard a ranger from your hand. All characters in company receive +2 prowess against attacks keyed to Wilderness regions and during combat at Ruins and Lairs. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Farmer Maggot
Text: Unique. If your company faces an attack while at a site in The Shire, Arthedain, or Cardolan, you may immediately replace its site card with another site in The Shire, Arthedain, or Cardolan. If your company takes this option, the attack is canceled and this card is discarded.

Name: Glamour of Surpassing Excellance
Text: Playable on a company at a Free-hold or Border-hold. Make a roll for each hazard permanent-event on characters in the company. Discard each hazard whose roll is greater than the number normally needed to remove it as printed on the card (ignoring all modifiers and conditions). If no number is given, the permanent-event is discarded if the result is greater than 8.

Name: Haradrim
Text: Unique. Manifestation of minion Haradrim. Playable at Southron Oasis if the influence check is greater than 9. Modifications: Wizards (-5), Dunedain (-2), Elves (-2), Dwarves (-2).

Name: Jewel of Beleriand
Text: Hoard Item. Jewel. Tap this item and make a roll - if the result is greater than 6, the bearer untaps if tapped. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Mount Slain
Text: Playable during any player's turn if a strike against one of your companies from a Ringwraith or Nazgul creature fails. If still in active play following its body check, discard the Ringwraith.

Name: No Strangers at this Time
Text: Playable during the site phase on a Free-hold or Border-hold if you've played a faction there. This site is never discarded and never untaps. All detainment attacks at this site against minion companies attack normally. Against minion companies, this site has an additional automatic-attack; an exact copy, including all modifications, of the first auto-attack listed on its card.

Name: Nurniags
Text: Unique. Manifestation of minion Nurniags. Playable at Nurniag Camp if the influence check is greater than 13 (Muster has no effect). Modifications: Wizards (-5), Men (+1).

Name: Origin of Stone
Text: Command. Playable on a Dwarf leader during the organization phase. Return all other command cards on target leader to your hand when this card is played. -2 to leader's EI (to a minimum of 0). +1 prowess to all Dwarves in his company and +1 to the company's Under-deeps movement rolls. You may return this card to your hand during your organization phase. Cannot be duplicated in a given company.

Name: Pale Enchanted Gold
Text: Hoard item. Treasure. Playable at any tappedor untapped site that contains a hoard. Discard this item to cancel a detainment attack by Elves or any one attack by Dwarves or Men against the company. Alternatively, discard to give +4 to an influence attempt against a Dwarf or Man character, ally or faction. Dragon-sickness may be played on the bearer of this item.

Name: Pipe
Text: Unless bearer is an Elf he may tap during the end-of- turn phase and make a CP to bring one Longbottom Leaf, Old Toby, Pipe Weed or Smoke Rings from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle. If bearer is Gandalf or Saruman, you may take one of these cards to your hand instead.

Name: Pipe Weed
Text: Playable on a non-Elf character bearing a Pipeor with a home site in Eriador. Tap the character. You may look at the top five cards of your play deck and place them back on top in any order you choose. Character makes a CP (modified by -2 if a Hobbit).

Name: Await the Advent of Allies
Text: Playable on a non-Wizard character with a mind of six or less. Character must stay at its current non-Haven site until you play a card at the site. Target character does not count against general influence and its marshalling points do not count. Discard this card when you play a resource at the site, the character is discarded, or the character is wounded. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Armory
Text: Only you and your companies can use Armory. You may place any minor items from your hand under Armory during your organization phase. A character at a Haven can store a minor item under Armory instead of to your marshalling point pile. When you otherwise would be allowed to play a minor item from your hand at a Border-hold, Free-hold, or Haven, you may play an item from under Armory instead. If you have at least three minor items under Armory, gain 1 marshalling point.

Name: Ancient Stair
Text: Playable only at the end of the organization phase on a company that starts its turn at an untapped adjacent site of an Under-deeps site. Opponent may draw up to twice the normal number of cards for this company during the movement/hazard phase. If company moved to an Under-deep site, at the end of the turn the company may replace its site card with the site card at which it began the turn.

Name: An Unexpected Party
Text: Only playable during the organization phase on a company. There is no limit to the size of this company. Dwarves with a mind of 2 or less in this company do not require influence to be controlled; and there is no limit to how many Dwarves may be brought into play on a given turn with the company. Discard this card if the company has more than one non-Wizard character with a mind greater than 5 or more than two non-Dwarf characters or no Dwarf with a mind greater than 5. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Aiglos
Text: Unique.  Two-handed. Playable at any Under-deep Dark-hold or Shadow-hold. Weapon. Warrior only: +2 prowess (+5 if Doors of Night is in play) (to a maximum of 11); +1 body (to a maximum of 10); -2 to target's body; +3 direct influence against Elves and Elf factions.

Name: Annayulma3
Text: Unique. Treasure. Playable at Goblin-gate.tap allow bearer's company to be affected by Healing of Nimrodel if either starting or site of destination is a Haven [H] as long as the company is attempting to move through a Wilderness [w]. Annayulma does not untapped normally, but only if a sage bearer taps at a Haven [H] or if Enchanted Stream or River is played against bearer's company.

Name: Without a Glance of Longing
Text: Playable on a company. Any CP made by characters in the company from attempts to play or transfer items, or from storing items or events are modified by +2 this turn. Cannot be duplicated on a given company in a given turn.

Name: What Have I Got in My Pocket?
Imagefile: What Have I Got in My Pocket.jpg
Text: Riddling attempt. Playable during the site phase on a character at the same site as one of opponent's companies. Tap the character. Opponent chooses a character from his company for this riddling attempt. Each player makes a riddling roll, modified by +2 if his character is a sage and by +2 if a Hobbit (re-roll ties). The player with the highest result wins: he names an item (not a unique item already in play) and the other player reveals his hand. If the item is revealed the winner may immediately play a copy of the item with the riddling character from his hand, discard pile or sideboard (this does not tap the site); loser discards the revealed item.

Name: We Must Away
Text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a moving company that contains at least two Dwarves. Untap all characters in the company. The company may move an additional region this turn (to a maximum of 6). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: War Mattock
Text: Weapon. Two-handed. Warrior only: +2 prowess to a maximum of 8 (if bearer is a Dwarf, +3 prowess against Trolls to a maximum of 9). This item is worth 2 mp if played as a hero resource.

Name: Orc-mail
Text: Playable on a company containing only Hobbits and/or Dwarves. Company may not be attacked by an overt company. If an overt company at the same site as the target company moves, you may replace your opponents site with your copy of the minion company's new site. At the start of each of your opponent's site phases, make a roll. If the result plus the number of minion characters at the same site is greater than 12, discard this card.

Name: Value Food and Cheer
Text: Playable on a character. Tap character if untapped. +2 to any rolls to remove hazards played on target character (+5 if you discard a food item from the company, for no other effect).

Name: Swordmaster
Text: Sage only. Playable during the site phase on a sage at a site where Information is playable. Tap the sage and the site. The sage gains the warrior skill. If he is already a warrior, he can use two weapons (or a two-handed weapon and a shield); both modifiers count. If he uses two weapons, he cannot use a shield. May not be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Songs of the Old
Text: Dwarf only. Song. Untap all instrument items inthe company. Additionally, you may take an instrument item playable at the Dwarf's current site from your discard pile to your hand. If the Dwarf is at an Ancient Dwarf-ruin and bears an instrument, you may take one Dwarf only or Dwarf-lord only resource (not Songs of the Old) from your discard pile to your hand instead.

Name: Shimmer of Hope
Text: Playable on a company at an Under-deeps surface site which is a Ruins & Lairs [R], Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]. The company may either move an additional region when moving this turn, or you may discard as many corruption cards from characters in the company as there are strikes in the site's first automatic-attack. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

Name: Return to Old Dwellings
Text: Playable during the site phase on an ancient Dwarf-ruin with an automatic-attack. The company faces all automatic-attacks again, with +2 to prowess and strikes. Afterwards, opponent may search his sideboard, play deck or discard pile for a creature playable at the site, which attacks the company. None of these attacks may be cancelled. After these attacks, tap a Dwarf in the company or discard this card. The site becomes a Ruins & Lairs [R]. All its automatic-attacks have their number of strikes reduced to one; discard any Invade Their Domain in play at the site. The site does not leave active play until this card is discarded. Discard this card if any opponent plays a minion faction or Invade Their Domain at the site. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Restored to Its Owner
Text: Playable on a hero item that can be stored at a specific site or hold, or that has a race specific bonus or ability. Target item may be stored at the mentioned site(s), or at a hold of the race for which it gives a bonus or ability; if stored there it yields mp as if borne by a character of the hold's race (even to a Lord-player).

Name: Reconquest of Khazad-dum
Text: Playable if you have Halls of Khazad-dum in play. Balrog players must use the minion version for Moria. Invert this card if one of your companies has defeated a manifestation of Balrog of Moria: it is worth 5 mp and all versions of Moria become a Free-hold [F] and a Dwarf-hold; replace all automatic-attacks with: Dwarves -- 4 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against hero companies; cancelled against your companies). Discard this card if Halls of Khazad-dum is not in play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Ravens of Northern Rhovanion
Text: Unique. Playable at any site in Northern Rhovanion if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Carc or Roac the Raven is in the company (+3). Longbeard Dwarves and characters with home site Dale or Lake-town may play this faction at a tapped site. tap: give +2 to an influence check against a hero faction playable at a site in Northern Rhovanion, Southern Rhovanion, Dorwinion or Iron Hills.

Name: Profitable Trade
Text: Place this card in your mpp. Any unique faction you have in play (except Animal, overt and special factions) may be placed with this card. If there is a faction with this card, any additional factions must have been played at different sites in the same or an adjacent region (or in the same territory). This card is worth 2 mp if there are at least 3 factions of different race placed with it.

Name: Pocket Handkerchief
Text: May not be included with a starting company (unless it contains a Hobbit). Discard this item to cancel any effect that would return the bearer to your hand this turn (or would discard him, if bearer is a Hobbit).

Name: Pity Mixed with Horror
Text: Playable on a character. Target character must make a CP for each corruption card he controls; after each successful CPC discard the corruption card. This card may also be played as a hazard.

Name: Three Guesseses
Text: When making a riddling roll, make three rolls modified by -2 and choose one of the results to use. May also be played during your opponent's site phase, if a riddling roll is called for.

Name: Balance Between Powers
Text: Environment. No environment cards can be played. At the start of your organization phase, discard this card or keep it in play by discarding an environment card form your hand. Your opponent can then discard an environment card from his hand to discard this card, which you can counter by discarding two environment cards from your hand, which he can counter by discarding one, which you can counter with two, he with one, etc. Discard when any play deck is exhausted.

Name: Petty-dwarves
Text: Unique. Manifestation of minion Petty-dwarves. Playable at The Worthy Hills if influence check is greater than 10. Modifications: Elves (-2), Dwarves (+2).

Name: Safe from the Shadow
Text: Hero characters may store resources (items and events) during the end-of-turn phase. Cannot be duplicated. Discard when any play deck is exhausted.

Name: Clan Bonds
Text: Dwarf characters (even agents) may be brought into play at any Dwarf-hold where one of your companies is present. Additionally, Balrog of Moria is considered an at home Dragon manifestation for the purpose of playing and interpreting Legendary Hoard.

Name: Clad in Chain-shirts
Text: Command. Playable on a Dwarf leader during the organization phase. Return all other command cards on target leader to your hand when this card is played. -2 to leader's EI (to a minimum of 0). All Dwarves in his company receive +1 body, and +2 prowess against non-combat attacks (Traps, Rock Fall etc.). You may return this card to your hand during any organization phase. Cannot be duplicated in a given company.

Name: Children of Aule
Text: +1 body to all Dwarves in play. Additionally, all Under-deeps movement rolls are modified by adding the number of Dwarves of different descent (one for each type) in the moving company. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Carc
Text: Unique. Animal. Flying. Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Haven site in Northern Rhovanion. A Longbeard Dwarf may tap and play Carc from the discard pile. Place Carc in your sideboard to make Information playable at his current site in Northern Rhovanion, Southern Rhovanion, Iron Hills, or Dorwinion. tap: cancel a strike (not from an automatic-attack) against himself.

Name: Bilbo's Magic Ring
Text: Unique. Ring. Manifestation of The One Ring. Playable at The Under-grottos if Gollum is not in play. May also be played after a failed attack from My Precious (instead of playing Gollum), if you tap a warrior, a scout, and a ranger in the company. +3 prowess, +3 body (to a maximum of 10), and +3 EI. +1 corruption point to every character in the bearer's company and/or at his site. You cannot play any resource that would allow you to win the game (e.g. A New Ringlord), except Gollum's Fate. This item may be tested as if a gold ring; discard when tested and make a roll to see which ring may be played: any unique ring (9+); any non-unique ring (any result).

Name: Bears of the Carrock
Text: Unique. Playable at Beorn's House or The Carrock if the influence check is greater than 9.Standard Modifications: character with home site Beorn's House or Ligr Wodaize Berne (+3), Beornings (+2). Beorning Skin-changers cannot be played as an event against your companies. When you play Beorning Skin-changers as a creature, you may rotate this card 90deg (or place a token). This faction gives +1 mp for each time rotated (to a maximum of 4 mp total).

Name: Battle-axe of the Fallen
Text: Unique. Playable at Ruins of Belegost or Ruins of Nogrod if the company discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. Weapon. Axe. +1 EI. Warrior only: +3 prowess to a maximum of 9 (if borne by a Dwarf, +5 prowess against Spawn, Dragons and Drakes to a maximum of 11). Dwarf leader or Firebeard only: double the effects of The Dwarves Are upon You! for Firebeard Dwarves in the company.

Name: Attercop! Attercop!
Text: Song. Playable on a Hobbit facing a strike from an Animal, Awakened Plant, Spider, or Wolf attack. The Hobbit receives +5 prowess against the strike. tIf untapped after the strike, he may immediately tap to face a strike already assigned to another character in his company. Any resulting body check after this strike is modified by +1.

Name: At Your Service!
Text: Dwarf only. One influence check by a Dwarf is modified by adding half his mind value (round up). Negative modifications for his race are cancelled. Afterwards, if the check is successful you may remove one hazard permanent-event from the influencing character. Cannot be duplicated on an influence attempt.

Name: A More or Less Decent Giant
Imagefile: A More or Less Decent Giant.jpg
Text: Giant. Playable at any tapped or untapped non- Haven, non-Dark-hold site in High Pass or a mountain region, with a company containing a diplomat. For non-combat attacks his base prowess in considered to be 10. Only one A More or Less Decent Giant may be in a given company.

Name: Mithrandir
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Gandalf. Playable on a non-overt company without avatar. You may play spells on the company as if on Gandalf (except True Fana): ignore any required CP. Discard this card when you play Sacrifice of Form: place Sacrifice of Form in your mp. Additionally, when the company moves to a Shadow- hold [S] or Dark-hold [D], opponent must reveal to you 3 hazards from his hand (or else his whole hand). Discard this card when Gandalf enters play or you have 10 P or more. Invert this card during your untap phase; if inverted, discard this card at the end of your turn.

Name: Goblin-basher
Text: Unique. Grey agent. Manifestation of Beorn.+2 prowess against Orcs. -1 to all of his CP. Agent only: may attack an overt company at a Shadow-hold [S] (the attack is not detainment). If an Orc, Wolf, or Animal hazard creature is played against a company at or moving to a site in the same region as his current site (or region adjacent), you may automatically transfer Goblin-basher to this site (even if you have the site in active play).

Name: Durin's Crown
Text: Unique. Helmet. Treasure. Playable at a Dragon's lair where an at home manifestation of a Dragon is in play (or has been defeated), or at Moria if a manifestation of Balrog of Moria is in play (or has been defeated). +1 body. +3 EI against Dwarves. If bearer is not a Dwarf, during the organization phase he must face an attack by a Dwarf character at his current site (if available; opponent's choice; as if CvCC between one-character companies). Place a stored Reforging with this item to "restore" it. If restored, values in parenthesis apply. tap: during your organization phase at a Free-Hold [F], Border-Hold [B], or Ruins & Lairs [R] to bring a Dwarf into play under bearer's EI. The character may come from your hand or discard pile. Bearer makes a CP.

Name: Ancient Burial Site
Text: Playable during the site phase at a Ruins & Lairs [R]. Hoard minor items may be played at the site. If the site has an Undead automatic-attack, you may also play gold ring items. If Banishment is played on the site, you may play hoard major items.

Name: To Fealty Sworn
Text: Playable on a Hobbit: in the same company as Return of the King or during the same site phase his company plays a unique hero faction at a Free-hold (not Bag End). The Hobbit gains the warrior skill, +2 prowess, and +5 direct influence against the Hobbits faction and characters with Bag End as a home site. Cannot be duplicated on a given Hobbit.

Name: Show Things Unbidden
Text: Playable during the organization phase on Galadriel if untapped and at Lorien. Tap Galadriel. Opponent must choose and reveal to you 3 non-environment hazards from his hand and shuffle them into his play deck. If these are not available, opponent must reveal his hand to you and shuffle all non-environment hazards there into his play deck.

Name: Rumours of Rings
Text: During your organization phase, you may take one ring special item (except for The One Ring) from your sideboard or discard pile and place it "off to the side" with this card. This item gives no marshalling points. A maximum of two items may be with this card at one time. You may play a ring special item placed with this card as though it were in your hand. You may start the game with this card in lieu of playing a minor item.

Name: Longbottom Leaf
Text: Take up to two resources from your sideboard to your play deck and reshuffle. Remove this card from the game.

Name: Elven Rope
Text: Tap Elven Rope and a ranger bearer during your organization phase to allow his company to move an additional region. Instead of eliminating a creature the bearer's company defeated (with a normal prowess less than 11), you may place the creature's card with Elven Rope. Discard the creature if Elven Rope's bearer becomes wounded. If stored with a creature, the creature stays with Elven Rope and you receive three miscellaneous marshalling points. Otherwise, the creature has no effect on play.

Name: Crept Along Carefully
Text: Playable on a company during the organization phase. The company cannot use starter movement or move to an Under-deeps site. In addition, if they move with region movement, they are limited in all cases to 3 regions maximum and their hazard limit is reduced by one (to a minimum of two). Discard this card from play and make a roll to attempt to cancel an attack against them by an opponent's company. If the roll plus the number of rangers in the company is greater than 7, the attack is canceled. Discard when any play deck is exhausted or, if you choose, during your organization phase.

Name: Kori
Text: Unique. Firebeard. Grey agent. +1 prowess against Orcs and Trolls. Agent only: May use Under-deeps movement. tap: if at a company's new site to create an additional automatic-attack at the site this turn: Traps -- 2 strikes with 9 prowess. This is considered an agent action. tap: if at a company's new site to prevent that company from moving again this turn. This is considered an agent action.

Name: Crystals of Bilak-Khald
Text: Ore. Playable during the site phase at Mines of Falek-dim or The Sulfur-deeps on a Dwarf or on an Orc bearing Miner's Pick. Tap the character. While on target character, make a roll during the untap phase; if the result is less than 5, target character must make a body check modified by +2. If target character is at a Haven [H,K] or Dwarf-hold, he or a sage in the company may tap to place this card with a Dwarven Light-stone, Goblin Earth-plumb or Noldo-lantern in the company. If placed with an item, any bonus the item gives is doubled.

Name: Dawn Take You All!
Text: Ritual. Playable after strikes are assigned in CvCC (but before resolving strikes) on a sage in a company at a non-Under-deeps, non-surface siteC, if Gates of Morning is in play. Tap the sage. All unwounded Trolls at the same site are immediately wounded (no body checks are required); Half-trolls and Olog-hai are not wounded but tapped instead (if untapped) and receive -2 prowess until the end of the turn. Sage makes a CP modified by -2.

Name: Desperate Strike
Text: Warrior only. +4 prowess and -1 body againsta strike; -2 to the strike's body. Cannot be played on a wounded character. After the attack, wound the character if not wounded (no body check is required).

Name: Dry Tunnels
Text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a moving company. If the company uses Under-deeps movement this turn, River cannot be played on the company's new site.Additionally, when The Way Is Shut affects the company make a roll: if result is greater than 7 the effects are cancelled. The Reach of Ulmo cancels any ongoing effect of this card.

Name: Spies Feared
Text: Scout or Ranger only. Playable on a Shadow-hold if one of your scouts is there or on a Ruins and Lairs if one of your rangers is there. An additional automatic-attack is created at the site against minion companies: Orcs - 5 strikes at 8 (detainment). Additionally all auto-attacks at the site are duplicated (including the new one) against all companies. Discard when site is discarded or returned to your location deck.

Name: The Ithil-stone
Text: Unique. Palantir. Playable at Barad-dur. When character taps to play the Ithil-stone, make a roll. If the result plus the number of scouts in the company is greater than 9, the Ithil-stone is successfully played. Otherwise, the bearer is eliminated and the Ithil-stone is placed in your out-of-play pile. Bear makes a corruption check at the end of each of his untap phases. Bane of the Ithil-stone is discarded and cannot be played. If the Lidless Eye is in play, its player's hand size decreases by 2.

Name: The Sun Unveiled
Text: Playable on a character at a Free-hold if Gates of Morning is in play. Remove all hazard permanent-events on the character and, if tapped, untap him.

Name: Tower Raided
Text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped Shadow-hold if your company: bears an item worth at least 2 MP, contains an untapped scout, and discards for no effect a Stolen Knowledge card it controls. Tap the site and discard the item. Company faces an attack: Orcs - 4 strikes at 8. By the end of the site phase, tap a scout n the company or discard this card. If this card is not discarded, all versions of this site are now considered Ruins and Lairs, and no factions are playable there. Discard when site is discarded or returned to your location deck.

Name: Wain-easterlings
Text: Unique. Manifestation of minion Wain-easterlings. Playable at Easterling Camp if influence check is greater than 8. Modifications: Wizard (-5), Dunedain (-2).

Name: Woses of the Eryn Vorn
Text: Unique. Manifestation of minion Woses of Eryn Vorn. Playable at The Worthy Hills if influence check is greater than 10.

Name: Hunting Orcs
Text: Each player may take one Wondrous Maps from his sideboard to his hand during the end-of-turn phase. Additionally, Wondrous Maps can be played if the last region is a Dark-domain [d] or a Wilderness [w]. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Hoard Gathering
Text: Choose one of the following types when you play this card: hoard, ore, ring or treasure. If you have stored at least three different resources of the chosen type, this card is worth a third of the normal mp total of these stored resources (round down any fractions; to a minimum of 1; each stored resource may count only towards one copy of this card). This card is worth full mp to a Dwarf-lord player.

Name: His Beard Long and Forked
Text: Playable on a Dwarf with a mind of five or more (four or more if a Longbeard). Target character becomes a leader and may tap to untap a Dwarf in his company. You may start the game with this card in lieu of a minor item.

Name: Halls of Khazad-dum
Text: Playable during the site phase on Moria, if you have Return to Old Dwellings in play there and a company containinga Dwarf majority. The company faces 3 attacks (cannot be cancelled): Orcs -- 5 strikes with 8 prowess; Orcs -- 3 strikes with 11 prowess; Troll -- 1 strike with 14 prowess; Following these attacks, tTatap a Dwarf with mind 5 or more in the company or discard this card. Discard any Invade Their Domain played on Moria. Moria becomes a Border- hold [B]. Discard this card if Invade Their Domain is played successfully on Moria, or if the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Power Against the Shadow
Text: Playable during your opponent's site phase on a company being attack by a minion company. All heroes receive +3 prowess until the end of the turn. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Gimli's Axe
Text: Unique. Playable on a Dwarven Axe borne byGimli. +1 to Gimli's prowess. You may always assign strikes to Gimli regardless of his status. Discard if the Dwarven Axe is not borne by Gimli.

Name: Fungi
Text: Food item. Playable by a Dwarf or Orc atany tapped or untapped non-Dark-hold Under-deeps site. If the company moves with Under-deeps movement, discard Fungi at the end of the movement/hazard phase to immediately take another movement/hazard phase; you may untap one character in the company.

Name: Fortress Reclaimed
Text: Playable on a site if Rebuild the Town or Hold Rebuilt and Repaired is played on it. This card overrides any conflicting hazards and/or resources. You may play at the site a faction (not a Dragon or Animal faction) normally playable at a site in the same region as target site (or region adjacent): the influence attempt is modified by -2. If you have played a faction here, an additional automatic- attack is created at any other version of the site: same type as the faction -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if the company is of the same alignment). Discard this card during your end-of-turn phase if the site is a Ruins & Lairs [R]. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Dwarven Fire
Text: Technology. Playable by a Dwarf sage at atapped or untapped Dwarf-hold. If stored, you may discard this item at any time to create an additional automatic-attack this turn at any version of a Dwarf-hold site you have in active play: Lava Flow -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess. Body checks for characters that do not bear any armor, helmet or shield are modified by +1. Only one Dwarven Fire may be so discarded on a given turn.

Name: Dwarven Cunning
Text: Playable as a permanent-event on a site, if your opponent is not of the same alignment. Tap a Dwarf in your company at the site. The company must now face all of the site's automatic-attacks (if any). This card creates an additional automatic-attack at any other version of the site: Traps -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess. The site does not leave active play until this card is discarded. Discard this card after its associated attack has been faced. Alternatively, playable as a short-event on a Dwarf: tap the Dwarf to cancel a Trap attack against his company or to discard Concealed Entrance at his site.

Name: Dwarven Chain-shirt
Text: Armor. Playable at any tapped or untapped site where you have successfully influenced a Dwarf faction or brought into play a Dwarf character this turn. May also be played during the organization phase (tap the site if untapped). +1 body to a maximum of 8.

Name: Dwarven Axe
Text: Weapon. Warrior only: +2 prowess (to a maximum of 7; +3 prowess if bearer is a Dwarf, to a maximum of 8). If bearer is a minion or overt character, this item gives 3 corruption points.

Name: Dwarven Art of War
Text: Command. Playable on a Dwarf leader during the organization phase. -2 to leader's EI (to a minimum of 0). +1 to all CP by Dwarves in his company bearing a battle-gear item (+2 if a hoard item). You may return this card to your hand during any organization phase. Cannot be duplicated in a given company.

Name: Dwarven Armoury
Text: Playable if you have at least two Dwarves in play. Place up to three of the following items under this card from your hand, sideboard or discard pile when you play this card: Dwarven Chain- shirt, Miner's Pick, or Shield of Iron-bound Ash. You may discard this card to place these items with any of your characters at the same Dwarf-hold (only one item per character; discard any unplaced items); you need not tap the characters nor the site.

Name: Dwarf-friend
Text: Playable on a character at a Dwarf-hold (not a Dwarf, Wizard, Ringwraith or overt character). Target character receives +2 EI against Dwarves. He suffers no negative modifications according to his race when attempting to influence Dwarf factions. Additionally, target character is also considered a Dwarf for the purpose of non-environment, non-item cards and effects. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Durang
Text: Ore. Playable at any tapped or untapped Under-deeps site by a Dwarven Miner or Goblin-miner (or any character bearing a Miner's Pick). Discard this card at an Orc-hold to make Dark Forges playable. or at a Dwarf-hold to make Reforging playable (as if Information were playable at the site).

Name: Gandalf's Staff
Text: Unique. Playable on a staff borne by Gandalf. Discard if the staff is not borne by Gandalf. Gandalf makes a CP when this card taps. tap: at the end of the organization phase to reduce the hazard limit for Gandalf's company by 1 (to a minimum of 2) if moving to a new site this turn. tap: at any time to give +2 to Gandalf's prowess and body against a strike.

Name: First among Equals
Text: Unique. Playable only on Aragorn II, Strider, or Thorongil, if he bears Narsil or a Palantir. You may shuffle one command card from your sideboard into your play deck when you play this card. Target character becomes a leader.+1 to his CP while he bears one of these items. +2 EI against characters. Discard this card if a character in his company is eliminated by a CP or you have Return of the King in play.

Name: Barrow-blade
Text: Tap the bearer of a Dagger of Westernesse during the site phase at a Ruins & Lairs and play this with the Dagger. Dagger receives +1 prowess (+3 versus Undead and Nazgul). Cannot be duplicated on a given Dagger.

Name: Crown of Flowers
Text: Environment. Crown of Flowers has no effect until you play a resource with it. You can play one resource from your hand with this card. The resource is considered to be played and to be in play as though Gates of Morning were in play and Doors of Night were not. Crown of Flowers does not affect the interpretation of any card except the resource played with it. Discard Crown of Flowers when the resource is discarded. Discard the resource if Crown of Flowers is discarded.

Name: Putting away All Fear
Text: Unique. Playable on a company at or moving to asite in a Dark-domain [d]. Discard all corruption cards played on characters in the company. Make a roll for each environment hazard in play; discard each if the result is greater than 8. This card and its effects cannot be cancelled.

Name: Raid on Umbar
Text: Unique. Playable during the site phase at Umbar, if you discard a Stolen Knowledge card from the company. Discard if you do not have more factions in play at sites in Gondor than any opponent has at sites in Hyrmenfalas and its adjacent regions. The company faces two attacks (cannot be cancelled): Men -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess; Men -- 2 strikes with 9 prowess. Afterwards, tap a character in the company to place Raid on Umbar in your mp, or discard this card. Factions in play at Umbar give 1 less mp (to minimum of 1) and any Pirates and Corsairs of Umbar receive -2 prowess.

Name: Rammas Pelennor
Text: Playable if you have a faction in play at Minas Tirith. All overt companies moving through Anorien face an attack: Men -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess. All automatic-attacks against minion companies at Minas Tirith receive +1 prowess and +1 strike for each faction in play at Minas Tirith. All hero characters receive +2 prowess during CvCC at Minas Tirith. Discard if you have no factions in play at Minas Tirith, or if Smoke on the Wind or People Diminished is played on Minas Tirith. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Reunited Kingdom
Text: Unique. Playable if you have either Return of the King or both Steward of Gondor and Rangers of the North in play. This card gives 1 mp for every Rebuild the Town you have in play at sites in Arthedain (or at port sites in Cardolan). Beacon of Gondor may be played on any Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F] in Arthedain or Cardolan: such site is never discarded or returned to the location deck. If Rebuild the Town is in play at Annuminas, Choice of Luthien is not discarded as per its card text while Arwen is in a company with Aragorn II and at or moving to a site in Eriador. This card is worth full mp to an Atani-lord. Discard if the conditions to play this card are not met.

Name: Ring of Barahir
Text: Unique. Ring. Playable by Cirdan, Elrond, or a Dunadan with a home site in Eriador, at a site where the Lossoth faction is playable. May also be played at Rivendell by Elrond, Arwen, or Aragorn II, if manifestations of these three characters and the Lossoth faction are in play. When you play this item you may bring Choice of Luthien or one Choose a Mortal Life from your sideboard or discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle). Cannot be stored, stolen or transferred.tap: cancel a Dragon or Drake creature attack and put the creature's card back into its player's hand.

Name: Ring of Barahir2
Text: Unique. Ring. Only playable by Cirdan, Elrond, or a Dunadan with a home site in Eriador, at a site where the Lossoth faction is playable; also playable at Rivendell by Elrond, Arwen, or Aragorn II, if these three characters and the Lossoth faction are in play. Cannot be stored, stolen or transferred. tap: bring one Choice of Luthien or Choose a Mortal Life from your sideboard to your play deck (reshuffle). tap: cancel a Dragon or Drake creature attack and put the creature's card back into its player's hand.

Name: Ring of Barahir3
Text: Unique. Ring. Playable by Cirdan, Elrond, or a Dunadan with a home site in Eriador, at a site where the Lossoth faction is playable. May also be played at Rivendell by Elrond, Arwen, or Aragorn II, if manifestations of these three characters and the Lossoth faction are in play. When you play this item you may bring Choice of Luthien or one Choose a Mortal Life from your sideboard to your play deck (reshuffle). Cannot be stored, stolen or transferred.tap: cancel a Dragon or Drake creature attack and put the creature's card back into its player's hand.

Name: Rose Cotton
Text: Unique. Hobbit. Playable by a Hobbit at Bywater. Rose Cotton gives 2 mp if controlled by Sam Gamgee. Discard her if she moves to a site not in The Shire. tap: prevent any effect that would discard her controlling character or return him to your hand this phase. tap: if controlled by Sam Gamgee to search your play deck or discard pile for a card that mentions Sam Gamgee in its card text and take it to your hand.

Name: Royal Navy
Text: Unique. Playable at Pelargir if the influence check is greater than 10.Standard Modifications: Dunedain (+1), Steward of Gondor Dunadan (+2), Return of the King Aragorn (+3). tap: allow one of your companies to move with an additional Coastal Sea [c] region in their site path. tap: cancel an effect (before it resolves) that would bring Corsairs of Umbar or Pirates from the discard pile to hand or into play this phase.

Name: Rumours of Danger
Text: When you play this card, name a creature type;any scout may tap to let each hazard creature of named type played against his company count as two against the hazard limit. Any player may discard two hazard creatures of the named type at any time to force the discard of this card.

Name: Rush along Recklessly
Text: Playable on a moving company at the end of the organization phase. The company's site path may include up to two extra regions. The hazard limit for this company is increased by one for every non-ranger character in the company. Any (ongoing) effect of Stealth, Sneakin', and Many Turns and Doublings played on the company is cancelled this turn.

Name: Sharp Blade
Text: Playable on a character bearing a weapon (not a minor item) and facing a strike from a non-Nazgul, non-Undead attack. The body of the strike is modified by -1 (by -2 if the weapon is unique). Cannot be duplicated for a given strike.

Name: Knowledge of the Enemy
Text: Stolen Knowledge. Playable on an untapped character at a Shadow-hold or Dark- hold or if his company faced an agent attack and all of its strikes failed. Tap character. Can be stored at a Haven-only if stored do you receive its marshalling point. If stored, you may discard this card and force one non-unique hazard to be removed from play as you see your opponent discard it through a mechanism of the game.

Name: Spring of 1420
Text: Unique. Playable if Mallorn is in play. Mallorn affects any site in The Shire as though it were Bag End. Any Hobbit character or ally is considered playable at Bag End. Additionally, whenever you may play a free minor item at a site in The Shire, the item may be taken from your sideboard (and/or from your discard pile if it is a food item).

Name: Star of Gobha
Text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at Setmaenen if the company has moved there with special movement from Dunharrow this turn. +3 EI against Woses. Discard Stone of Erech if in play. If bearer is at a site in Lamedon, you may place this item with a unique faction playable at a site in Gondor your opponent has in active play (keep both cards together); the number required to influence this faction is 0. After a successful influence attempt against the faction, invert both cards and place them in your mp (instead of discarding them). If inverted, both cards are considered eliminated; they give kill mp and cannot be influenced or discarded. Opponent's handsize is modified by -1.

Name: Steward of Gondor
Text: Unique. Playable on Denethor II, Boromir II, or Faramir,if Return of the King and Elessar are not in play. This card must always be transferred to the first character in line in active play according to the above mentioned order (or discarded it if that character is in play by an opponent). +1 to prowess, +1 body (to a maximum of 9), +2 mind, +2 EI against Dunedain. If target character is: Denethor II, he gains the ability to use a Palantir; Boromir II, he gains the ranger skill; Faramir, he gains the sage skill. Discard if bearer is at a site not in Greater Gondor, or if Return of the King is in play and this card is not on Faramir.

Name: Stone Mace
Text: Weapon. Two-handed. May also be played at any Wose- hold. Cannot be included with a starting company unless it contains a Wose. Cannot be used by a Hobbit. +1 prowess (to a maximum of 8) Wose only: +1 prowess against Dwarves, Drakes, Dragons, Orcs, and Trolls.

Name: Stories of the Elder Days
Text: Lore. Playable on your Wizard, Dunadan-lord, or Elf-lord. -2 P if you are a Lord or Fallen-wizard. Your avatar may tap to take one Lore of the Ages, Gift of Comprehension, or Tales of the Hunt from your discard pile to your hand. These cards may be played on characters in your avatar's company regardless of their race or current site, and give 1 fewer corruption points while in your avatar's company. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Into the Smoking Cone
Text: Playable on a company with a sage during the site phase at a site where gold ring items are playable. Tap this card if the company plays a ring special item; this card never untaps. If this card is tapped, the company can discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls during its site phase at Mount Doom and invert this card on the playing surface (rotate it 180 degrees). If inverted, you can store this card at a Haven-only if stored do you receive its marshalling points. If stored, all ring items give one less corruption point. Once inverted, no other copy of this card can be inverted.

Name: The End of His Labours
Text: Unique. Playable on a non-avatar character in active play, if you have a resource in play giving four or more miscellaneous mp. May not be played by a Fallen-wizard. Make a roll and add the current difference of total mp between you and your opponent. If the modified result is greater than target character's mind plus 7, you may place this card together with the character in your mp. Target character cannot be brought back into active play or the target of any hazard effects.

Name: The Great Battle of Our Time
Imagefile: The Great Battle of Our Time.jpg
Text: Each player may remove any number of non-avatar characters from his discard pile and shuffle them into his play deck. A Fallen-wizard or Lord player may remove any number of stage cards without mp value instead from his discard pile and shuffle them into his play deck.

Name: A Panoply of Wings
Text: Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Haven, non-Shadow-hold, non-Dark- hold site in a Wilderness if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: if Radagast is your Wizard (+3). Discard this faction to make information playable at such a site.

Name: Old Drug
Text: Playable on a unique Wose character. Target Wose may tap to cancel a Trap or Pukel-creature attack against his company. Additionally, Lure of the Senses and Taint of the Wilds cannot be played on him. You may discard this card to take up to two different minor items with a Wose only ability (or only playable on a Wose) from your sideboard to your hand (show opponent). These items may be played at any Wose-hold (even if the site is tapped). Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Oaths You Have Taken
Text: Playable on a unique non-avatar character, ally, or faction, if Stone of Erech or Tarma of Ar-Pharazon is in play. -5 to all influence attempts against target and +5 to your rolls resulting from hazards that would discard target or return him/it to your hand. Any such attempt and/or rolls are not modified by unused GI, mind, or faction number. If any such attempt against target is successful, he/it is eliminated (place in out of play pile) and this card is placed in opponent's mp. Cannot be duplicated on a given target.

Name: Oathbreaker
Text: Unique. Playable at any site in Lamedon by a Ringwraith, Fallen-Pallando, or Aragorn II (not Strider or Thorongil), if the company has moved there with special movement from Dunharrow this turn. Oathbreaker's company may move between Rohan and Lamedon as if these regions were adjacent. Discard if he is at a site not in Greater Gondor or Mordor. If Army of the Dead is in play, discard both.

Name: Flame of Anor
Text: Playable on a Wizard if his company faces an attack. +2 to his CP for playing spells. You may place any Light and Flame, Wizard's Fire, or Some Secret Art of Flame with this card instead of discarding it from play. Once per attack you may play a card placed with this card on the Wizard as if from hand. Discard at the end of the current phase; discard any cards placed with it or take them into your hand. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Garrison at Cair Andros
Text: Unique. Playable at Cair Andros if the influence check is greater than 7. Standard Modifications: Dunedain (+1). tap: at any time to cancel Dark Tryst before it resolves.

Name: Get You Gone
Text: Tap an avatar or diplomat during his movement/hazard phase to cancel a unique non-agent hazard before it resolves. Instead of discarding the hazard, opponent may shuffle it into his play deck or place it in his sideboard. Cannot be duplicated in a given movement/ hazard phase.

Name: Gift from the Evenstar
Text: Unique. Jewel. Playable by Frodo at any Free-hold [F] where Arwen is present. Elf-friend may be played on Frodo at any site (as if an Elf-hold). Sail to the West may be played on Frodo at Grey Havens even if Cirdan is not there (Frodo need not store or discard this item). tap: cancel any effect that would discard Frodo or return him to your hand this phase.

Name: Great Elf-warrior
Text: Unique. Playable on Sam Gamgee if he bears Sting, Phial of Galadriel, or The One Ring, and he has defeated a strike from an Orc or Spider attack this turn. Sam receives +3 prowess against Orcs and Spiders.

Name: Hands Clasped, Hair Mingling
Text: Playable on a character of the following pairs: Arwen andAragorn II, Celebrian and Elrond, Eowyn and Faramir, Galadriel and Celeborn, Gilraen and Arathorn II, Lothiriel and Eomer. Both characters of the chosen pair gain +2 EI useable only against each other. You may at any time wound either one (no body check is required) to prevent the other from leaving active play (unless he/she is eliminated). If both are in the same company, all influence attempts against them fail and their CPC are modified by +1. Cannot be duplicated for a given pair.

Name: Mithril
Text: Unique. Ore. Playable with a Sage or Dwarf only during the site phase at The Under- gates if you have a stored Vein of Arda. Sage or Dwarf may not untap until Mithril is stored at a Haven. Mithril is worth 7 marshalling points when stored. During any organization phase in which you store Mithril, you may immediately tap a character in the same company and play with him a non-unique, non-special weapon, armor, shield, or helmet from your hand or discard pile. When Mithril is stored, each Dwarf in play must immediately make a corruption check modified by -3.

Name: Mistress Lobelia
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Lobelia Sackville-Baggins. May only be played at Bag End or Bree. Discard this card if her company moves to any site other than Bree, Old Forest, The White Towers, or a site in The Shire. Tap Mistress Lobelia to search your discard pile or play deck for any one item, ally, or faction playable at her current site. Place the resource in your hand and reshuffle your play deck.

Name: Hideous Lust and Rage
Text: Playable on Gollum or Stinker facing a strike. +3 to his prowess. After the strike, target ally may untap (if he is not wounded).

Name: Hobbit Short-bow
Text: Bow. Hobbit only: tap: give -1 to the prowess and body of an Animal, Spider, Wolf, Orc, or Man attack, and an extra -1 modification for each other Hobbit Short-bow already tapped against the same attack. A given Hobbit may bear only one Hobbit Short-bow.

Name: The Gwaedhel-spear
Text: Unique. Playable at a site in Lamedon if the company hasmoved with special movement from Dunharrow this turn. Weapon. Two-handed. +2 prowess (+4 against Undead). Values in parentheses apply when The Gwaedhel-sword is in the company. You may play Banishment on this item (as if it were a Ruins & Lairs [R]); only then can it be used as a hero resource. tap: cancel an Undead attack against the company.minion only: tap: discard one Oaths You Have Taken from a character or ally at the bearer's current site.

Name: Hobbits Must Make Haste
Text: Playable at the end of the movement/hazard phase on a moving company that contains only Hobbits and at least one untapped unique ally. Tap the ally to allow the company to move to an additional site this turn. Another site card must be played and another movement/hazard phase immediately follows for this company. Cannot be duplicated in a given turn.

Name: Memories Recalled
Text: Playable on a character with a sage in his company. All dark enchantments on target character are discarded. Alternatively, a sage can tap and you can discard this card from your hand to fulfill the requirement that Lost Knowledge be discarded for any card played with the sage's company.

Name: Kingsfoil
Text: Playable on Aragorn II if he bears Athelas anda Dunadan sage is in the company. Tap Aragorn and discard Athelas. Remove all corruption cards from wounded characters in the company and heal all wounded characters (from wounded to untapped). If he is at a site in Anorien, you may take Return of the King from your sideboard to your hand.

Name: Mallorn
Text: Unique. Playable at Bag End only if Earth of Galadriel's Orchard is stored there. Bag End becomes a Haven for the purposes of healing and bringing characters into play. Bag End can untap during its owner's untap phase. If Bag End is discarded, return it to its location deck. All Hobbit factions are worth +1 marshalling points.

Name: Mace of Anarion
Text: Unique. Playable at Minas Morgul. Weapon. Mace. This itemis normally considered a hero item. If bearer is at a Darkhaven [K], you may discard a stored Dark Forges and play Counterfeit on this item (as though it were a character) to "restore" it. If restored, it is a minion item and may only be borne by a Ringwraith; it affects a Ringwraith. Warrior or Ringwraith only: +3 prowess (to a maximum of 11) and -1 to strike's body. This item gives 3 mp to a hero player or if it is restored.

Name: Mace-master
Text: Warrior only. Playable on The Witch-king, a Dwarf, Troll,or Wose character bearing a mace (e.g. Black Mace). Before resolving a creature attack (except creatures where each character faces a strike) with equal or less strikes than the prowess bonus the mace gives, bearer may tap the item to face the creature as though he were a one-character company. If this strike is defeated, the attack receives -2 prowess and -2 body and bearer makes a CP; if ineffectual the attack resolves normally; if succesful, bearer is wounded (no body check required). This card gives 2 corruption points as a minion resource.

Name: Master of Buckland
Text: Unique. Playable on Merry at Brandy Hall or Bywater if he controls To Fealty Sworn. Merry may tap to cancel an Awakened Plant attack against his company. Alternatively, tap Merry to take one Fear! Fire! Foes! from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Men of Lossarnach
Text: Unique. Playable at Lossarnach if the influence check is greater than 7.Standard Modifications: Dunedain (+1), Forlong in the company (+2). tap: bring a food minor item from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle.

Name: Lost Tome
Text: Lost Knowledge. Cannot be included with a starting company. After this item is played, the bearer faces an attack (cannot be cancelled): Trap - 1 strike with 9 prowess (weapons do not modify prowess against this strike). If its bearer is at a Shadow-hold or Dark-hold, discard Lost Tome to make information playable at the site until the end of the turn.

Name: Lindion the Oronin
Text: Unique. Maia. Playable at Stone-circle. Tap Lindion to cancel an Animal or Spider attack. Eagle-mounts can be played on his company regardless of their site or the presence of a diplomat.

Name: No Enemy Dares Contest
Text: Playable if Gates of Morning is in play. Anorien, Belfalas, Lamedon, and Lebennin are considered one single region and a Free-domain [f] for all purposes. Hazard creatures with an asterisk (*) keyed by name to any one of these regions may be played keyed to this unified region. Discard if Gates of Morning is not in play.

Name: Hobbits of the Westmarch
Text: Unique.
