Text: Unique. Playable at Lake-town if the influence check is greater than 6. Standard Modifications: Men (+1).

Name: Clear Skies
Text: Environment. Playable only if Gates of Morning is in play. The prowess of each character is modified by +2.

Name: Mirror of Galadriel
Text: Only playable at Lorien. You may look at your opponent's hand and choose to look at either the top five cards of his play deck or your play deck. Shuffle those 5 cards and return them to the top of their play deck.

Name: Watch over Mordor
Text: Remove Mordor in Ruins from the game (if in play). You may play Tower Raided on any Dark-hold [D] in Mordor (as if at a Shadow-hold [S]). Invert this card when you successfully play Tower Raided on a site in Mordor. If inverted, this card gives 4 mp. Only one copy of this card can be inverted. Re-invert if you do not have Tower Raided on a site in Mordor.

Name: Miruvor
Text: Food. Discard to give +2 body (to a maximum of 10) for all characters in bearer's company until the end of the turn.

Name: Wholesome Forest
Text: Attacks against minion and overt companies keyed to a region or site in Mirkwood receive +1 prowess and strikes for every two unique hero factions in play at such sites. If inverted, this card gives 3 mp (even to an Elf-lord). Wizard or Elf-lord only: invert this card when you store Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur or if Towers Destroyed is fully rotated; flip any Land of the Necromancer in play.

Name: Widuskapin Ritual
Text: Ritual. Playable on Woodmen-town. Discard a minor item from a company at this site to heal (from wounded to untapped) a non- overt, non-Ringwraith character at the site. Alternatively, discard to heal (from wounded to untapped) a character anywhere whose home site is Woodmen-town. Discard when the site leaves play. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Misty Mountains
Text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company containing a ranger. If the company uses region cards for its site path, tap the ranger to move as if the following pairs of regions were adjacent: Rhudaur and Anduin Vales, Rhudaur and Wold & Foothills, Hollin and Wold & Foothills, Hollin and Fangorn, Dunland and Fangorn. Otherwise, if the site moved to is in one of the regions listed above, the hazard limit is reduced by two (to a minimum of two). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Moon
Text: Environment. If Gates of Morning is in play, treat all Wildernesses [{w}] as Border-lands [{b}] and all Border-lands [{b}] as Free-domains [{f}] for the purposes of playing hazards. If Doors of Night is in play, treat all Dark-domains [{d}] as Shadow-lands [{s}] and all Shadow-lands [{s}] as Wildernesses [{w}] for the purposes of playing hazards. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Fram Wyrmslayer2
Text: Unique. Grey agent. Manifestation of Fram Framson. +3 prowess against Dragons and Drakes. May not be among the starting characters. Agent only: tap: during the movement/hazard phase at a site where an opponent's Dragon faction is in play, to face the associated Dragon attack; any resulting body checks after the attack are modified by +1. If the attack is defeated, place the faction in the out of play pile. If Fram is eliminated, opponent receives him as kill mp.

Name: Banishment
Text: Sage only. Playable during the site phase ona site with an Undead automatic-attack. Tap the sage. The site loses its all its Undead automatic-attacks. If it is a Ruins & Lairs [R], the site contains a hoard. Sage makes a CP modified by -2. Discard when the company plays an item at the site or the site leaves play.

Name: Morannon
Text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company that has a size of less than three, contains a scout, and begins the turn at a site in Dagorlad. This card is used as a Dark-hold [{D}] site card in the region of Udun that is moved to using the following site-path: {s} {d} (the moving player draws 2 cards and his opponent draws 5 cards). The company can later leave this site using region cards or by using the following site path to Lorien: {d} {d} {s} {w} {f} {b} {w}. Discard Morannon when the company successfully plays a new site card.

Name: Mountains of Shadow
Text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company containing a ranger. If the company uses region cards for its site path, tap the ranger to move as if the following pairs of regions were adjacent: Ithilien and Gorgoroth, Ithilien and Nurn, Harondor and Nurn. The company faces an attack at the beginning of its movement/hazard phase: Orcs - 4 strikes with 9 prowess. Otherwise, if the site moved to is in one of the regions listed above, the hazard limit is reduced by 2 (to a minimum of 2). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Muster
Text: Warrior only. An influence check against a faction by a warrior is modified by adding the warrior's prowess to a maximum modifier of +5.

Name: Narsil
Text: Unique. Weapon. +1 to prowess and direct influence.

Name: Bridge
Text: Playable at the end of the movement/hazard phase on a company that moved to a Haven [{H}]. That company may move to an additional site on the same turn. Another site card may be played and a movement/hazard phase immediately follows for that company.

Name: Narya
Text: Gandalf only. +4 prowess, +1 body, +2 direct influence for the rest of the turn. Immediately untap all unwounded characters in Gandalf's company. Gandalf makes a corruption check modified by -5.

Name: Nenya
Text: Galadriel only. +2 prowess, +2 body, +2 direct influence for the rest of the turn. Galadriel makes a corruption check modified by -3, by -1 if in a Haven [{H}]. Any one corruption check made by a character not in a Shadow-hold [{S}] or Dark-hold [{D}] is automatically successful.

Name: Wormsbane
Text: Unique.  Two-handed. Weapon. +2 to prowess to a maximum of 9 (+4 to prowess to a maximum of 12 and -2 to strike's body against a Dragon or Drake strike).

Name: Wondrous Maps
Text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company using region cards with the last one being a Shadow-land [{s}]. (Play regions face-up.) This card is used as a site card, Ruins & Lairs [{R}] (automatic-attack: Orcs -- 4 strikes at 7 prowess, items: (minor, major), cards opponent draws: 3, you draw 1). The company may only leave the site using region movement. Discard Wondrous Maps when the company moves to a new site.

Name: Magic Ring of Stealth
Text: Magic Ring. Playable only with a Gold Ring and after a test indicates a Magic Ring. Gives the bearer scout skill. If the bearer is already a scout, he may tap the Magic Ring of Stealth to cancel a strike directed against him. May not be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Concealment
Text: Scout only. Tap scout to cancel one attack against his company.

Name: Cracks of Doom
Text: Only playable during the site phase, if The One Ring is at Mount Doom. Its bearer must make a corruption check modified by -4. If successful, The One Ring is destroyed and its bearer's player wins. May not be played by a lord player (except for Elrond).

Name: Magic Ring of Nature
Text: Magic Ring. Playable only with a Gold Ring and after a test indicates a Magic Ring. Gives the bearer ranger skill. If the bearer is already a ranger, he may tap to cancel an attack against his company. May not be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Hiding
Text: Scout only at the end of the organization phase. Scout's company may not move to another site this turn. Cancels all hazard creature attacks against the scout's company this turn.

Name: Hillmen
Text: Unique. Playable at Cameth Brin if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Men (+1).

Name: Hobbits
Text: Unique. Playable at Bag End if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Hobbits (+4).

Name: Dreams of Lore
Text: Lore. Sage only during the site phase at an untapped site where Information is playable. Tap the sage and the site. Sage may not untap until Dreams of Lore is stored at a Haven [{H}] during his organization phase. May not be transferred.

Name: Horn of Anor
Text: Instrument. +2 to direct influence used against a faction. May not be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Dodge
Text: Target character does not tap against one strike (unless he is wounded by the strike). If wounded by the strike, his body is modified by -1 for the resulting body check.

Name: Rings of Power
Text: All players may take one ring item from their discard pile to their hand (regardless of other cards in play). Alternatively, play to cancel the effects of Rolled down to the Sea before it resolves. Remove this card from the game.

Name: Rivermen of the Anduin Vales
Text: Unique. Playable at Mathlaburg if the influence check is greater than 7.Standard Modifications: character with a home site in Anduin Vales or Western Mirkwood (+2). tap: reveal the top five cards of your play deck and take one ring item thus revealed to your hand; shuffle the rest back into the play deck.

Name: Horses
Text: Playable only at the end of the organization phase. Hazard limit for a company is decreased by two (to a minimum of 2). The prowess of any hazard creatures played against this company is modified by +2.

Name: Sceptre of Spirits
Text: Unique. Staff. Playable at Mistrand.+2 EI against Man characters and factions playable at sites in Harrhun or its adjacent regions. If bearer is a Man character with a mind of five or more, he can use spirit-magic and receives +2 to his CP from using magic resources.

Name: Iron Hill Dwarves
Text: Unique. Playable at Iron Hill Dwarf-hold if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Elves (-2), Dwarves (+2).

Name: Kindling of the Spirit
Text: Spell. Wizard only. +2 prowess against one attack for all characters in the same company as the Wizard. Wizard makes a corruption check modified by -2.

Name: Calm Song
Text: Magic. Spirit-magic. Song. Playable on a spirit-magic using character whose company faces a non- automatic, non-maia attack. The attack becomes detainment. Unless he is a Ringwraith, the character makes a CP modified by -3.

Name: Helm of Her Secrecy
Text: If Eowyn is in your hand, this card is playable on a company facing an attack (before strikes are assigned) -- the company must contain a character with Edoras as a home site. If enough influence is available to control her, Eowyn may be played with (i.e., joins) the company. She gains +2 prowess, +1 body, and +1 direct influence. If the attack is a Nazgul, place Helm of Her Secrecy with Eowyn following the attack. Otherwise, discard this card following the attack. Regardless, Eowyn remains in play.

Name: Knights of Dol Amroth
Text: Unique. Playable at Dol Amroth if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Dunedain (+1).

Name: Lapse of Will
Text: The prowess of each attack is modified by -1. The prowess of each Nazgul attack is modified by -3.

Name: Dagger of Westernesse
Text: Weapon. +1 to prowess to a maximum of 8.

Name: Leaflock
Text: Unique. Ent. Playable at Wellinghall. Tap to cancel the effects of one hazard that targets his company. May not be attacked by automatic-attacks or hazards keyed to his site. Discard Leaflock if his company moves to a site that is not in: Fangorn, Rohan, Gap of Isen, Wold & Foothills, Enedhwaith, Old Pukel-land, Brown Lands, Anduin Vales, or Redhorn Gate.

Name: Lesser Ring
Text: Lesser Ring. Playable only with a Gold Ring and after a test indicates Lesser Ring. +2 to direct influence.

Name: Spies into Mordor
Text: Quest. Playable in lieu of playing a minor item with a starting company. When you have a company at a site in Mordor, bring Mordor in Ruins into play from your sideboard (if not in play). When you play a Stolen Knowledge card with a company at a site in Mordor, rotate this card 90deg. If rotated at least once, you may store Stolen Knowledge cards at any Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F]. If fully rotated, you may flip this card. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Strange as News from Bree
Text: Quest. Only playable in lieu of playing a minor item with a starting company; any player may bring Strange as News from Bree into play from his sideboard. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. Discard a Stolen Knowledge card from play to force opponent to reveal his hand; if he has a character in hand, he must discard it or you may shuffle one hazard from your sideboard into your play deck (opponent's choice); then you may flip this card.

Name: Lordly Presence
Text: Diplomat only. +5 to an influence check against a faction. If the influence check is successful, draw a card.

Name: Aryen the Beastmaster
Text: Unique. Grey Agent. +3 EI against animal factions. tap: cancel an Animal, Spider or Wolf attack against his company. Agent only: tap: allow one non-unique Animal, Spider or Wolf hazard creature to be played keyed to his current Border-hold [B] or Ruins & Lairs [R]. The creature must be keyable to a non-Coastal Sea region.

Name: Lossoth
Text: Unique. Playable at Lossadan Camp if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Men (+1).

Name: Lucky Search
Text: Scout only. During the site phase, tap a scout at a Shadow-hold [{S}] or Dark-hold [{D}]. Turn over cards from your play deck one at a time until you reveal a non-special item or reach the end. If you reveal a non-special item, the scout takes control of it. In any case, the scout must face a single strike attack with a prowess equal to 3 plus the number of cards revealed; this attack/strike cannot be cancelled. Discard item if the scout is wounded by this attack. Reshuffle all revealed cards except the item back into play deck.

Name: Lucky Strike
Text: Warrior only. Make two rolls (or draw two #'s) against a strike and shoose one of the two results to use.

Name: Magic Ring of Courage
Text: Magic Ring. Playable only with a Gold Ring and after a test indicates a Magic Ring. Gives the bearer warrior skill. If the bearer is already a warrior, he gets +2 to prowess. May not be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Magic Ring of Lore
Text: Magic Ring. Playable only with a Gold Ring and after a test indicates a Magic Ring. Gives the bearer sage skill. If the bearer is already a sage, he may tap to use a Palantir. May not be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Dark Quarrels
Text: Cancel one attack by Orcs, Trolls, or Men. Alternatively, if Gates of Morning is in play, the number of strikes from any attack is reduced to half of its original number, rounded up.

Name: Harad
Text: Playable during organization phase on a company moving without region cards. Company may move from a site of origin in one of the following regions to a new site in one of the following regions: Horse Plains, Khand, Nurn, and Harondor. The site path is [w w w] and the hazard limit is decreased by two to a minimum of two.

Name: Look More Closely Later
Text: Ritual. Tap a sage to untap a site at which "Information" is playable. Sage makes a corruption check.

Name: Helecthil, Light of the North
Text: Environment. When Helecthil, Light of the North is played, all environment long-events in play are immediately discarded. This card is not discarded when Doors of Night is played, but when either Skies of Fire, The Sun Shone Fiercely, or Sun is played. The hazard limit for each hero or covert company at or moving to a site in The Northern Waste is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 2). All environment effects which cause a company moving through a region of The Northern Waste to return to their site of origin are cancelled. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Vanishment
Text: Spell. Wizard only. Cancels an attack against the Wizard's company. Wizard makes a corruption check modified by -2.

Name: Variags of Khand
Text: Unique. Playable at Variag Camp if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: none. {green} DCE: Add: Standard modifications: Wizards(-5)

Name: Vilya
Text: Playable on Elrond only. +4 prowess, +2 body, +6 direct influence until the end of the turn. If Elrond is at Rivendell and your play deck has at least 5 cards in it, you may take 3 resource cards of your choice from your discard pile and shuffle them into your play deck. Elrond makes a corruption check modified by  -3. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

Name: Healing Song
Text: Song. Playable on an Elf, if a character or ally in the company is wounded. Target Elf makes a CP modified by -1 for every environment hazard in play and by +1 for every environment hero resource in play. Your next turn, at the beginning of the same phase in which this card was played, discard this card and you may heal one Elf in the company (or any one character or ally if target Elf is Nando or Silvan) from wounded to tapped.

Name: Hair of Uinen
Text: Unique. Environment. Cancels the effects of Drowning Seas, Storms of Osse and Winds of Wrath. Additionally, if Gatesof Morning is in play, any hero Elf or Dunadan may tap to give -2 prowess or -1 body to a hazard creature attack against his company keyed to a Coastal Sea [c] region or at a site therein (by type or name).

Name: Gwaith-i-Mirdain
Text: Unique. Playable if you tap an Elf sage or discard a Lost Knowledge resource from play. Any roll for testing a gold ring at a site in Hollin is modified by +1. Additionally, any Elf or Dwarf sage may tap to make non-unique ore resources that are playable at any Under-deeps site playable at his current site in Hollin this turn. When this card is discarded from play, you may take one Ringlore, Secrets of Their Forging or Knowledge of Their Making from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Greenwood the Great
Text: Information. Playable on a character after the successful play of a faction at a site in Mirkwood. Tap the character. Discard this card to take a character or resource only playable at a site in Mirkwood from your discard pile to your hand. Alternatively, discard this card when CvCC is declared (during any turn) at a site in Mirkwood to untap all unwounded characters in the company and to give all characters in the company +1 prowess this turn. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Great Friendship
Text: Playable on Gimli or Legolas, if both are in the same company and after defeating an attack. Tap Gimli and Legolas if untapped. If both are in the same company: +1 to their body, and both may tap to give +3 to any one roll made by/for the other. If either is controlled by the other, he costs only 3 points of influence to control. You may discard this card to let either character take a strike assigned to the other, to cancel an influence attempt against either character, or to cancel a hazard that would remove either character from the company. Discard this card if either character leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Great Bow of Yew
Text: Weapon. Bow. Warrior only: +2 prowess to a maximum of 8 (maximum of 9 if borne by a Nando or Silvan Elf). Cannot be used by a Hobbit. tap: allow bearer to remain untapped against a strike from an attack keyed to a region, which does not choose defending characters.

Name: Great Bow of Lorien
Text: Unique. Weapon. Playable on Bow of the Galadhrim if borne by Legolas or Fanar.+2 to prowess (to a maximum of 9). You may tap Bow of the Galadhrim to modify a strike another character in the company is facing by a combined value of -3 to prowess and/or body (also during CvCC). Discard this card if Bow of the Galadhrim is not borne by Legolas or Fanar.

Name: Blade-master
Text: Warrior only. Playable on Alatar or a Dunadan, Elf, Man, or Orc warrior. If target character bears a blade (e.g. a sword or a dagger) and is chosen to face a strike from an attack, you may tap the blade: if the strike is defeated, any remaining strikes from this attack have its prowess and body reduced by the bonuses the blade gives against this attack. Otherwise discard the blade. Bearer makes a CP. This card gives 2 corruption points to an overt or minion character.

Name: Bow-master
Text: Playable on a character bearing and able to use a bow. If target character bears a bow he may tap for Wielded Twice or Raised Again as if he were a sage; afterwards, shuffle Wielded Twice/ Raised Again into the play deck instead of discarding it (if you so choose).

Name: Deceived by His Voice
Text: Flattery attempt. Playable on a character attempting to influence a faction of the type listed below. Tap the character and make a roll (modified by +2 if the character is a diplomat); one diplomat only resource or resource that modifies flattery attempts may be played to modifiy this roll. If the result is greater than the listed values, the influence attempt is automatically successful and the site need not be tapped; otherwise discard the faction. Against a Hobbit, Man, or Animal faction: 10; against a Dwarf, Wose, Orc, or Troll faction: 11; against an Elf, Eagle, Dunadan, or Ent faction: 12.

Name: Dire Negotiations
Text: Offering attempt. Playable on a character whose company is facing a non-detainment attack of the type listed below. Character makes a roll, modified by adding his unused EI, by +2 if a diplomat, and by +3 for each non-unique animal ally you decide to eliminate from the company. If successful, the attack is cancelled and the hazard limit for the character's company is decreased by 2. This influence check is successful if the result is greater than: 11 against a Dragon; 12 against Drakes, Giant, Orcs, or Trolls, 13 against Awakend Plants, Demons, or Spawn.

Name: Essay on Ringcraft
Text: Lost Knowledge. Playable at Amon Lind, Osteledan,or Ost-in-Edhil. If bearer is a sage or an Elf with a mind of 5 or more and is at a Haven [H], he may tap and replace this item with a Lesser Ring or Magic Ring item, which may be taken from hand, sideboard, or discard pile; place this card in your sideboard.

Name: Eryn Lasgalen
Text: Unique. Playable if Clean the Greenwood or Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur is in play. Each of your unique factions played at sitesin Mirkwood or its adjacent regions may tap to give -1 to the prowess and strikes (to a minimum of 1) of a rescue-attack or attack from Rescue Prisoners one of your companies faces at a site in Mirkwood. Additionally, if you receive mp for Profitable Trade with factions played in Wilderland, Southern Mirkwood becomes a Shadow-land [s] and CvCC is no longer cancelled by Dol Guldur'ssite card effect. Automatic-attacks at minion Free-holds [F] and Border-holds [B] in Mirkwood receive +2 prowess and cannot be cancelled.

Name: Elves of the House
Text: Unique. Playable at Rivendell if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Dunedain/ Elves (+2), characters with Rivendell as a home site (+2). This faction gives 2 mp if Rogrog or The Witch-king of Angmar is in play.

Name: Dragon-egg
Text: Treasure. Playable at a Dragon's Den [K] where you have rotated a Dragon's Nest this turn. May also be played at any site after defeating a strike from a Dragon controlling a rotated Dragon's Nest during CvCC. Dragon-egg may be played at a tapped site (only 1 per given turn). It may be stored at the following holds for a different effect: Dwarf-hold: + 5 to any influence attempt against a faction or character at the site that turn; Elf-hold: take any 2 Knowledge cards from your sideboard to your hand; Man-or Dunadan-hold: make any non-unique hoard or treasure item playable at the site that turn; any other hold: place one special item playable at the hold on the storing character.

Name: Elves of Lothlorien
Text: Unique. Playable at Lorien if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Elves (+2), Dwarves (-2), characters with Lorien as a home site (+2). This faction gives 2 mp if Balrog of Moria is not in active play.

Name: Elven Bridge
Text: Playable at the end of the organization phase ona moving company containing an Elf bearing Elven Rope. Name a region (not a Coastal Sea [c], Dark-domain [d] or region with 2 or more symbols) ; this region (both type and name) is not considered in the company's site path for the purpose of playing hazards and interpreting hazard effects.

Name: Elven Blade
Text: Playable on Aeglin, Aiglos, Anglachel, Angrist, Anguirel, Glamdring, Kirrauko, Orcrist, Ringil, Sting, Sulhelka, Sword of Gondolin, or Ungolcrist. Any Biter and Beater! played on the company also affects this item. tap: give -1 strike to an Orc, Troll or Undead attack (to a minimum of 1). Bearer makes a CPC. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

Name: Elf-friend
Text: Playable on a character at an Elf-hold (not an Elf, Wizard, Ringwraith or overt character). Target character receives +2 EI against Elves. He suffers no negative modification according to his race when attempting to influence Elf factions. Additionally, target character is also considered an Elf for the purpose of non-environment, non-item cards and effects. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Elenya
Text: Unique. Lesser Ring. Only playable at Osteledanor Telpemar if the company discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. +1 to bearer's mind and EI. -1 body. All of bearer's CPC are modified by +1 for each hero environment resource in play. tap: take one Echo of All Joy or The Evenstar from your discard pile to your hand. Bearer makes a CP.

Name: Crisfuin
Text: Unique. Staff. This item can only be used by a Wizardor Elf-lord. +1 EI. +1 prowess (+3 against magic- users). You may place a spell from hand with this item; bearer makes a CP modified by -2. Only one spell may be with Crisfuin at any given time. Any spell placed with this item may be played as if from hand; ignore the spell's CPC. tap: at any time to prevent a non-avatar character at the same site with a mind lower than bearer's (10 for a Wizard) from using spells or magic resources this turn.

Name: Cloak of Many Colours
Text: Discard if not borne by a Wizard or an Elf sage with mind 7 or more. tap: gain one of the following abilities (for the bearer) this turn. * bearer may tap to test a gold ring;* if at a Haven [H], bearer may join any of your companies facing a creature attack: he must face a strike of the attack;* increase your hand size by 1;* draw 1 additional card for each Wilderness [w] region in his company's site path;* tbearer may tap during the end-of-turn phase to take one spell or ritual from your discard pile to your hand;Bearer makes a CP when this item becomes tapped. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Clean the Greenwood
Text: Trophy. Playable during the site phase on a company at a non-Haven site in Mirkwood (not in Woodland Realm), if Towers Destroyed is rotated at least once. The company faces two of the following attacks (opponent's choice; cannot be cancelled): Spiders -- 5 strikes with 7 prowess; Orcs -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess; Trolls 2 -- strikes with 9 prowess. Demon -- 1 strike with 11 prowess. After the attacks, tap a character in the company or discard this card. Store this card (at any time) when the company is at a Haven [H], or at a Free-hold [F] in Mirkwood or its adjacent regions. If stored it is worth 2 mp and the prowess and strikes of attacks of the above named types against hero companies at or moving to a site in Mirkwood are modified by -1 (to a minimum of 2). Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

Name: Choose a Mortal Life
Text: Playable on Arwen, Elladan, or Elrohir. Tap target character if untapped. +1 mind and +1 EI against Dunedain. Target character is also considered a Dunadan; if controlled by a Dunadan, he costs only 3 points of influence to be controlled. The Burden of Time cannot be played on him. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Bow of Yew
Text: Bow. A given character may bear only oneBow of Yew. Cannot be used by a Hobbit. Warrior only: tap: modify one strike from a hazard creature attack (or any attack if bearer is Bard Bowman or a Nando or Silvan Elf) another character in the company faces by -2 to prowess and body (only to prowess if another Bow of Yew has been tapped against the same strike).

Name: Blood of Huan
Text: Playable on a Noble Hound controlled by anElf or a non-overt ranger. +1 to body. The Noble Hound is considered an Elf character for the purpose of cards that modify prowess. Cannot be duplicated on a given Noble Hound. tap: allow target Noble Hound to face any number of strikes from an attack (if you assign a strike of the attack). Each strike sequence must be faced separately.

Name: Light of Lothlorien
Text: Unique. Playable on Galadriel. When you play this card, you may bring Lady of the Golden Wood into play from your hand, discard pile or sideboard (overriding any conflicting rules). Discard Lady of the Golden Wood if Galadriel is not at Lorien. Additionally, if you are Galadriel, this card gives 1 P and Galadriel may use True Fana as if she were a Wizard; for the purpose of True Fana, Galadriel's prowess is modified by +2 (+4 if Nenya has been played that turn).

Name: Looking from Mind to Mind
Text: Playable on a company containing three or morecharacters of which the majority is Elf. Except when strikes are being resolved, an Elf or Wizard in the company may tap to untap another Elf or Wizard in the company with an equal or lower mind (10 for a Wizard). Discard this card if at any time the conditions to play it are no longer met, or when any play deck is exhausted.

Name: New Closeness to His Kin
Text: Playable on a company. One Elf (even an agent or minion) character may be played as a hero character with target company at a Haven [H]. Place this card with the Elf: +1 to his mind. Discard target character if he is the only Elf in the company. This card may be played with a starting company in lieu of a minor item. When played as such, reveal it as if it were a character.

Name: Of the Green-elves
Text: Playable on a moving company containing only Elves, Wizards and/or Hobbits. For each Wilderness [w] in the company's site path you may tap a Nando or Silvan Elf to lower the hazard limit by one. You may not tap more Elves in this fashion than there are hazards played on the company this turn. Environment hazards and creatures that require two or more Wilderness in the site path do not count against the hazard limit for the rest of the movement/hazard phase.

Name: The Great Eagles
Text: Unique. Playable at Eagles' Eyrie if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: none.

Name: The Mithril-coat
Text: Unique. Treasure. Armor. +3 body (to a maximum of 10).

Name: The Old Thrush
Text: -3 to the prowess and body of a non-Nazgul attack with a prowess of 13 or more. Cannot be duplicated on a given attack.

Name: The One Ring
Text: Unique. The One Ring. Playable only with a Gold Ring and after a test indicates The One Ring. +5 prowess (to a maximum of double the bearer's starting prowess). +5 body (to a maximum of 10). +5 to direct influence. Bearer may make a corruption check modified by -2 to cancel a strike; this does not work against Undead and Nazgul strikes. +1 corruption point to every character in the bearer's company.

Name: The White Tree
Text: Unique. Sage only at Minas Tirith. Playable only if a Sapling of the White Tree is at Minas Tirith. Minas Tirith becomes a Haven [{H}] for the purposes of healing and playing hazards. Discard the Sapling of the White Tree.

Name: Thorough Search
Text: Scout only. Tap a scout during the site phase to allow another character in his company to play a minor, major, or gold ring item normally found at its current site. The company must face any automatic-attack for its current site at least once during this site phase. This does not tap the site, and Thorough Search can be played at a site that is already tapped.

Name: Tom Bombadil
Text: Unique. Maia. Playable at Old Forest. Tap to cancel the effects of one hazard that targets any company, or an entity associated with a company, moving to a site in:  Arthedain, Cardolan, Rhudaur, or The Shire. Discard Tom Bombadil if his company moves to a site that is not in: Arthedain, Cardolan, Rhudaur, or The Shire.

Name: Torque of Hues
Text: Unique. Treasure. Tap Torque of Hues and its bearer to cancel an attack against his company. Bearer makes a corruption check.

Name: Helechoth
Text: Unique. Playable at Hyvat Kalat if the influence check is greater than 7. Standard Modifications: Men (+1). tap: cancel an Animal, Wolf, or Giant attack keyed to Lindalf or Thorenaer (by type or name) against one of your companies. This faction gives 2 mp if the Wind-horde faction is not in play.

Name: Welcomed by the Lord and Lady
Imagefile: Welcomed by the Lord and Lady.jpg
Text: Unique. Playable only with your starting company in lieu of a minor item, if you have two or more Elves with home site Lorien in play (or one such Elf and an avatar). Reveal this card as if it were a character. You may start the game at Lorien. Your Wizard or Lord may come into play there. Discard this card if you do not have a character with home site Lorien in active play, or if you have 6 P or more.

Name: Very Active Governess
Text: Unique. Playable on Galadriel if Royal Duo isin play. Once per phase Galadriel may make a CP: if still in play afterwards she may untap.

Name: Ungolcrist
Text: Unique. Playable at Shelob's Lair. Weapon. +2 prowess to a maximum of 8 (+4 prowess and -3 to target's body against Spiders, if bearer is a warrior). Bearer must make a CP modified by +1 when his company faces a Spider attack; he must be assigned the first strike from such an attack and must make an additional CP modified by -1 if the attack is cancelled.

Name: Ulmo's Watch
Text: Unique. Playable if you tap a Dunadan or Elf with a mind of 7 or more (5 or more if a Sinda). If a hero company moves with at least three Wildernesses [w] or one Coastal Sea [c] in their site path, their company's size is considered 2 less than normal for the company (to a minimum of 2) until the end of the turn. Additionally, if Gates of Morning is in play, each Elf, Dunadan, Maia, and Wizard in such a company gains the sage skill and may tap to discard a card placed on-guard at his company's new site.

Name: Towers Destroyed
Text: Playable on a company at Lorien or Thranduil's Halls. May also be played on your starting company in lieu of a minor item, if you start thegame at one of these sites. During the site phase at Dol Guldur, the company may face attacks based on the number of times this card is rotated: none: Orcs -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess; Once: Trolls -- 2 strikes with 9 prowess; Twice: Nazgul -- 1 strike with 15 prowess; Thrice: Fallen-Maia -- 1 strike with 20 prowess. If such an attack is defeated, tap an avatar or warrior in the company to rotate this card 90deg (or place a token). If rotated 360deg, place this card with Dol Guldur for 5 mp: the site does not leave active play, and all versions of Dol Guldur become a Ruins & Lairs [R]. Southern Mirkwood becomes a Shadow-land [s]. Cannot be duplicated on Dol Guldur or by a given player.

Name: Attuning the Blade
Text: Ritual. Sage only. Playable during the site phase at a site where Information is playable. taTap a sage, place this card on a non-unique weapon item in the company, and choose a type: Drake, Giant, Orc, Spider, Troll, Undead or Wolf. The weapon gives +2 prowess or -1 to target's body (decide during the strike sequence) against strikes of the chosen type. Sage makes a CP modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

Name: Tower Guard of Minas Tirith
Text: Unique. Playable at Minas Tirith if the influence check is greater than 7. Standard Modifications: Dunedain (+1).

Name: The High Sea
Text: Unique. As a short event, playable if you discard (for no effect) a Favor of the Valar or Returned Beyond All Hope. Name a non-avatar Elf placed "off to the side" with Sail to the West or in any out of play pile. Make a roll, adding the character's mind; if the result is greater than 10, the character may be brought into active play at Grey Havens (discard any Sail to the West played on him). If the character was in play by your opponent, you must play a copy of the character from your hand instead; discard opponent's copy. As a permanent-event, playable on an Elf with mind 6 or more placed "off to the side" with Sail to the West.

Name: Swanships of Lindon
Text: Playable on a character with Grey Havens or Edhellond as a home site. When moving to a port or site in a Coastal Sea [c] region, you may tap target character and discard (for no effect) one Fair Sailing, Great Ship, Stars, or The Evenstar to replace the company's new site with another port or site in a Coastal Sea region in the same or an adjacent region. You may discard this card from play to bring one Fair Sailing, Favor of the Valar, Hair of Uinen, Stars, The Evenstar, or Ulmo's Watch from your discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Sulhelka
Text: Unique. Playable at any Dark-hold [D], if the company has faced a Nazgul attack the same turn. May also be played atany site after CvCC by the character whose strike against a Ringwraith has been successful (tap character and site). Weapon. +2 EI against Elves and Dwarves. Warrior only: +3 prowess (+4 against Drakes and Undead) to a maximum of 10, and -1 to target's body. Sage only: tap: bring one Bitter Cold into play from your discard pile or sideboard (ignore any CP). Bearer is not affected and/or cannot be the target of Lava Flows, Dragon's Breath and Scourge of Fire.

Name: Spirit of Celebrian
Text: Unique. Playable if a hero Elf with a mind of five or more is in play. Whenever a character with Lorien or Rivendell as a home site is assigned a strike from an Orc attack (or from an Orc character in CvCC), its controlling player may choose to assign to the character another strike from that attack (or from another Orc character in CvCC), regardless of the attack's abilities or other resources played. When this card would be discarded from play, you may remove it from the game instead, along with one Orc hazard creature of your choice which opponent has revealed to you through a mechanism of the game.

Name: Soul-piercing
Text: Playable on Galadriel. An opponent's character of yourchoice at Galadriel's current site must make a CP modified by -2. If still in play afterwards, opponent may remove a corruption card from the character. Otherwise you may look at opponent's hand. Galadriel makes a CP. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn for a given character.

Name: Seekers of Knowledge
Text: Place this card in your mp. You may place any of your stored Book of Mazarbul, Scroll of Isildur, Lost Knowledge or Stolen Knowledge resource with this card. If there are at least three different of such resources with this card it is worth 2 mp (even to a Fallen-Pallando or Fallen-Saruman player).

Name: Sail to the West
Text: Playable during the site phase on a non-avatar Elf at Grey Havens if Cirdan or Cirdor is there. Tap the site. Target Elf must make a CP. If still in play afterwards, place him "off to the side" with this card; store any items he controls and discard any allies. Target character is not worth any mp. This card may also be played on an opponent's character or revealed agent (under the same playability conditions): it is then worth 1 mp to opponent instead.

Name: Royal Duo
Text: Unique. Playable on Galadriel if Celeborn is in the company. Tap Galadriel and Celeborn if untapped. If both are in the same company, any influence, flattery or offering attempt either of them makes is modified by adding the unused EI of the other. Discard this card if either character leaves active play.

Name: Treebeard
Text: Unique. Ent. Playable at Wellinghall. May not be attacked by automatic-attacks or hazards keyed to his site. Discard Treebeard if his company moves to a site that is not in: Fangorn, Rohan, Gap of Isen, Wold & Foothills, Enedhwaith, Old Pukel-land, Brown Lands, Anduin Vales, or Redhorn Gate.

Name: True Fana
Text: Spell. Wizard only. Before resolving an attack against the Wizard's company, make a roll (or draw a #) and add the Wizard's prowess to the result. If the total is greater than the attack's prowess, all of the attack's strikes fail (if the attack has a body, make body checks to determine if the attack is defeated). Otherwise, the attack proceeds normally. Wizard makes a corruption check modified by -3.

Name: Use Palantir
Text: Sage only. Tap sage to enable him to use one Palantir he bears for the rest of the turn.

Name: Reconstructed Towers
Text: Unique. Playable during the site phase on The White Towers, if your company there contains at least 3 Elves and/or Dunedain, and theWizardhaven version of The White Towers is not in play. The company faces an attack: Wolves -- 4 strikes with 9 prowess (cannot be cancelled). Following the attack, tap an Elf or Dunadan at the site or discard this card. The site is never discarded or returned to the location deck. All versions of The White Towers become a Free-hold [F]. Fallen- wizards may not use the stage version and may not play any stage card on The White Towers. Replace all automatic-attacks with: Elves -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess (detainment against hero and covert companies). Palantir of Elostirion affects Dunedain as if Elves. This card is worth full mp to a Lord-player.

Name: Reconstructed Towers2
Text: Unique. Playable during the site phase on The White Towers, if your company there contains at least 3 Elves and/or Dunedain, and theWizardhaven version of The White Towers is not in play. The company faces an attack: Wolves -- 4 strikes with 9 prowess (cannot be cancelled). Following the attack, tatap an Elf or Dunadan at the site or discard this card. The site never leaves active play. All versions of The White Towers become a Free-hold [F]. Fallen-wizards may not use the stage version. Replace all automatic-attacks with: Elves -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess (detainment against hero and covert companies). Palantir of Elostirion affects Dunedain as if Elves. This card is worth full mp to a Lord-player.

Name: Raft-elves
Text: Unique. Playable at Celebannon if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Elves (+2), Dwarves (-2) -- apply once for each race in the company, Wood-elves (+2), Men of Lake- town (+2) tap: bring one Down the Hurrying Waters from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle.

Name: The Three Are Together
Text: Unique. Playable during the organization phase on a company at a Haven [H] containing Elrond, Galadriel, and Gandalf (or Cirdan if Realm of Narya is in play). These characters in the company receive +2 to their prowess and EI, and +2 to any CP they make for playing a resource short-event. Discard this card if the company does not contain three of the above named characters (or manifestations thereof).

Name: Aranruth
Text: Unique. Weapon. If bearer is a Dunadan or Sinda Elf this item gives 3 corruption points. Each Dunadan in the company is considered an Elf for the purpose of interpreting The Evenstar. Warrior only: +3 prowess (to a maximum of 12) and -2 to target's body. +2 EI against Dunedain and Sinda Elves. tap: and play The Evenstar to untap a Dunadan or Sinda in the company facing a strike. Bearer makes a CP modified by +2.

Name: Ancient Skill and Wisdom
Text: Playable on an Elf with mind 8 or more(7 or more if a Noldo) at a Haven [H]. Target Elf may use spells as if a Wizard (except Sacrifice of Form; if on Glorfindel he may play Sacrifice of Form against a Nazgul or Spawn attack: keep this card with Sacrifice of Form and place both on Glorfindel when he re-enters play).

Name: Ancient Knowledge
Text: Playable on an Elf with a mind of 6 or more (5 or more if a Noldo or Sinda) at a Haven [H]. When a Lost Knowledge card is required to be discarded from his company, you may discard this card instead. If target Elf is a scout or ranger, this card may also be discarded instead of a Stolen Knowledge card.

Name: Grey Pilgrim
Text: Playable during the organization phase on Gandalf, if his company contains no other characters and allies (except unique horse allies), Gandalf gains the ranger skill this turn. He may move up to five regions, and his company's hazard limit is reduced by one (to a minimum of one).

Name: Grip! Fang! Wolf!
Text: Playable on a Noble Hound if his company is facing a creature attack (before assigning strikes). Make a roll and add Noble Hound's prowess; if the result is greater than the creature's prowess (including all modifica- tions, add one for each of its attacks), all of its attacks are defeated (place it in your mp). Otherwise, the Noble Hound is eliminated.

Name: Hands of the Weak
Text: Playable on a hero character with a mind of five or less and a normal prowess of four or less. Whenever you need to make a roll for target character and require at least a 10 for a successful result, you may rotate this card 90deg (or place a token) to add one to the roll's result. This is done before the roll and only once per phase. When rotated four times, make a body check for target character and discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Helm Clove Asunder
Text: Warrior only. Playable during CvCC after a successful strike by one of your warrior characters. Name a battle-gear item borne by the character whose strike your warrior has defeated in CvCC, and make a roll, modified by +2 if the item is a weapon (+3 if unique); if the result is greater than 9, discard the item. This card may be played during your opponent's turn.

Name: Hobbit-pony
Text: Horse. Playable by a Hobbit at Bree or site in The Shire (even if the site is tapped). Discard if it moves to a Dungeon or Under-deeps site. +1 prowess if in a company with a unique horse ally. Counts as Hobbit for the purpose of playing Halfling-strength. You may shuffle any More Sense than You played on an entity in its company into your play deck.

Name: I Pass the Test
Text: Playable on The One Ring if its bearer is ata Haven [H]. Rotate this card 90deg (or place a token) each time a Wizard or character with a mind of six or more at the same site (other than the bearer) passes a CP. This may only be done once per turn, and once per game for each given character. This card is worth 1 mp for each time rotated. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Kheled-zaram
Text: Playable on a character at Dimrill Dale. Untap or heal the character (from wounded to tapped) or untap the site; you may take an Information resource from your discard pile to your hand. Target character makes a CP (modified by -1 if a Dwarf). All automatic-attacks at Dimrill Dale receive +1 to prowess and strikes. While at Dimrill Dale, target character does not untap normally during his untap phase. Discard if he is not at Dimrill Dale. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Light and Flame
Text: Spell. Wizard only. -2 prowess to all Dragon and Ringwraith characters at the site this turn. Any Ringwraith must be taken to hand on a body check result of 6 or 9 (unless killed by the check). This card may also be played during opponent's site phase, and in response to a resource played by/on a Dragon or Ringwraith at the Wizard's site: opponent's company must immediately engage in CvCC with the Wizard's company. Wizard makes a CP modified by -3.

Name: Local Hospitality
Text: Playable on a non-overt character at his home site. Heal (from wounded to tapped) another character in his company, or untap another character of the same race in his company. The other character must not be at his home site.

Name: Looking Forward
Text: Playable during the organization phase on your Wizard. Tap your Wizard to look at the top 7 cards of any play deck. The Wizard may choose to face one creature thus revealed as though he were a single character company (discard creature after the attack). Any attack against the Wizard's company by (copies of) this creature is cancelled for the rest of the turn. Return the other cards to the top of the play deck in any order you choose.

Name: Many Leagues
Text: Playable only at the end of the organization phase on your Elf-lord or Wizard (not Saruman) at Isengard or a non-Under-deeps Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]. If the number of allies and characters without flying in the company (two Hobbits count as one character) is equal to or lower than the number of the following cards in the company, they may move with flying movement this turn to any Haven [H] or Free-hold [F] in the same or an adjacent territory as their current site; Gwaihir, Meneldor, Winged Change-master, The Windlord Found Me.

Name: Memories of Ages Past
Text: Playable on Gollum or Stinker. He is considered a Hobbit for all purposes and must make a CP modified by -2 during the untap phase. +1 to his riddling rolls. Additionally, you may tap him to take a gold ring item playable at his current site, or a manifestation of an item borne by an opponent's character at his site, from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Meneldor
Text: Unique. Eagle. Winged. Playable at Eagle's Eyrie.May also be played at the (tapped) site where you have played The Windlord Found Me this turn, if an Elf-lord or Wizard (not Saruman) is in the company. You may store The Windlord Found Me at any Free-hold [F]; when storing it you may play any one character from your discard pile or play deck (as if a Wizard at a Haven [H]). Discard Meneldor when his company moves to a Dungeon or Under-deeps site, or if his company is overt.

Name: Mister Underhill
HomeSite: Bree, any site in The Shire
Text: Unique. Playable on Frodo. You may start the game with this card in lieu of a minor item. In addition to adopting the given attributes, Frodo's skills become scout. Discard if Frodo uses a ring, or if his company moves to a site not in The Shire or its adjacent regions. tap: during end-of-turn phase to take one Halfling Stealth from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Grey Pilgrim2
Text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on Gandalf, if his company contains no other characters or allies (except unique horse allies). Untap Gandalf if tapped. He gains the ranger skill this turn and may move up to five regions. Opponent must reveal any cards he draws for Gandalf's company, and River and Enchanted Stream cannot be played on his company.

Name: Much-trodden Paths
Text: Any company sent back to its site of origin may still play cards and take actions that turn. Additionally, any player may discard this card to cancel for one of his companies moving to a Haven [H/K] (or site where another company is located) the effects of a hazard that would return the company to its site of origin or replace its new site. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: New Supplies
Text: Playable on a Free-hold [F] or Border-hold [B] where you have a unique faction in play. At the end of the organization phase you may discard this card to take up to two non-unique food minor items from your sideboard and place them with different characters in a moving company (characters need not tap to receive these items). Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Once It Got away
Text: Playable after a failed strike of an agent attack against the company. A character in the company may tap to play a non-unique ally or Bill the Pony. Alternatively, playable during CvCC after a successful strike against a character controlling a non-unique ally (or Bill the Pony). Discard an ally of your choiceC controlled by the character.

Name: Own Thoughts and Devices
Text: Playable on a scout, a ranger, or a sage. If target character is a sage, he may tap during the organization phase to allow you to draw a card. If a ranger, he may tap during the movement/hazard phase to draw a card. If a scout, he may tap during the site phase to draw a card. Discard if the character is at a Haven [H,K] or Dark-hold [D]. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Ranger's Gear
Text: Playable on a non-Hobbit scout or ranger. Minor items target character bears which mention his race or any of his skills in their card text or title do not give any corruption points. Discard if bearer's company does not (attempt to) move. This card may be played in lieu of a minor item with a character in your starting company.

Name: Resistance of Will
Text: Playable during your opponent's site phase,if your opponent makes an influence attempt against one of your characters. Based on your character's mind, you may modify opponent's roll by the following:1-4 mind: -2; 5-7 mind: -3; 8+ mind: -4. Alternatively, play to cancel an offering or flattery attempt against one of your characters.

Name: Reunion
Text: Playable on a Haven [H] or Free-hold [F]. Any CP made for transferring a non-ring item between characters of the same race at this site (or characters with the same home site) is modified by +2. Additionally, characters at this site may transfer items during their end-of-turn phase. Discard this card if the site leaves active play, or after a failed CP made for transferring an item at the site.

Name: Rings of Power2
Text: All players may take one ring item from their discard pile to their hand (regardless of other cards in play). Alternatively, play to cancel the effects of Rolled Down to the Sea before it resolves. Remove this card from the game.

Name: Ruddy Varmint
Text: Unique. Animal. Playable at any tapped or untapped Ruins & Lairs [R] in The Shire or its adjacent regions. +1 to any trickery, burglary, flattery, or riddling attempt made by a character in his company. tap: cancel a strike (not from an automatic-attack) against himself.

Name: Sanctuary for the Birds
Text: Unique. Playable on Rhosgobel. One hero ally with the keyword flying is playable with Radagast at the site each turn. Additionally, such allies may heal at Rhosgobel. This card gives -2 P to a Fallen-wizard player. Discard if Rhosgobel leaves active play.

Name: Say 'Friend' and Enter
Text: Ritual. Playable on a sage at the end of the movement/hazard phase. Tap the sage. Any ongoing hazard effect that would cause his company to do nothing during the site phase is now cancelled.

Name: Second Breakfast
Text: Playable on a moving company containing a Hobbit. Tap all Hobbits in the company. At the end of the movement/hazard phase you may take another movement/hazard phase and move to another site: the company must move with region movement, to a maximum of 3 regions. This card may also be played as a hazard; instead of all Hobbits, tap one Hobbit in the company (or one Hobbit and Fatty Bolger; hazard player's choice).

Name: Shire-ale
Text: Food item. Playable at any site in the Shire or at Bree. May also be played at a tapped site. Discard this item to discard a Despair of the Heart or Alone and Unadvised played on a character in the company; target character makes a body check modified by -1. Failing the body check wounds, but does not eliminate the character. A Hobbit bearer may discard this item to receive +3 prowess and -2 body untill the end of the turn; target Hobbit cannot use Halfling Stealth, Sneakin', or Stealth, and any ongoing effect of these cards is cancelled.

Name: Sojourn in the Golden Wood
Text: Unless you have 10 P or more, you may reserve one card face down with this card. During your end-of- turn phase you may take the reserved card back into your hand and discard this card. Any opponent may use two against the hazard limit (only one if he is Sauron or has a Palantir in play) of one of your companies to look at the reserved card; if it is not a resource, the reserved card is revealed and discarded, and this card is placed in your mp; it gives -1 mp (even to a Fallen-wizard).

Name: The Bullroarer's Club2
Text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at Michel Delving. May also be played at any site in The Shire by The Thain or a character with Mathom Lore. +1 prowess. Hobbit warrior only: +2 prowess and +2 EI against Hobbits.

Name: New Best Friend
Text: Playable on a Haven [H] or Free-hold [F]. Your characters at this site may transfer any allies they control to other characters in their company with an equal or higher mind (or to an avatar). If the ally is non-unique, the new controlling character may not already control another copy of that ally. Afterwards, tap the ally if untapped. Discard this card when the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: The Evenstar
Text: Environment. The prowess of one Elf is modified by +1 until the end of the turn. Additionally, if Gates of Morning is in play, until the end of the turn, the prowess of each Elf is modified by +1 and treat one Wilderness [{w}] as a Border-land [{b}], or one Border-land [{b}] as a Free-domain [{f}]. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Green Leaves and Lilies White
Text: Unique. Playable on Tom Bombadil. If in a company with Goldberry, Tom Bombadil is not discarded as per his card text. Discard this card if he is not in a company with Goldberry, or with your Wizard or Elf-lord.

Name: Focussed Staff
Text: Ritual. Playable on a staff borne by an avatar during the site phase at a Ruins & Lairs [R]. taTap the bearer.+1 to all his CP required for rituals, spells, and light enchantments. tap: give +2 to all Under-deeps movement rolls required for the bearer's company. tap: give -2 prowess to an Undead attack against the bearer's company. Bearer makes a CP when this card becomes tapped. Cannot be duplicated on a given staff.

Name: A Long Good Talk
Text: Playable on Gandalf, Radagast, or an Elf-lord. If in the company, Treebeard and Tom Bombadil are not discarded as per their card text when moving to Tom's House and/or Wellinghall. If both these allies are in the same company you may place them "off to the side" with this card. You may then tap both (at any time) to either:* Make Awakened Plant creatures playable at your avatar's current site against minion companies this turn;* Give +2 to a ring test, or cancel Rolled Down to the Sea played earlier in the same chain of effects;* Store Fate of the Ithil Stone or Into the Smoking Cone at Mount Doom or Barad-dur (as if at a Haven [H]);* take one Cracks of Doom or The Old Thrush from your discard pile to your hand;

Name: A Friend of Yore
Text: Unique. Prisoner. Playable during the site phase at Barad-dur on an Elf or Dunadan with a mind of five or more. Tap the character. The company faces 2 attacks: Orcs -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess; Trolls -- 2 strikes with 10 prowess. This card comes into play inverted; it may be stored at an Elf-hold. Target character may not untap while this card is inverted. Re-invert this card if he is at an Elf-hold or plays or uses (for no effect) a card with a healing effect. This card is worth full mp to a Lord-player. If stored, you may discard this card during the organization phase and bring Prisoner from Ost-in-Edhil into play as a hero character at an Elf-hold; he may be taken from your hand, sideboard, or discard pile.

Name: White Mountains
Text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company containing a ranger. If the company uses region cards for its site path, tap the ranger to move as if the following pairs of regions were adjacent: Old Pukel-land and Anfalas, Rohan and Lamedon, Rohan and Anfalas, Anorien and Lamedon. Otherwise, if the site moved to is in one of the regions listed above, the hazard limit is reduced by two (to a minimum of two). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Wizard's Fire
Text: Spell. Wizard only. +5 prowess for the Wizard against one attack. Wizard makes a corruption check modified by -4.

Name: Elves of Edhellond
Text: Unique. Playable at Edhellond if the influence check is greater than 10.Standard Modifications: Dunedain (+2),Elves (+2), characters with Edhellond as a home site (+2). If Cirdor is at Edhellond you may play Sail to the West on characters there as if they were at Grey Havens. This faction is worth 2 mp if no manifestation of Earcaraxe is in active play.

Name: Ellindiel
Text: Unique. Noldo. Grey agent. +2 EI against characters with a home site in Eriador. May not be in a company with an Elf or Dunadan with a higher mind. Wisp of Pale Sheen may always be played keyed to Ellindiel's current non-Haven site. Agent only: Elven Wards affects any company moving through the region containing her current site (as if through Hollin).

Name: Dragon-scales
Text: Playable at a Dragon's lair, if the associated Dragon has been defeated and you discard a Reforging or Dark-forges from the company. Armor. Helmet. +2 body (to a maximum of 10). Warrior only. +1 prowess and +3 EI.Bearer cannot be the target of dark -and light enchantments, except Dragon's Curse. Dragon-sickness may be played on the bearer (as if a major item). Cannot be duplicated for a given Dragon. tap: cancel one attack from a Dragon or Drake hazard creature or automatic-attack.

Name: A Blazing Fire and a Mug of Beer
Imagefile: A Blazing Fire and a Mug of Beer.jpg
Text: Unique. Playable on Barliman Butterbur at Bree. tBarliman receives +1 body and +1 to his CP. He may tap to bring one Glamour of Surpassing Excellence, Marvels Told, or Memories Recalled from your discard pile or sideboard to your play deck and shuffle. Discard this card if Barliman is at a site not in Arthedain or The Shire, or if he is at a Haven [H].

Name: Asfaloth
Text: Unique. Horse. Playable at any non-Haven site in Cardolan or Rhudaur. Characters with home site Rivendell may play Asfaloth at tapped sites. If his company contains only one character and no allies (except horse allies), they may move 2 additional non-Coastal Sea regions when moving to a site where another company is present, and Asfaloth may tap to give +2 to all of his controlling character's CP this turn. tap: cancel a Nazgul attack against the company, or a strike (not from an automatic-attack) against his bearer or himself.

Name: Backpack
Text: taTap bearer and discard this item to replace it with one non-unique, non-hoard minor item (not a Backpack) from your discard pile or sideboard (or two such items if bearer is Sam Gamgee). A given character may bear only one Backpack.

Name: Beer from the East-farthing
Text: Food item. Playable at a site in The Shire or at Bree (does not tap the site). Discard this item to cancel any effect that forces the company to do nothing during the site phase: you may not play resources that give any mp with the company this turn. This item is considered a minor item for the purpose of using Backpack if the bearer of Backpack is a Hobbit.

Name: Bob
Text: Unique. Hobbit. Playable at Bree. Also playable at any site in Arthedain or The Shire if you discard a Memories Recalled. A company containing Barliman Butterbur may play Bob at tapped sites. tap: fullfill the requirement of discarding Lost Knowledge for a card played with/on his company.

Name: Business Elsewhere
Text: Playable at the beginning of the movement/hazard phase (but after cards are drawn) on your avatar if his company moves through a region containing a Dark-hold [D] (or region adjacent). Untap target character if tapped; he splits off from the company and forms his own company with the same site path as his original company. He immediately faces a separate movement/hazard phase with a hazard limit of two. Creatures keyed to Dark-hold may always be played against his company. Afterwards, he is considered "off to the side" until he joins his original company at any time during their site phase.

Name: Come Back All of Itself
Text: Play to bring one hero ally discarded from play this turn from your discard pile to your hand. Alternatively, playable at any time when one of your hero allies needs to be discarded from play: bring the ally to your hand instead.

Name: Golden Chain
Text: Playable on the bearer of The One Ring at a Haven [h]H] (even if he is tapped or wounded). Place and keep this card with The One Ring, which now gives 1 fewer mp and 1 fewer corruption point. If the bearer uses The One Ring or any of its bonusses, he must immediately make a CP. This item gives 0 corruption points.

Name: Compass
Text: Ranger only: tap: cancel any effect this turn that would replace the company's new site (except effects from hazards played on a ringbearer or from magic resources). Sage only: tap: if a Knowledge or Lore card is in the company to fulfill all requirements to reveal or move to a hidden site. Bearer makes a CP when this item becomes tapped.

Name: Council of Elrond
Text: Lore. -3 to your P. Any hero player may tap an Elf, Dwarf, Dunadan, or Wizard (or any character he has in play at Rivendell) to allow any action that requires him to search through his discard pile or play deck that phase (regardless of other cards in play; even during opponent's turn). Discard if you are a Fallen-wizard and have 3 P or less, or if Elrond is in play but not at Rivendell. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Council of Elrond2
Text: Playable if 3 or more Elf-lords and/or Wizards are in active play. Tap your avatar (or any character you have in play at Rivendell) to allow any action that phase that requires you to search through your discard pile or play deck (regardless of other cards in play) or that allows you to bring cards from your sideboard to your play deck. Discard this card if the conditions to play it do not exist, or if Elrond is in play but not at Rivendell. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Council of Elrond3
Text: Playable if your opponent is a minion player.Any hero player may discard a Lost Knowledge card from play or tap a character with a mind of 8 or more (10 for a Wizard) he has in play at a Haven [H] to allow any action that requires him to search through his discard pile or play deck that phase (regardless of other cards in play). Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Curunir
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Saruman. Playable on a non-overt company without an avatar or Hobbits. You may play spells on the company as if on Saruman (except Sacrifice of Form). Each character in the company may tap to use a Palantir he bears. You may tap two sages in the company to take a ritual from the discard pile to your hand, or tap a character able to use a spell to take a spell from the discard pile to your hand. Invert this card druing your untap phase; if inverted, discard at the end of your turn. Discard if a character manifestation of Saruman comes into play.

Name: Deeds of Lonely Daring
Text: Playable during the organization phase on a grey agent you have in play as character. The character now is an agent. Discard any allies, hazards, and/or Draw Swords Together he controls. Turn him face down and place him at another site in the same or an adjacent region as his current site. Target agent makes a CP during his untap phase.

Name: Do Not Use It Again
Text: Playable during the organization phase on an item in a company containing 3 or more characters at a Haven [H]. Target item is "concealed." While concealed, it is worth half its normal mp (round down), gives 0 Ccorruption points, and cannot be used. Concealed items cannot be discarded or stored and are not affected by hazards or resources. Discard this card if the company size is below 3, during the organization phase if you so choose, or if bearer becomes wounded in CvCC.

Name: Down the Hurrying Waters
Text: Playable during the organization phase on a company at a port-on-river site containing a scout or a ranger. The company may move with port movement to any site with the same port-on-river keyword.

Name: Eagle-watch
Text: Unique. Playable at Isildur's Tomb or Daeron's Pool if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: if an Eagle ally, Gandalf, or Radagast is in the company (+3). May not be influenced by a character in an overt company. If you are a Wizard or Elf-lord, you may play Spying out the Land as though it were a spell and a hero resource (ignore its playability requirements).

Name: Enchanted Paths
Text: Spell. Wizard only. Playable on a company. The company's current site is considered a hidden site. For any other company, to reveal this site as a new site and/or move through the region containing the site, make a roll and add the mind of any character and ally in the company that taps (10 for avatar): if the result is less than 12 the company may not move to the site or through the region. Wizard makes a CP modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Eresselen
Text: Jewel. May not be a starting minor item, unless your starting company includes a Dunadan ranger with a home site in Eriador. May only be played after a successful influence attempt against a Dunadan or Elf faction at a site in Eriador. Ranger only: +1 EI against Dunedain and Elves. tap: give bearer the warrior skill this turn. tap: allow bearer to play Wielded Twice as though he were a sage this turn.

Name: Estel
Text: Unique. Playable only on Strider or Thorongil. Unless target character is at a Haven [H], tap a Wizard or Elf-lord in his company to play this card. +1 to his CP. He may tap to reveal an on-guard card played at his current or new site, or to cancel an effect (in the same chain-of-effects) that required an agent at his site to tap. When he taps in this fashion, invert this card. If inverted, this card gives 1 mp.

Name: Fatty Lumpkin
Text: Unique. Horse. Playable at a tapped or untapped Tom's House by a character controlling Tom Bombadil or Goldberry. tap: cancel any hazard effect that would discard an ally, or return an ally that has been discarded this turn from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Flight Unmarked
Text: Playable on a company at the end of the organization phase. Tap a ranger and a scout (or an avatar with either of these skills). The company may (attempt to) move to an Under-deeps site with a surface site in the same or an adjacent region as their current site; or vice versa. They are considered to use both region and Under-deeps movement. Any required roll for moving to/from the surface site must still be made. Alternatively, tap a ranger or a scout to fulfill all requirements for moving to a hidden site.

Name: Fly, You Fools!
Text: Playable on a company facing an attack created by an on-guard creature. The attack cannot be cancelled and must be faced by your avatar or the highest prowess character in the company (your choice; as if a single character company). After the attack, this character splits from the company, and you must choose a new site card for the company in the same or an adjacent region. Tap all untapped characters and allies in target company, and opponent may play two hazards on the company (as if they were moving to the site during the movement/hazard phase).

Name: Council of Elrond4
Text: Playable on a Haven at [H] which at least 3 mani- festations of Elf-lords and Wizards are in play. For every of such character you tap add a token to this card. Remove one token from this card to allow you to access your play deck regardless of any hazards in play; remove two tokens to allow you to access your discard pile regardless of any hazard in play. Invert this card if add tokens to this card; place this card in your sideboard if you remove two or more tokens, while it is already inverted.

Name: The Cock Crows
Text: Cancels a Troll attack. Alternatively, if Gates of Morning is in play, it forces the discard of one hazard permanent-event.

Name: Well Aimed
Text: Playable on a character bearing and able to use a bow, when another character in his company is facing a strike (not from a detainment or non-combat attack, or in CvCC). Make a roll, adding the character's prowess (+3 if he is Nando or Silvan) and the normal mp of the bow he bears. If the result is higher than the strike's prowess, modify the strike by a combined value of -3 to prowess and/or body. If target character is Nando or Silvan, you may shuffle this card into your play deck instead of discarding it from play. Cannot be duplicated for a given strike.

Name: Test of Lore
Text: Sage only, and only if a character in his company has a Gold Ring. Play to test a Gold Ring; subtract one from the result of the roll (or draw).

Name: Spirit-namer
Text: Playable on a sage with a home site in The Northern Waste bearing a rune item. Target character becomes a spirit-namer and may tap to discard a disease played on the company or an entity therein. +1 to his CP. tap: while at a Border-hold [B] in The Northern Waste to take Song of Appeasement from your discard pile to your hand.Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Tear of Yavanna
Text: Playable at a Ruins & Lairs [R] in The Northern Waste, if Land Reborn is in play and you discard an inverted Vision Path froma character in the company. Make a roll: add 1 for each Elf and each sage in the company, and 1 for each Tear of Yavanna in play. If the result is greater than 9, this card is successfully played; otherwise take it back to hand. +1 to body. Bearer may not untap, but he may heal (from wounded to tapped) during the untap phase. This card may only be stored during the site phase at Evermist. You may include up to 4 copies of this card in your deck and sideboard combined.tap: cancel an Awakened Plant attack against the company.

Name: The Crist-i-Sulhoth
Text: Unique. Weapon. Rune item. Playable at any Ruins and Lairs [R] in The Northern Waste if the company has faced an attack by Spirits of Cold and Ice this turn. +1 to prowess (against a Demon or Spawn strike: +3 to prowess, +2 to body to a maximum of 10, and -2 to target's body). Sage only: tap: during opponents turn to take True Spirits of the North Wind to hand from your discard pile or play deck (reshuffle), if opponent's company contains Eloeklo, Demon of the North Wind and reveals bearer's site as its new site.

Name: The Arkenstone
Text: Unique. Jewel. +3 to bearer's direct influence against Dwarves and Dwarf factions. If held by a Dwarf, The Arkenstone gives 5 marshalling points and 4 corruption points. The Arkenstone may be tapped to untap a Dwarf character in the same company, but target Dwarf must make a corruption check modified by -2.

Name: Emerald of the Mariner
Text: Unique. Hoard item. Jewel. Bearer receives +1 to all of his corruption checks. Controlling player may keep one more card than normal in his hand. This item gives zero corruption points.

Name: Emerald of Doriath
Text: Unique. Hoard item. Jewel. +1 to direct influence against Elves and Elf factions. If bearer is a Wizard, your general influence is increased by two.

Name: Elf-path
Text: Playable only at the end of the organization phase. Tap an Elf. If his company's site path only has one or two regions with no Dark-domains [{d}] and no Shadow-lands [{s}], opponent may only play hazard creatures this turn that are keyed to the company's site.

Name: Echo of All Joy
Text: Play on a resource long-event if Doors of Night is not in play. The long-event is not discarded as normal during a long-event phase. Discard Echo of All Joy and target long-event when any play deck is exhausted or when Doors of Night comes into play.

Name: Umli Traders
Text: Unique. Playable at Vasaran Ahjo if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Dwarves (+1), Elves (-1), Men (+1), Umli (+3). May only be played as a minion resource by a character in a covert company. This faction gives 2 mp if placed under Profitable Trade.

Name: Vision Path
Text: Ritual. Playable on an Elf at Evermist if the Keeper of the Lodge Elf is there. taTapp the Elf if untapped. All influence attempts against target Elf (or attempts to return him to your hand) are cancelled. Any dark enchantments on him are discarded. +1 to his CP. While this card is not inverted, the Elf cannot make any influence, riddling, offering, or flattery attempts. taInvert this card during the site phase at a Ruins & Lairs [R] or site where Information is playable in The Northern Waste. Cannot be duplicated on a given Elf.

Name: Dwarven Hoard
Text: Tap a Dwarf at a Dark-hold [{D}] or Shadow-hold [{S}]. The site is considered to contain a hoard until the end of the turn.

Name: Dragon's Hunger
Text: Playable on a Dragon or Drake attack. If one is available, opponent must discard a hazard creature from his hand; this reduces the company's hazard limit by one. Otherwise, the attack is cancelled and the opponent must  reveal his hand.

Name: Dragon-lore
Text: Lore. Playable on a sage during the site phase at an untapped site where "Information" is playable. Tap the sage and the site. During a site phase at a tapped Dragon's lair, tap bearer and discard Dragon-lore. Search your play deck and/or discard pile for any item playable at the Dragon's lair. This item may be immediately played with the bearer's company.

Name: Dragon-feuds
Text: Playable during the organization phase. For the rest of the turn, you may discard a Dragon or Drake hazard creature from your hand to cancel a Dragon or Drake attack against any of your companies.

Name: Cram
Text: Food. Discard to untap bearer. Alternatively, discard during organization phase to allow its bearer's company to play an additional region card.

Name: Cloudless Day
Text: Environment. Playable only if Gates of Morning is in play. Whenever a company faces a hazard creature attack, the defender may choose which characters in the company will be the targets of the attack's strikes (regardless of tapped status, wounded status, and the normal abilities of the attack).

Name: Burglary
Text: Tap a character to make a burglary attempt at a site in lieu of facing its automatic-attacks. Tap the site and make a roll modified by +2 if the character is a scout and +3 if he is a hobbit. If the result is greater than 10, an item normally playable at the site may be played with the character. If the attempt fails, the character must face all automatic attacks alone.

Name: Bow of Dragon-horn
Text: Unique. Hoard item. Bow. Warrior only: tap bow to reduce the number of strikes from one hazard creature attack not keyed to a site by one (to a minimum of one).

Name: Bounty of the Hoard
Text: Playable during the site phase. One minor or major item may be played at a tapped site that contains a hoard.

Name: Belegaer
Text: Playable during organization phase on a company moving without region cards. Company may move from a site of origin in one of the following regions to a new site in one of the following regions: Lindon, Elven Shores, Eriadoran Coast, Andrast Coast, Bay of Belfalas, Mouths of the Anduin, Enedhwaith, Old Pukel-land, Andrast, Anfalas, Belfalas, Lebennin, and Harondor. The site path is [ccc] and the hazard limit is decreased by two to a minimum of two.

Name: Arrows Shorn of Ebony
Text: Hoard Item. Warrior only: discard Arrows Shorn of Ebony to modify a strike from a hazard creature attack not keyed to a site by -1 prowess, -2 body. If this strike is defeated, all other subsequent failed strikes from this attack are automatically defeated.

Name: And Forth He Hastened
Text: Untap a character in your Wizard's company.

Name: Alert the Folk
Text: Playable on a company facing a Dragon or Drake attack (not Earcaraxe). Discard from your hand any one or two factions playable at sites in Northern Rhovanion, Iron Hills, Woodland Realm, or Anduin Vales. All characters facing the attack gain a bonus to their prowess equal to the total marshalling point values (as printed on their cards) of the factions discarded.

Name: Enruned Shield
Text: Unique. Hoard item. Shield. +3 to body to a maximum of 10. Warrior only: tap Enruned Shield to cause one strike against bearer to be ineffectual (i.e., it doesn't fail and it is not successful).

Name: Song of Appeasement
Text: Song. Playable on a spirit-namer if his company has faced an Animal, Dragon, Spider, Wolf, Awakened Plant, Maia, or Spirit attack this turn.
