Tap the spirit-namer to discard a hazard permanent or long-event in play, or make a roll with 1 die and add the number of spirit- namers in the company; the hazard limit for his company is lowered by half the result (round down). On an unmodified roll of 1 or 2, opponent may immediately play The Balance of Things or Spirit Crime on the character from his discard pile or sideboard. Spirit-namer makes a CPC.

Name: Fast Asleep
Text: +3 to one burglary attempt. Alternatively, -2 to the prowess of one automatic-attack.

Name: Skis and Fur-coats
Text: Playable on a company at a Border-hold [B]. taYou may tap a ranger to cancel the effects of one Fell-winter, Long-winter, Snowstorm, or Snow in the Mountains for the company: make make a roll for each character in the company, modified by adding the number of Wilderness [w] in the company's site path, -2 if the character is a ranger and/or has a home site in The Northern Waste, and +2 if a Hobbit or Troll. If the result is greater than the character's body, he becomes wounded.Discard this card if the company moves to a site not in The Northern Waste or its adjacent regions.

Name: Hithailin
Text: Ritual. Playable on an Elf at Evermist. +2 to his CP for using spells. Rotate this card 90deg (or place a token) whenever target Elf stores an Information or Lost Knowledge resource at Orod Certhas: you may take one spell from your sideboard or discard pile to your hand. This card may be stored at any Elf-hold (not Evermist or Helloth). If stored, it gives 1 mp for each time rotated (to a maximum of 4). Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Habergeon of Silver
Text: Hoard Item. Armor. Bearer recieves +2 body to a maximum of 10.

Name: Iron Mountains
Text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company containing a ranger. If the company moves with regionmovement, tapap a ranger to move as if the following pairs of regions were adjacent: Angmar and Everdalf, Angmar and Dragon Gap, Angmar and Talath Uichel, Grey Mountain Narrows and Forovirkain, Gundabad and Talath Uichel, Gundabad and Everdalf. The company faces an attack at the beginning of its movement/hazard phase: Orcs -- 2 strikes with 7 prowess. Alternatively, if the site moved to is in any of the regions listed above, the hazard limit is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 2). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Keeper of the Lodge
Text: Playable at Evermist on an Elf with a mind of 7 or more. Tap the Elf if untapped. +1 to his CP. All influence attempts against target Elf (or attempts to return him to your hand) are cancelled. While he is at Evermist, he requires only 3 points of influence to control and cannot be controlled by EI. Target Elf may tap during the end-of-turn phase to bring one ritual from your discard pile or sideboard to your play deck (reshuffle). Discard if he is at a site more than 3 regions away from Evermist or not in The Northern Waste, or if an Elf with a higher mind is at his site. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Land Reborn
Text: Unique. You may bring this card into play from your sideboard, if you have a company at the same site in The Northern Waste as Radagast and you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. For each stored Tear of Yavanna in play, rotate this card 90deg; for each time rotated it gives 2 mp and the following effects apply (cumulative): One: +1 to your hand size. Neither so Ancient nor so Potent cannot target a stored Tear of Yavanna. Two: Spirits of Ice and Cold attacks receive -2 strikes and -4 prowess (to a minumum of 1). Make a roll for each Deathwind, Snowstorm, Fell Winter or Long Winter in play; if the result is greater than 6, it is discarded. Three: overt characters at or moving to a site in The Northern Waste receive -1 prowess; their controlling player's hand size is reduced by 1.Four: all non-Coastal Sea regions in The Northern Waste become a single Wilderness [w].

Name: Losrandir
Text: Playable at any tapped or untapped Ruins & Lairs [R] in The Northern Waste, if the influence check is greater than 10.Standard Modifications: non-overt characters with a home site in The Northern Waste (+2), if Radagast is your Wizard (+3). Cannot be duplicated at a given site. Place this faction in your sideboard to take a food item from your sideboard to your hand.

Name: Lossidil
Text: Unique. Playable at Helloth if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Elves (+1), Elves with a home site in The Northern Waste (+3), Elves with home site Thranduil's Halls (-2), Dwarves (-2), Men (-2). tap: at any time to allow Snow-elves to be keyed to any region in The Northern Waste against an overt company.

Name: Major Spell-bead
Text: Playable at any non-Dragon's lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in The Northern Waste. Rune item. Bearer cannot be the target of disease hazards. Ranger only: tap: cancel an attack (not an automatic-attack) by Orc, Trolls, Dwarves, Giants or Men keyed to a site or region in The Northern Waste. tatap: give bearer +4 prowess against a strike he is facing; discard this item after the strike. Bearer makes a CP when this item becomes tapped.

Name: Gold Belt of Lorien
Text: Unique. Only playable at Lorien. +1 direct influence to bearer.

Name: Merikoirat
Text: Unique. Playable at any site in a Coastal Sea [c] region in The Northern Waste if the influence attempt is greater than 9.Standard Modifications: Elves (+1).

Name: Minor Spell-bead
Text: Playable only at a non-Dragon's lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in The Northern Waste. Rune item. May only be included with a starting company if the company contains a character with a home site in The Northern Waste. +1 EI against characters with a mind lower than bearer's. Sage only: when bearer is required to tap for the use of a skill card, he may tap this item instead. Bearer makes a CP.

Name: Adamant Helmet
Text: Hoard Item. Helmet. +1 to body to a maximum of 9. Cancels all dark enchantments targetting bearer.

Name: Gift of Comprehension
Text: Lore. Playable on a Dunadan at a Haven [{H}]; tap the Dunadan. Gives the bearer sage skill.

Name: Press on towards Shelter
Text: Any non-overt company may move with one extra region in their site path if moving to a Haven [H]. If Doors of Night or Mordo is in play, this also applies to companies moving to a Free-hold [F]. Cannot be duplicated. Discard when your play deck is exhausted.

Name: Forod
Text: Playable during organization phase on a company moving without regon cards. Company may move from a site of origin in one of the following regions to a new site in one of the following regions: Lindon, Forochel, Angmar, Gundabad, Grey Mountain Narrows, Withered Heath, and Iron Hills. The site path is [w w w] and the hazard limit is decreased by two to a minimum of two.

Name: Rays of Helecthil
Text: Environment. Playable on a company in The Northern Wasteif Doors of Night is in play. Target and discard a corruption card played on a character in the company or environment card affecting the company's movement or site path. Alternatively, any non-Elf in the company may tap to untap an Elf in the company this turn. This card may also be played as a hazard: untap all Elves and characters with a home site in The Northern Waste in the company and tap all other characters and allies with a mind. Cannot be duplicated in a given turn.

Name: Rays of Helecthil2
Text: Environment. Playable on a company in The Northern Wasteif Doors of Night is in play. Discard a corruption card a character in the company controls or an environment card that affects the company's movement or site path. Alternatively, for every region in the company's site path you may tap a non-Elf to untap an Elf in the company this turn. This card may also be played as a hazard: untap all Elves and characters with a home site in The Northern Waste in the company and tap all other characters and allies with a mind. Cannot be duplicated in a given turn.

Name: Ring of Detection
Text: Unique. Ring. Playable at any Ruins & Lairs [R] in The Northern Waste. tap: if bearer is a sage or Elf to reveal an on-guard card played on his company new or current site. If the card could never be legally revealed at the site as an on-guard card, it must be discarded. Bearer makes a CP modified by -1.

Name: Ring of Detection2
Text: Unique. Ring. Playable at any Ruins & Lairs [R] in The Northern Waste. tap: if bearer is a sage or Elf to reveal an on-guard card played on his company new or current site. If the card could never be legally revealed at the site as an on-guard card, it must be discarded. Bearer makes a CP modified by -1.

Name: Ring of Healing
Text: Unique. Ring. Playable at Evermist. tap: during your organization phase if bearer is an Elf sage with a mind of 6 or more, to heal a wounded character in his company and make a roll: if the result is greater than 9, character may heal from wounded to untapped, otherwise he heals from wounded to tapped. Bearer makes a CP modified by - 1.

Name: Ring of Healing2
Text: Unique. Ring. Playable at Evermist. tap: during your organization phase if bearer is an Elf sage with a mind of 6 or more, to heal a wounded character in his company and make a roll: if the result is greater than 9, character may heal from wounded to untapped, otherwise he heals from wounded to tapped. Bearer makes a CP modified by - 1.

Name: Ring of the Protector
Text: Unique. Ring. Playable at Malgolodh's Cave. May also be played as a free minor item after a successful influence attempt against a Man faction in at a site in The Northern Waste. A non-overt bearer may choose to have a strike he faces (except from this item) be ineffectual: bearer must immediately face a strike (cannot be cancelled, type is bearer's race) with a prowess equal to the original strike -3; if the strike is successful, bearer is taken prisoner at his current or new site (rescue-attack: 1 strike with a prowess equal to bearer's base prowess +7).

Name: Flatter a Foe
Text: Flattery attempt. Playable on a character whose company is facing an attack of the type listed below. Character makes an influence check (modified by his unused direct influence and +2 if a diplomat). If successful, the attack is cancelled and the hazard limit for the character's company is decreased by two. This influence check is successful if the result is greater than: 10 against a Dragon; 11 against Men or Drakes; 12 against Trolls, Orcs, Elves and Giants.

Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

Text: Unique. Jewel. +5 to bearer's direct influence against Dwarves and Dwarf factions. Each Dwarf in play has +1 mind. If the bearer of this item is at the same site as a Dwarf character, you may discard this item to force the discard of the non-avatar Dwarf (and all non-follower cards he controls).

Name: Dark Forges
Text: Sage only during the site phase at an untapped site where Information is playable. Tap the sage and the site. Sage may not untap until this card is stored at a Darkhaven [K]. During your organization phase, you may tap a sage at a Darkhaven and discard a stored Dark Forges to retrieve any one or two minor or major battle-gear or technology items from your discard pile (not a unique, hoard, or dual item). These items must be placed under the control of characters in the sage's company.

Name: Dark Embassy
Text: Black player only. Playable on a non-overt diplomat. Target diplomat may use In the Name of Mordor to cancel a detainment attack of the same type as his race against his company. If an automatic-attack was thus cancelled, any influence attempt at the site that turn is modified by +3. Additionally, if target diplomat controls Faithless Steward, he need not tap to use In the Name of Mordor.

Name: Der Arkenstein
Text: Unique. +5 to bearer's direct influence against Dwarves and Dwarf factions. Each Dwarf in play has +1 mind. If the bearer of this item is at the same site as a Dwarf character, you may discard this item to force the discard of the Dwarf (and all non-follower cards he controls).

Name: Curse the Baggins!
Text: Black player only. Prisoner. Playable on Stinker at Barad-dur or Dol Guldur. Place Stinker and this card "off to the side": he is considered a prisoner at the site. Each of your untap phases, make a body check for Stinker modified by +1. If still in play afterwards, you may discard him to take My Precious from your discard pile or play deck to your hand. If eliminated, place this card in your mp; it gives 2 ally mp and all your ring tests are modified by +1 (+3 if at Bag End).

Name: Cult of the Long Night
Text: Cult. Playable on a sage at Nan Morsereg if you eliminate a trophy or prisoner in the company. While Doors of Night is in play, target character gains +1 prowess and body, and +1 to his CP from using magic resources. If you have more than one copy of Cult of the Long Night in play, this card gives 1 faction mp. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Cult of the Dark Lord
Text: Black player only. Cult. Playable on a Man-hold in Mordor, Bay of Ormal, The Sun-lands, or the Great Central Plains, where you have a unique faction in play. Eliminate one of your non-Ringwraith characters at the site (or a prisoner in the company). The site becomes one of your Darkhavens [K] and loses all its automatic-attacks; any automatic-attacks at other versions of the site become normal attacks. Discard if you do not have a unique faction in play at the site or when the site leaves play. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Creating Their Domain
Text: Place this card on your Ringwraith if he is in play. His company may move with region movement to any site in the same region as one of his home sites. Bade to Rule is not discarded as per its card text when moving to such a site. While he is at one of his home sites, your Ringwraith is considered at a Darkhaven [K] for the purpose of Bade to Rule, Black Rider, or Heralded Lord, and for using any of his abilities. You may start the game with this card in lieu of playing a minor item.

Name: Cracking Whip
Text: Playable on Thong of Fire, Whip, or Whip of Many Thongs. May be played with your starting company in lieu of a minor item. If the bearer of target item is a leader, during the organization phase you may tap the item and make a body check modified by -1 for another character in his company; if still in play afterwards, that character may untap and his company may move an extra region that turn. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

Name: Contested Powers of Mirkwood2
Text: Quest. Only playable in lieu of playing a minor item with a starting company; any player may bring Contested Powers of Mirkwood into play from their sideboard. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. Tap a unique faction you have in play at a site in Mirkwood or its adjacent regions to take one Smoke on the Wind, Burning Rick, Cot, and Tree, or a Stolen Knowledge resource from your sideboard to your hand; then flip this card.

Name: Consumed by Dragon-fire
Text: Playable when making an influence attempt against a Dragon faction. Place one unique hero item the company contains (not The One Ring or Bilbo's Magic Ring) in your out-of-play pile. The influence attempt is modified by the number the removed item would give as if discarded for the attempt (a special item counts as greater item). If successful, place this card in your mp: unless you are a Dragon-lord it gives 2 mp.

Name: Circle of Swords
Text: Magic. Sorcery. Playable on a sorcery-using character facing an attack (before strikes are assigned). For each weapon in the company you may assign one strike of the attack to the sorcery-using character, regardless of his status or the attack's abilities. Each strike must be resolved separately. The prowess and body of such a strike are modified by subtracting any bonus the corresponding weapon would give its bearer against it. Cannot be duplicated for a given attack. Your sorcery-user makes a CP modified by -4.

Name: Cham-en-Faroth
Text: Unique. Mind Ring. Playable only by The Grimburgoth, at any site where gold rings are playable in Mirkwood orits adjacent regions; or by any character if Khamul the Easterling is in play. -1 to bearer's mind. +1 to his EI and +2 to his CP from using magic cards. +2 prowess against ringbearers in CvCC. Place any defeated creature whose attack or strike was affected by a sorcery card this phase with this ring. For every 2 creatures placed with it, all creature attacks against the company receive a -1 modification to prowess and body.

Name: Captain no More
Text: Command. Playable on a leader in the company of an avatar or Warlord; may also be played on a leader in your starting company in lieu of a minor item or starting stage card. Target character is not considered a leader. Discard any other command cards he controls. He receives -1 to his mind and +1 to his CP. His EI is reduced to 0 and he may not have followers. You may discard this card if target character is in a company with an avatar or Warlord. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Call to Arms
Text: Command. Playable on a Warlord. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. Discard this card to untap a faction you have in play at the Warlord's site. tap: make a roll and add your P total; if the result is greater than 6, take a faction playable at the Warlord's site from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Breeder's Stock
Text: Command. Playable on a Warlord. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. tap: during the organization phase to make a roll and add your P total; if the result is greater than 7, bring a non-unique character playable at the Warlord's site into play (in addition to another character played this turn), which may be taken from your discard pile or hand.

Name: Dragon Marked in Red2
Text: Quest. Only playable in lieu of playing a minor item with a starting company; any player may bring Dragon Marked in Red into play from his sideboard. When you play a unique item at a site in Withered Heath or its adjacent regions, you may take one Information resource, unique Dragon manifestation, or hoard minor item from your discard pile or sideboard to your hand; then flip this card. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Bone-basher
Text: Unique. Only playable if the company has faced an Orc attack this turn. Weapon. Mace. Two-handed. Warrior only: +2 prowess (+4 if Doors of Night is in play) to a maximum of 10; -2 to target's body. tap: when CvCC is declared to tap one of opponent's characters or reduce the number of excess strikes against your company by 2.

Name: Dragon-helm of Uon
Text: Unique. Helmet. Playable only by Khamul the Ringwraith at any site in Wilderland or the Great Central Plains (does not tap the site). This item only affects Khamul; he gains the scout skill and need not be taken back to hand on a body check result of 7 or 8. +2 prowess against Dragons and Drakes. Any gold ring item is considered playable with Khamul's company at sites where gold rings are playable. tap: shuffle any Black Rain into your play deck instead of discarding it from play this phase.

Name: Elf-skin War Drum
Text: Instrument. tap: take one Tribal Banner or command card from your discard pile to your hand. tap: make one non-unique Troll ally playable at the company's untapped Shadow-hold [S] Orc-hold this turn.

Name: Spoliation
Text: Dragon-lord only. Playable during the site phase if your Dragon-lord is at a non-Ruins & Lairs [R] site. If your Dragon-lord successfully plays an item this turn, he is not tapped and may face all of the site's automatic-attacks again to play another item. He may do this as often as he likes, but receives -3 to his prowess for every additional automatic-attack faced. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

Name: Stalk the Halls
Text: Roaming mode. Playable on a Dragon during the organization phase. Return this card to your hand: when you play another mode card, or during your organization phase if you so choose. The Dragon may move using Under-deeps movement. +1 to his Under-deeps movement rolls. -2 to his prowess if at or moving to an Under-deeps site with a surface site which is not a Dragon's Den or Darkhaven [K].

Name: Targeted for the Hunt
Text: Dragon only. Playable during the organization phase on at Dragon character not at his home site or a Dragon's Den [K]. Name a hazard creature that can be keyed to his current site or current the region (by type or name). If the hazard player has such a creature in his hand, it immediately attacks the Dragon character as though he were a one character company. Otherwise he must show his hand.

Name: Territorial Disputes
Text: Dragon-lord only. Playable on your Dragon-lord, if at his home site.His company may move with region movement to and from any Dragon'sLair corresponding to a Dragon hazard -or resource manifestation in play (resulting in legal movement). Attacks of this Dragon manifestation against his company cannot be cancelled. If your Dragon-lord is at such Lair, he faces an attack at the beginning of the site phase: the duplicate of the site's first automatic-attack, modified by +1 to prowess and strikes. Immediately after this attack, tap your Dragon-lord or discard this card. If not discarded, make a roll to play an item based on the result: 2-3: minor item; 2-6: gold ring item; 7-9: major item; 10-12: greater item; any result: special item playable at the site. This item may also be played from your discard pile. If successfully played, place this card in your mpp.

Name: Thralls
Text: Dragon-lord only. Playable at a tapped or untapped non-Dragon's Den site in the same region as one of your Dragon's Dens [K] if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Dragon-lord (+3) tap: during the end-of-turn phase to allow characters to store items at the site where this faction was played (these items are considered stored at your nearest Dragon's Den). Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

Name: Throkmaw Roused
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Throkmaw. Playable at Shab Arch if the influence check is greater than 14.Modifications: influencer discards a major item (+2) or a greater item (+7); if a manifestation of Angurth, Itangast, Scatha or Smaug is in play (-3). All attacks by manifestations of Throkmaw against any of your companies are cancelled. Any company moving in Dragon Gap, Forovirkain, Grey Mountains, Talath Oiohelka and/or Talath Uichel faces an attack: Fire-dragon -- 3 strikes at 15/8 prowess/body (attacker chooses defending characters).

Name: Treason He Sent Forth
Text: Dragon-lord only. Diplomat only. Playable on your diplomat Dragon-lord making an influence attempt against an opponent's Man faction at a Border-hold [B]. Treat the influence attempt against the faction as if you revealed the faction from hand. If the attempt is successful, put the faction in your mp together with this card; the faction is considered Gathered Bones.

Name: Under His Spell
Text: Dragon-magic. Playable on a Dragon. He may tap to play Memories Stolen on a character he faces in CvCC; Memories Stolen may also be taken from your sideboard or discard pile.

Name: Unquenchable Flames
Text: Playable on a site at which you have successfully played Burning Rick, Cot and Tree or Smoke on the Wind. Any factions in play at the site are returned to their owner's hand. Additionally, any version of the site becomes a Ruins & Lairs [R].

Name: Unquenchable Flames2
Text: Playable on a site where you have successfully played People Diminished, Smoke on the Wind, Tempest of Fire, or Burning Rick, Cot, and Tree this turn. Choose one of the following effects for this card (rotate it to indicate the effect): not rotated: one character at the site (your choice) becomes wounded (no body check is required); rotated once: one faction in play at the site is discarded; rotated twice: one event played on any version of the site is discarded; rotated thrice: all versions of the site become a Ruins & Lairs [R] and resources that tap the site cannot be played.

Name: Unquenchable Flames3
Text: Any factions played at sites at which a company successfully plays Burning Rick, Cot and Tree or Smoke on the Wind, are returned to their owner's hand.

Name: Veil Removed
Text: Dragon only. Dragon-magic. Playableon a Dragon character's company during the movement/hazard phase. Discard one hazard permanent-event played on the company or an associated entity.

Name: Wealth of His Halls
Text: Dragon-lord only. Playable on a Dragon's Den [K]. One non-unique, non-special item normally playable at the site is playable at the site. This does not tap the site and may be done at a tapped site; place this card with the item, it gives 0 mp at all times. Additionally, if this card is one of your starting events, you may include non-unique hoard minor items in your starting company. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Whispering Voices
Text: Dragon-lord only. Playable during the site phase on a company without a Dragon. Instead of making a normal influence attempt to bring a character into play, you may make a roll, modified by your Dragon-lord's unused EI if he taps. If the result is greater than the character's mind plus 1, he joins the company (otherwise discard the character).

Name: Whispers of Wealth
Text: Dragon-lord only. Greed mode. Playable during the organization phase on your Dragon-lord at a Dragon'sDen [K]. Return this card to your hand: when you play another mode card, or during your organization phase if you so choose. When an opponent's company plays an item at a site within 4 regions away from your current Dragon's Den (6 regions for a winged Dragon) you may discard this card to relocate your Dragon-lord to that site. Your Dragon-lord must engage in CvCC and 1 strike must target the character that has played the highest mp item this turn.

Name: Wide Awake
Text: Dragon-lord only. Place this card on yourDragon-lord if he is in play. If moving to a non- Dragon's Den, non-Ruins & Lairs site, you draw two more cards than normal for his company (to a maximum of 3). You may discard this card at the end of your organization phase or during your opponent's site phase to untap your Dragon-lord. Discard this card if your Dragon-lord is in dream mode. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Wielder of Old Arts
Text: Dragon-lord only. Place this card on your Dragon-lord if he is in play. Your Dragon- lord may tap during your end-of-turn phase to take one Dragon-magic card from your discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Wyrm's Blood
Text: Playable on a Dragon. While target Dragon is wounded, every non-Dragon creature played against his company costs two against the hazard limit. Discard this card (at any time) after a successful strike against the Dragon: the strike is also considered failed (make any body checks to see if the strike is defeated). Cannot be duplicated on a given Dragon.

Name: Wyrm's Reek
Text: Cold-dragon only. Playable on a Dragon if CvCC is declared, before resolving the attack. You may play one Animal, Wolf or Spider hazard creature (as a creature) without asterisk (*) on opponent's company before or after resolving CvCC; the creature must be keyable to the Dragon's current site, or to the region containing the site. This card may also be played during your opponent's turn.

Name: Feagwath
Text: Unique. Undead. Playable at a site in Dagorlad by a magic-using character bearing a Mind Ring. Cannot be played by a Lord-player. Can use shadow-magic. Feagwath's company is always overt. All characters in the company receive -1 to their CP. tap: cancel an Undead attack against his company or take one Gold Chains in the Wind from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Favoured by The Eye
Text: Black player only. Playable on your Ringwraith at Barad-dur or Dol Guldur if you receive more mp from unique items and killed creatures than any other player. Your Ringwraith becomes a Warlord and a leader and receives +3 EI. He may use Threats as if he were a warrior, and also for any influence attempt (as if influencing a faction). Discard if Favoured by The Eye is played by another player. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Dungeons of Dol Guldur
Text: Playable on Dol Guldur. Your rolls for Breeder's Stock at Dol Guldur are automatically successful. You may play items stored here during the organization phase (as if during the site phase). If your Warlord is at Dol Guldur and this card is discarded, you may untap him or take one Drums or a command card from your sideboard to your hand. Discard when the site leaves play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Spell-bound
Text: Dragon-lord only. Dragon-magic. Playable on your Dragon-lord. Each of opponent's companies movingthrough the region containing your Dragon-lord's current site must make a roll, modified by +2 for each sage, +1 for each scout or diplomat, and by -2 if your Dragon-lord is in dream mode. If the result is 10 or less, your opponent must replace the company's new site with his version of your Dragon-lord's current site (if available); the company may do nothing during the site phase. Discard this card afterwards.Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Bolvag
Text: Unique. Sauron only. Demon. Orc. Playable at Minas Durlith. May use shadow-magic and spirit-magic. When he is at Barad-dur or Minas Durlith, Bolvag may attempt to influence factions playable there as if he were a character, and you may eliminate an Orc in the company to untap the site. Unless The Ongrum is in the company, discard Bolvag if he moves to a site not in Mordor nor with a surface site in Mordor.

Name: Blades of Sorcery
Text: Magic. Sorcery. Playable on a Ringwraith. If the Ringwraith controls Morgul-blade or The Fiery Blade during CvCC and a strike against him is unsuccessful, instead of making a body check for the defeated character you may place this card with him together with one Morgul-knife, The Pale Sword, or Wound of Long Burden from hand. If the character is eliminated, you receive him as kill mp. Discard if the attached hazard leaves play. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Blood Money
Text: Diplomat only. Playble on a diplomat in a covert company facing a non-automatic-, non-detainment attack by Elves, Dwarves, Dunedain, Men or Wose (before strikes are assigned). Discard if none of your characters are wounded by the attack. Discard when any of your companies ever defeats an attack by Elves, Dwarves, Dunedain or Men.

Name: Burgling Miserably
Text: Scout only. Playable on a non-overt scout at a Free- hold [F], Border-hold [B], or Ruins & Lairs [R]. Tap scout if untapped. One Swag may be placed with this card. Any Swag placed with this card may be played on the company as if from hand and may be discarded from the company as if a treasure item.

Name: Cave-goblins
Text: Playable at any Under-deeps site with aRuins & Lairs [R] surface site if the influence check is greater than 8.Standard Modifications: Orcs (+2), Leader (+2), Uruk-hai (-3), Trolls (-5). tap: take one Fungi from your discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

Name: Cave-trolls
Text: Unique. Playable at Creb Durga or The Under-caves if the influence check is greater than 9.Standard Modifications: Stone Trolls (-2). tap: allow a Grond played on this faction to affect any Free-hold [F], Border-hold [B] or Dark-hold [D] site where this faction is present. Place such a site with this card (or place a token) instead of discarding it from play. This faction is worth an additional mp for each site placed with it (to a maximum of 5 mp).

Name: Crebain from Dunland
Text: Unique. Playable at any non-Haven site in Dunland if the influence check is greater than 11.Standard Modifications: Saruman is your Wizard (+3), you have Sharku in play (+5). tap: look at 3 random cards from your opponent's hand, if opponent has a company at a site in Eriador or Wilderland (or at any site, if you discard a Crebain or Spying out the Land from hand).

Name: Gift of Deceit
Text: Command. Playable on a Elf, Dwarf, Dunadan, or Man Warlord. tap: bring a skill card your Warlord can use from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle. Warlord makes a CPC. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Gold Reward
Text: Offering Attempt. Playable on a non-overt minion character in lieu of declaring CvCC. Choose an opponent's character and make a roll (+4 if a Ringwraith, +3 if a diplomat). If the result is higher than topponent character's mind minus his corruption point total and CP-modifiers, place this card on him (tap the character if untapped). Discard this card to cancel any effect that would cancel CvCC with this character's company.

Name: Gold Reward2
Text: Playable on a non-overt minion character in lieu of declaring CvCC. Make an influence check against one of opponent's characters (+4 if a Ringwraith, +3 if a diplomat). If the result is higher than the character's mind minus his corruption point total and CP-modifiers, place this card on him (tap the character if untapped). Discard this card to cancel any effect that would cancel CvCC with this character's company.

Name: Grishmoigh
Text: Unique. Ent. Giant. Playable at any Ruins & Lairs [R] in Enedhwaith or its adjacent regions, if you discard a Man, Dwarf, or Dunadan trophy or prisoner from the company. All body checks for defeated Dunadan and Man attacks of which Grishmoigh has faced a strike are modified by +1. Discard Grishmoigh if you have Fuel for Furnaces or a Dunadan faction in play, or if Treebeard is in his company. tap: cancel a non-unique Giant, Troll, or Awakend Plant attack keyed to a Wilderness [w] region (by type or name) against his company.

Name: Helm of Illusions
Text: Unique. Helmet. Place this card on Ardagor if he is in play. May be played with your starting company in lieu of a minor item. If on Ardagor, he gains the diplomat skill and cannot be discarded by a body check result.+3 EI against characters at whose home site you have a faction in play. Ardagor may play Counterfeit on himself as though he were an Orc.

Name: Iron-home
Text: Playable during the organization phase on a minion company. Discard this card to cancel a hazard creature attack against the company keyed to Angmar by name. Black player only: this card may be played with your starting company in lieu of a minor item. If played as such, the company may start the game at Carn Dum. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Of Which They Were Made
Text: Playable on wounded troll. A wild troll may heal (from wounded to tapped) at a site within a Deep Wilderness [ww], if at an under-deep or under-deep surface site; half-trolls and Olog-hai must remove one trophy (two for an Olog-hai) they carry to heal, from wounded to tapped. Shuffle this card into your deck instead of discarding it, if another troll is wounded in the company.

Name: Olog-power
Text: Playable on a Troll. Target Troll may use two-handed battle-gear items as if they were not two-handed. Additionally, when bearer taps to face a strike, he may reduce his prowess by any factor of 3 to give -1 to the body of the strike (for each factor of 3). Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Pretender
Text: Diplomat only. Playable during the site phase on a diplomat in a covert company. Tap the diplomat and name a unique resource permanent-event played on an opponent's hero character of the same race at his current site: opponent must discard this resource. If target character is a Half-orc diplomat, the resource need not be unique and opponent's character may be a Man.

Name: Symbol of Malice
Text: Magic. Shadow-magic. Playable on a site during the site phase by a shadow-magic using character. Tap the site (if not already tapped). This site is never discarded and never untaps for you.When a company enters any version of this site, each character in the company must make a CPC modified by -2 and this card is discarded. Unless he is a Ringwraith, the shadow-magic using character makes a CP modified by -4.

Name: Terror of Cardolan
Text: Ardagor specific. Place this card on Ardagorif he is in play. Your companies with a company size of two or less (or containing Ardagor) may play allies at tapped sites. Followers of Ardagor gain +1 to their CP. Additionally, any non-unique Troll hazard creature may be played at Creb Durga (or keyed to Cardolan if Ardagor is at a site in this region). Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Troll-woods
Text: Unique. Playable during the site phase on Ettenmoors. Replace the site's automatic-attacks with: Trolls -- 1 strike with 10 prowess (detainment against an overt company). Other players cannot play any cards that would make Ettenmoors a Haven [H/K]. Additionally, any non-unique Troll character may be brought into play at this site. Rhudaur becomes a Deep Wilderness [ww] region. Discard when the site leaves active play.

Name: Under His Fist
Text: Command. Playable on a Warlord at a Darkhaven or his home site [K]. The Warlord may control any number of (different) command cards (these are not returned to your hand automatically). At the end of your turn, if he controls more than two command cards, discard one of these or shuffle it back into your play deck. Cannot be duplicated on a given Warlord.

Name: Warlord
Text: Black player only. Playable on a warrior leader with a mind of 7 or more, bearing trophies worth at least 2 mp. Target character becomes a Warlord. +3 to his EI. He may only be controlled by your avatar or GI. You may only have a second copy of Warlord in play if you have 6 or more P, or a third if you have 10 or more P.

Name: Warlord's Lair
Text: Warlord only. Playable during the site phase on your Warlord's home site (not a Darkhaven [K] or Dark-hold [D]). Target site loses all automatic- attacks; nothing is considered playable here as written on the site card. All versions of the site become a hidden site; an opponent't company must tap a ranger to reveal this site. Your characters may heal at this site. Discard when the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Wolves' Feed
Text: Play to untap a wolf ally, a Wolf faction, or a non-unique Scara-hai Orc. Alternatively, playable on a wolf ally facing a strike: if the strike is defeated, the ally receives +2 body this turn.

Name: White Light Broken
Text: Magic. Sorcery. Playable on a sorcery-using character. All of his corruption checks are modified by +2 for the rest of the turn. Alternatively, playable on a sorcery-using Fallen-wizard. -4 to his stage points (to a minimum of 3) for the rest of the turn. Unless the sorcery-using character is a Ringwraith, he makes a corruption check.

Name: Bloodspike
Text: Unique. Hoard item. Weapon. Mace. Two-handed. May not be borne by a Hobbit. Warrior only: +2 prowess to a maximum of 10 (+4 against Dunedain and Men). If bearer is Rogrog, he may tap to untap this item. Troll only: tap: give -1 to the number of strikes from an Elf, Man, Dwarf, Dunadan, or Hobbit attack (to a minimum of 1).

Name: Vile Fumes
Text: Technology. Playable at a tapped or untapped Shadow-hold, Dark-hold, or a site with a Dwarf automatic-attack. Discard during the site phase at a Border- hold or Shadow- hold to make all versions of the site Ruins and Lairs. Its normal automatic-attacks are replaced with: Gas - each character faces 1 strike with 7 prowess (cannot be canceled). Keep Vile Fumes with the site until the site is discarded or returned to its location deck.

Name: The Black Council
Text: Playable during your organization phase in your marshalling points pile if your Ringwraith is in a Darkhaven and you have more marshalling points than your opponent and your opponent is a Ringwraith. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

Name: Black Steed
Text: Horse. Playable at any tapped or untapped Border-hold [B] in Mordor or its adjacent regions. Discard if controlled by an overt character. If each character in the company controls a horse ally, the company may move up to two additional regions. If each Ringwraith in a company controls a Black Steed or Black Horse, the company is in Black Rider mode. Return its controlling Ringwraith to your hand if this ally leaves play. tap: cancel a strike (not from an automatic-attack) against its bearer or itself.

Name: Black Steed2
Text: Horse. Playable at any tapped or untapped Border-hold [B] in Mordor or its adjacent regions. Discard if controlled by an overt character. If each Ringwraith in a company controls a Black Steed or Black Horse, the company is in Black Rider mode. If each character in the company controls a horse ally, the company may move up to two additional regions.tap: cancel a strike (not from an automatic- attack) against its bearer or itself.

Name: Black Ring of Arda
Text: Unique. Spirit Ring. Playable only with a gold ring and after a test indicates a Spirit Ring. Bearer makes a CP each time this card untaps. tap: give bearer warrior, scout, ranger, sage, or diplomat skill this turn (choose one). tap: increase your hand size by one this turn. tap: take one Origins Revealed, Raised Again, or Wisdom to Wield from your discard pile to your hand.
