Text: Dragon-lord only. Place this card on your Dragon-lordif he is in play. Attacks from People Diminished, Smoke on the Wind, Tempest of Fire, and Burning Rick, Cot and Tree, against his company receive +1 to their prowess and strikes and cannot be cancelled. Whenever his company successfully plays one of these cards at a site in a Wilderness [w], rotate this card 90 (or place a token) and you may take one Unquenchable Flames from your sideboard to your hand. This card gives 1 mp for each time rotated. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Gloaming Golden Hoard
Text: Dragon-lord only. Playable on a Dragon's Den [K]. If you have stored hoard and/or treasure items normally worth 10 or more mp (count 1 mp for each such minor item), your hand size is increased by one. If you have stored at least three treasure items, this card gives 1 mp. Discard when the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Voices of Malice
Text: Sage only. Tap a sage to discard one non-environment hazard permanent-event or non-environment hazard long-event. Sage makes a corruption check modified by -2.

Name: War-warg
Text: Wolf. Playable at any tapped or untapped Ruins & Lairs [{R}] with a Wolf automatic-attack. If the War-warg and its controlling character are both targets of strikes from the same attack, you may tap War-warg to give +2 body to its controlling character.

Name: War-wolf
Text: Wolf. Playable at any tapped or untapped Ruins & Lairs [{R}] with a Wolf automatic-attack or at any tapped or untapped Shadow-hold [{S}] with an Orc automatic-attack.

Name: Wargs of the Forochel
Text: Unique. Playable at Lossadan Cairn if the influence check is greater than 10. Once in play, the number required to influence this faction is zero. Standard Modifications: Ice-orcs (+2), Misty Mountain Wargs (+2).

Name: We Have Come to Kill
Text: A character may be brought into play under general or direct influence at any Shadow-hold [{S}], Ruins & Lairs [{R}], or Border-hold [{B}]. This does not count against the one character per turn limit.

Name: Weigh All Things to a Nicety
Text: Bring one resource or character (including a Ringwraith) from your sideboard or discard pile into your play deck and shuffle.

Name: Where There's a Whip
Text: Playable on an untapped Orc or Troll character bearing a Whip. Each tapped character in the bearer's company with a mind and prowess less than the bearer's makes a body check modified by -2. Failing the body check wounds, but does not eliminate the c

Name: While the Yellow Face Sleeps
Text: Playable during the organization phase on your Ringwraith at a Darkhaven. You may keep one more card than normal in your hand. Discard this card if your Ringwraith moves. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Whip
Text: Orc or Troll only: provides +2 direct influence against one character with a mind and prowess less than the bearer's. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: White Mountain Wolves
Text: Unique. Playable at Stone-circle if the influence check is greater than 10. Once in play, the number required to influence this faction is zero. Standard Modifications: Dunlendings (+2).

Name: Wisdom to Wield
Text: Sage only. Playable on a non-Ringwraith sage bearing a Dwarven Ring and/or a Palantir. This turn, the sage: bears the Dwarven Ring as though he were a Dwarf or is able to use the Palantir.

Name: Woodmen *
Text: Unique. Manifestation of hero Woodmen. Playable at Woodmen Town if the influence check is greater than 10.

Name: Words of Menace and Deceit
Text: Magic. Spirit-magic. Playable on a spirit-magic-using character. +5 to the character's direct influence for the rest of the turn. Unless he is a Ringwraith, he makes a  corruption check modified by -4. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Woses of the Eryn Vorn *
Text: Unique. Playable at The Worthy Hills if the influence check is greater than 11.

Name: Enslaved Dwarves2
Text: Unique. Dragon-lord only. Slave faction. Playable at a tapped or untapped site that is an ancient Dwarf-ruin if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modification: discard a Dragon-magic card from hand (+3). You may bring non-unique Dwarves into play at the site where this faction is in play. Your Dwarves may play hero ore resources and Reforging as minion resources; these are worth full mp. Any players' Dwarf factions in play at sites in the same territory as this faction give 1 less mp (to a minimum of 1).

Name: Fall on Them with Speed
Text: Dragon only. Playable on an attack against a company moving with Flying movement and containing an unwounded Dragon. The number of strikes of the attack is reduced by 10 minus the prowess of the Dragon (to a minimum of one).

Name: Bitter Cold
Text: Magic. Sorcery. Playable on a sorcery-using character. All attacks against the character's company suffer a -1 modification to prowess and body this turn. Unless he is a Ringwraith, character makes a corruption check modified by -4.

Name: Fire and Water
Text: Unique. Playable during the site phase at a Border-hold [B], if a Dragon faction is in play at a site in the same or an adjacent region. Tap a character in the company to make an influence attempt against the Dragon faction. This attempt is modified by +3 for every creature playable at the site you discard from hand or play: place these in opponent's mp. If successful, place the faction in the out of play pile and this card in your mp. Otherwise the company faces an attack by the Dragon faction (as listed on the card; cannot be cancelled) and this card is removed from the game. All versions of the site become Ruins & Lairs [R]. Discard any factions in play at the site. Discard this card if Rebuild the Town is played on any version of the site.

Name: Fire-storm
Text: Fire-dragon only. Playable on a Fire-dragon facing an attack. +4 to the Dragon's prowess, and -2 to the body of any strike he faces. Alternatively, playable on a Fire-dragon, before strikes are assigned in CvCC or after CvCC has been cancelled this phase. Each unwounded character in opponent's company makes a body check, modified by -1 for each armor, helmet, and/or shield he bears (only 1 per given type). Failing this body check the character becomes wounded.Cannot be duplicated for a given attack or CvCC.

Name: Gem-encrusted Belly
Text: Dragon-lord only. Playable on your Dragon-lordif you have Gloaming Golden Hoard in play. +1 to his body (+2 if you receive any mp for Gloaming Golden Hoard), to a maximum of 10. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Gloaming Golden Hoard2
Text: Dragon-lord only. Playable on a Dragon's Den [K]. If you have stored at least 10 mp worth of treasure items (count 1 mp for each stored treasure minor item), your hand size is increased by one. If you have stored at least two ore resources, this card is worth 1 mp. Discard this card when the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Gloaming Golden Hoard3
Text: Dragon-lord only. Playable on a Dragon's Den [K]. If you have stored at least 10 mp worth of hoard items (count 1 mp for each stored hoard minor item), your hand size is increased by one. If you have stored at least two ore resources, this card is worth 1 mp. Discard this card when the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Binding-ring
Text: Mind Ring. -1 to mind to a minimum of 1, +1 to prowess. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Some Secret Art of Flame
Text: Magic. Sorcery. Playable on a sorcery-using character facing an attack. +4 prowess for the character against the attack. Unless he is a Ringwraith, character makes a corruption check modified by -4. Cannot be duplicated against a given attack.

Name: Balchoth
Text: Unique. Playable at Raider-hold if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Easterlings (+2), Men of Dorwinion (-2).

Name: Black Horse
Text: Horse. Playable on a Ringwraith at a Darkhaven (does not tap the site). Each Horse allows you to play one Ringwraith who requires no direct influence to control. If each Ringwraith in company has a Horse, company is in Black Rider mode and may move as such. You may include up to 9 copies of this card in your play deck and sideboard. Return controller to your hand if Horse leaves play. {cyan} UEP: A Ringwraith with a mode ally (Black Horse or Creature of an Older World) will not return to hand on a body check (bc) of a 7 or 8. When a minion company consists entirely of Ringwraiths and Black Horses its maximum company size is increased to 9.

Name: Bairanax Roused
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Bairanax. Playable at Ovir Hollow if influence check is greater than 11. Modifications: influencer discards a major (+3) or greater item (+6). Attacks by Bairanax against any of your companies are canceled. Any company moving in Withered Heath, Gundabad, Anduin Vales, and/or Grey Mountains Narrows faces one attack: Dragon - 2 strikes at 14/7 (attacker chooses defending characters).

Name: Asdriags
Text: Unique. Playable at Nurniag Camp if influence check is greater than 10. Modifications: Nurniags (+2), Variags of Khand (+2), Balchoth (-2).

Name: Angmarim2
Text: Unique. Playable at Carn Dum if influence check is greater than 10. Modifications: Easterlings (+2), Hillmen (+2). Influenced as 0 once in play.

Name: Ancient Black Axe
Text: Unique. Weapon. Two-handed. Playable at any Under-deeps Shadow-hold [{S}]. +2 DI. Warrior only: +3 prowess (to a maximum of 11); -1 to strike's body; tap item to make a character at site automatically pass a corruption check (bearer makes a corruption check).

Name: Above the Abyss
Text: Playable on a tapped non-Ringwraith character if your opponent is a Wizard and your Ringwraith is in play. Untap target character.

Name: Maranya
Text: Unique. Mind Ring. Playable at Barad-dur or Dol Guldur by an Elf with a mind of 7 or more. May also be played with Celedhring in a starting company in lieu of a starting minor item. +1 body. -1 to mind (to a minimum of 1). You may play and use Mithril and Vein of Arda as minion resources. Sage only: tap: if in a minion company at a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] to store or discard Dark Forges as if at a Darkhaven. Celedhring only: tap: if at a Haven [H,K] to place a stored Vein of Arda with an item in the company. If Vein of Arda is with an item, it becomes a jewel and any bonuses it gives are increased by 1. Bearer makes a CP modified by -2 when you tap this item.

Name: Knowledge of Narya
Text: Minion only. Stolen Knowledge. Playable during the site phase on a lone scout, if his company has faced an attack by Gandalf the White Rider the same turn, or if an opponent's company containing Gandalf or Mithrandir is at the same site (or containing Cirdan if Realm of Narya is in play). Tap the scout. This card may be stored at Barad-dur or a Darkhaven [K]. Only the first Knowledge of Narya stored is worth 4 mp: Gandalf (respectively Cirdan) receives -1 to all his CP.

Name: Knowledge of Nenya
Text: Minion only. Stolen Knowledge. Playable during the site phase on an Elf in a covert company that has faced an attack from Lady of the Golden Wood this turn. May also be played without having faced this attack, at the same site as an opponent's Galadriel (or at Lorien if she is not in play). Target Elf faces an attack alone: Elf -- 1 strike with 12 prowess (detainment; neither attack nor strike can be cancelled). If the strike is successful, the character is taken prisoner at Lorien (Rescue-attacks: exact duplicate of all automatic-attacks of the site at the time of rescue). Otherwise tap the character or discard this card. This card may be stored at Barad-dur or a Darkhaven [K]. Only the first Knowledge of Nenya stored is worth 4 mp: all characters with Lorien as a home site receive +1 mind.

Name: Knowledge of Vilya
Text: Minion only. Stolen Knowledge. Playable during the site phase on an Elf in a covert company that has faced an attack from Master of the House this turn. May also be played without having faced this attack, at any site where an opponent's Elrond is present site (or at Rivendell if he is not in play). Target Elf faces an attack alone: Elf -- 1 strike with 13 prowess (detainment; neither attack nor strike can be cancelled). If the strike is successful, the character is taken prisoner at Rivendell (Rescue-attacks: exact duplicate of all automatic- attacks of the site at the time of rescue). Otherwise tap the character or discard this card. This card may be stored at Barad-dur or a Darkhaven [h] K]. Only the first Knowledge of Vilya stored is worth 4 mp: all characters with home site Rivendell receive +1 mind.

Name: Ring of Adamant
Text: Unique. Elven Ring. Playable at Lorien, if Galadriel is not in play and you have stored Knowledge of Nenya. May also be played at any site after CvCC by the character whose strike against Galadriel has been successful (tap character and site). Values in parentheses and brackets apply to an Elf bearer. Nenya may not be played. tap: at the end of the organization phase, if borne by a character with mind 5 or more, to ignore one region of your choice in the company's site path (both name and type) for the purpose of all hazards; bearer makes a CP modified by -2.

Name: Ring of Ruby
Text: Unique. Elven Ring. Playable at any Elf-hold or Dwarf-hold, if Gandalf and Realm of Narya are not in play and you have stored Knowledge of Narya. May also be played at any site after CvCC by the character whose strike against Gandalf (or Cirdan if Realm of Narya is in play) has been successful (tap character and site). Values in brackets and parentheses apply to an Elf bearer. Narya may not be played. tap: at any time, if borne by a character with mind 5 or more, to untap one or two characters in the company; bearer makes a CP modified by -2.

Name: Ring of Sapphire
Text: Unique. Elven Ring. Playable at Rivendell, if Elrond is not in play and you have stored Knowledge of Vilya. May also be played at any site after CvCC by the character whose strike against Elrond has been successful (tap character and site). Values in brackets and parentheses apply to an Elf bearer. Vilya may not be played. tatap: and tap bearer during the organization phase to take any one minion resource event from your discard pile to your hand. Bearer makes a CP modified by -2.

Name: They Are Accounted For
Text: Any test for a gold ring is modified by: +1 for every Elven Ring in play; +1 for every two Dwarven Rings in play; +1 for every three Man and/or Spirit Rings in play; and +1 for every five other rings in play. Discard this card if The One Ring comes into play. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: The Kuileondo
Text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at Benish Armon (or at any Ruins & Lairs in Gondor if you discard a Stolen Knowledge card from the company).+2 EI against characters with a lower mind than bearer's. +2 to bearer's CP resulting from using shadow-magic resources. Magic user only: tap: bring one A Malady Without Healing or Phantom Devised by Wizardry from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle.

Name: The Dwimorberg
Text: Shadow-magic. Playable on a shadow-magic using character. His company may move with special movement from Dunharrow to a site in Lamedon this turn. When moving in this fashion, only Undead and hazard creatures keyed to the site may be played on the company, but any Undead creatures may be played. Tap all allies with a mind less than 3; discard any allies without body. At the beginning of the movement/hazard phase, the company faces 2 attacks: Undead -- each character faces 1 strike with 9 prowess. Undead -- 2 strikes with 12 prowess. Each character wounded is eliminated. Each Undead attack may be cancelled by discarding a shadow-magic card from hand. Unless he is a Ringwraith, your shadow-magic user makes a CP at -4.

Name: Shelob Ahungered
Text: Unique. Playable on Last Child of Ungoliant if you eliminate a character or prisoner in her company.Last Child of Ungoliant is not returned to your hand when Shelob is played; both manifestations may be in active play. Any player may discard Shelob from play by eliminating one of his factions in play. Last Child of Ungoliant is not discarded as per her card text when moving to a site in a region adjacent to the regions listed, if that site is in play by an opponent or if her controlling character taps. Additionally, any faction moving through her current region is wounded.

Name: Palantir of Minas Ithil
Text: Unique. Manifestation of The Ithil-stone. Palantir. Playable at Minas Morgul. Unless bearer is a Ringwraith, he must make a CP at the endof his untap phase. May only be stored at Barad-dur. If stored, this item gives 2 mp and Eye of Sauron is considered a permanent- event. Fate of the Ithil-stone may be played and/or inverted without discarding a Lost -or Stolen Knowledge card; it must be inverted at the site where this item is present or stored. tap: if bearer is able to use a Palantir to duplicate the effect of any Palantir in play. tap: if stored to look at opponent's hand and name one card: opponent must shuffle either this card or two other cards (his choice) from his hand into his play deck.

Name: Mordor Storms
Text: Environment. Black player only. Playable if Skies of Fire is in play. Any effect from non-creature hazards that would tap a character in a company at or moving to a site in Gorgoroth or its adjacent regions is cancelled. Discard when Skies of Fire is not in play. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Black Numenoreans
Text: Unique. Playable at Gobel Mirlond if influence check is greater gran 8. Modifications: Umbarean Corsairs (+2).

Name: Mockery
Text: Playable on an opponent's unwounded, non-avatar hero warrior at a site which minion version lists your Ringwraith's current Darkhaven [K] as its nearest Darkhaven. Discard if target character is not at such a site or if your Ringwraith moves. Target character engages in CvCC with your Ringwraith at the beginning of his organization phase (as though they were single character companies); he may cancel this CvCC by tapping. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Corsairs of Rhun
Text: Unique. Playable at Raider-hold if influence check is greater than 9. Modifications: Easterlings (+2), Men of Dorwinion (-2).

Name: Daelomin Roused
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Daelomin. Playable at Dancing Spire if influence check is greater than 12. Modifications: influencer discards a major (+3) or greater item (+6). Attacks by Daelomin against any of your companies are canceled. Any company moving in Withered Heath, Grey Mountains Narrows, Iron Hills, and/or Northern Rhovanion faces one attack: Dragon - 3 strikes at 13/8 (attacker chooses defending characters).

Name: Itangast Roused
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Itangast. Playable at Gold Hill if influence check is greater than 15. Modifications: influencer discards a major (+)4 or greater item (+8). Attacks by Itangast against any of your companies are canceled. Any company moving in Withered Heath, Grey Mountains Narrows, Iron Hills, and/or Northern Rhovanion faces one attack: Dragon - 3 strikes at 18/8 .

Name: Iron Shield of Old
Text: Shield. Playable at any Under-deeps Shadow-hold or Ruins and Lairs. +2 to all rolls required for bearer's company to move to an adjacent Under-deeps site. Warrior only: tap this items to make one strike against the bearer ineffectual.

Name: Hounds of Sauron
Text: Magic. Shadow-magic. Playable during the site phase by a shadow-magic using character in lieu of declaring an attack against a hero company. The hero company faces an attack of Wolves - 4 strikes at 8 prowess. Alternatively, playable on a non-automatic attack against a shadow-magic using character. The number of strikes is reduced to one. Caster makes a corruption check modified by -4.

Name: Hold Rebuilt and Repaired
Text: Playable during the site phase on a non-Dragon's lair, non-Under-deeps Ruins and Lairs. The site becomes a Shadow-hold and all automatic-attacks become detainment. Discard this card when the site is discarded or returned to its location deck. May not be played by a lord player.

Name: Hoard Well-searched
Text: Scout only. Playable during the site phase on a company with a scout at a tapped site that contains a hoard. A minor or major item may be played.

Name: Helm of Fear
Text: Unique. Playable at a tapped or untapped Barad-dur and only on your Ringwraith (does not tap the site). Tap this item to cancel an attack against the Ringwraith's company. All body checks against the bearer are modified by -1.

Name: Haradrim2
Text: Unique. Playable at Southron Oasis if the influence check is greater than 9. Modifications: Southrons (+2), Variags of Khand (-2).

Name: Hail of Darts
Text: Playable during the organization phase on a company. Each character tapping in support gives a +3 modification to prowess instead of the normal +1. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Great Lord of Goblin-gate
Text: Unique. Playable at Goblin-gate. Tap to give +2 prowess to all Orcs in its company: against one attack or in company versus company combat.

Name: Great Bats
Text: Flying. Playable at a tapped or untapped Shadow-hold. May not be attacked. Discard if controlling character is wounded. Tap to remove the effect of an attack against its controlling character's company that states "attacker chooses defending characters". Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: Goblin Earth-plumb
Text: Playable only on an Orc or Troll. +1 to all rolls required for bearer's company to move to adjacent Under-deeps site.

Name: Far Below the Deepest Delvings
Text: Playable during the movement/hazard phase on a company moving to an Under-deeps site. At the end of its movement/hazard phase, target company may attempt to move to an additional site. Another site card is played and another movement/hazard phase immediately follows.

Name: Faithless Steward
Text: Playable on an agent character at a Darkhaven who has a Border-hold or Free-hold as a home site. If target character is unwounded and at one of his home sites, no factions can be played at any version of that site and you receive this card's marshalling points. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Eye Never Sleeping
Text: Playable if you are Sauron. Cancel one hazard creature attack.

Name: Earcaraxe Roused
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Earcaraxe. Playable at Isle of Ulond if influence check is greater than 11. Modifications: influencer discards a major (+2) or greater item (+5). Attacks by Earcaraxe against any of your companies are canceled. Any company moving in Andrast Coast, Bay of Belfalas, Eriadoran Coast, and/or Andrast faces one attack: Dragon - 2 strikes at 17/7 (attacker chooses defending characters).

Name: Dwarven Ring of Thrar's Tribe *
Text: Unique. Dwarven Ring. Tap a Dwarf bearer to search your play deck and/or discard pile for one or two minor items to put in your hand. Bearer then makes a corruption check modified by +2.

Name: Dwarven Ring of Thelor's Tribe *
Text: Unique. Dwarven Ring. Tap a Dwarf bearer to search your play deck and/or discard pile for one or two minor items to put in your hand. Bearer then makes a corruption check modified by +2.

Name: Driven as by a Madness
Text: Magic. Spirit-magic. Playable on a spirit-magic using character facing an attack. All characters in his company receive +2 prowess and -1 body against the attack. Character makes a corruption check modified by -3. Cannot be duplicated against a given check.

Name: Dark Tryst
Text: Draw three cards and remove this card from the game.

Name: Creature of an Older World
Text: Unique. Winged. Play on your Ringwraith at a tapped or untapped Barad-dur (does not tap). Ringwraith gets +2 prowess and, if only character in company, is in Fell Rider mode and may move as such. Tap ally to: cancel a strike against your Ringwraith or to assign your Ringwraith's strikes against a hero company as you choose. Return Ringwraith to your hand if ally leaves play. {cyan} UEP: A Ringwraith with a mode ally (Black Horse or Creature of an Older World) will not return to hand on a body check (bc) of a 7 or 8.

Name: Join With That Power
Text: Diplomat only. One influence check or corruption check by a character in a diplomat's company receives a bonus equal to the number of characters in the company minus one. Cannot be duplicated on a given check.

Name: Lieutenant of Barad-dur
Text: Unique. Playable on The Mouth. The Mouth becomes a Warlord and a leader. He can use spirit-magic and gains the sage skill. When he is at Barad-dur (or Dol Guldur if The Necromancer is in play), you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. Mouth of Sauron cannot be played. Additionally, if Join with that Power is played on an infuence attempt by The Mouth against an opponent's resource or character, the bonus it gives is doubled.

Name: Heed Not the Defence
Text: Playable on an overt company facing a Man, Dunadan, or Wose attack keyed to a site (or an automatic-attack of these types). Make a roll, adding the number of warriors in the company (+6 if a Ringwraith company) and subtracting all other skills in the company; if the result is greater than 9, the attack is cancelled. Alternatively, if Skies of Fire is in play, you assign all strikes of the attack (even in CvCC). Cannot be duplicated on a given attack.

Name: Gleaming Golden Hoard
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Playable on a Dragon's Den [K]. If you have stored at least 10 mp from hoard items (count 1 mp for each hoard minor item), your hand size is increased by 1. If you have stored at least 2 Ore resources, this card is worth 1 mp. Discard this card when the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player

Name: Beornings *
Text: Unique. Manifestation of hero Beornings. Playable at Beorn's House if the influence check is greater than 9.

Name: Wolves of Isengard
Text: Unique. Playable at a tapped or untapped Isengard if the influence check is greater than 12Standard Modifications: Saruman in the company (+3), remove a character in the company from the game (+7). Any wolf ally in your company at Isengard may be placed with this card. For every 2 wolf allies placed with this card, it gives +1 mp and all Wolf attacks keyed to Gap of Isen or Rohan, or at sites therein, receive +1 strike. During your organization phase, you may place any wolf ally under this card with characters at Isengard (only one per character).

Name: What of the Dawn?
Text: Environment. Playable on a minion or overt company. Cancels the effects of one environment hazard for the company this turn. Alternatively, make a roll to attempt to cancel any one hazard short-event (or permanent event if Skies of Fire is in play) played on the company or an associated entity before it resolves: if the result is greater than 6, the event is discarded.

Name: We Must Join with Him
Text: Black player or Saruman only. Playable on Isengard, if you have a character there bearing Palantir of Orthanc. Store the Palantir. Isengard becomes one of your Darkhavens [K]. Additionally, your companies may contain two Orc leaders. Black player only: your companies may move with starter movement to Isengard from Dol Guldur or Carn Dum (and vice versa). Discard this card when Isengard leaves active play, or when any opponent has a non-hazard manifestation of Saruman in play.

Name: Sharku
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Saruman. Playable on a company if you are Sauron, a Ringwraith, or a Fallen-wizard with 12 P or more. You may play any sorcery, Test of Fire, and Wizard's Test with the company (ignore any CP or sage requirement). Each character in the company may tap to use a Palantir he bears. Additionally, if the company is at Bag End: The Shire becomes a Borderland [b], all versions of sites in The Shire become a Border-hold [B], and you may bring Half-orc characters into play there. During the end-of-turn phase, discard this card or a non-avatar character from the company. Discard if a character manifestation of Saruman comes into play.

Name: Orcs of Isengard
Text: Unique. Playable at Isengard if you have Greater Half-orcs or Sharku in play if the influence check is greater than 12.Standard Modifications: Saruman is in the company (+5), Greater Half-orcs (+2). tap: during organization phase to play a Half-orc character from your discard pile under EI at Isengard.

Name: Give Good Sport
Text: Prisoner. Playable with one of your Seize Prisoners in active play. Keep this card with the Seize Prisoners; it counts as prisoner for the purpose of interpreting card effects. Unless this card is stored, opponent makes a roll during each of your end-of-turn phases: if the result is greater than 9, discard the Seize Prisoners and place this card in your mp for 1 mp. Cannot be duplicated on a given Seize Prisoners.

Name: Eyes of the Tower
Text: Black player only. Playable on a characters bearing and able to use a Palantir. Discard this card if these requirements are not met. Once per turn, you may discard a Messenger of Mordor from hand and name an item (or two items if opponent has a Palantir in active play). If the item is in opponent's hand, he must discard it. Alternatively, if your opponent has a Palantir in active play, you may name one of opponent's stored non-special items instead and tap target character to make an influence attempt against this item (as if held by an opponent's character at the site; treat his EI and mind as zero).

Name: Always the Black Horses
Text: Trophy. Playable during the site phase on an overt company at an untapped site in Rohan. Tap the site. The company faces an attack: Men -- 4 strikes with 9 prowess (cannot be cancelled). Following the attack, tT tap a character in the company or discard this card. Alternatively, playable on an overt company after CvCC this turn. Tap a character in the company. Opponent must choose and discard a horse ally controlled by one of his wounded characters at the site; otherwise discard this card.May be stored at a Darkhaven [K]. Cannot be duplicated in a given turn.

Name: Hunger2
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Hunting mode. Playable during the organization phase on your Dragon-lord at a Dragon's Den [K]. Return this card to your hand: when you play another mode card, or during your organization phase if you so choose. Target character must move every turn to a new site and must move through at least 1 Wilderness [Ww]. He cannot be in company with non-dragon allies or characters or move to a site more than 4 regions away from any of his Dragon's Dens [K] (6 regions if the dragon is winged). Hazard creature attacks against his company cannot be cancelled.

Name: Hunting for Food
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Playable during the organization phase on your Dragon-lord, if not at a Dragon's Den [K]. Name a hazard creature that can be keyed to his current site or the region containing that site (ignore multiple region symbols). If the hazard player has such a creature in his hand, it immediately attacks the Dragon-lord as though he were a one character company. Otherwise he must show his hand.

Name: Hunting for Sport
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Hunting mode. Playable during the organization phase on your Dragon-lord at a Dragon's Den [K]. Return this card to your hand: when you play another mode card, or during your organization phase if you so choose. The Dragon may not be in a company with other characters, and may move to sites in the same or adjacent regions as one of his Dragon's Dens [K] or his home site. You may play a hazard creature manifestation of the Dragon on any company moving through the region containing the Dragon's current site or an adjacent region. If a strike fails, the Dragon is wounded (no body check is required).

Name: Khuzadrepa Roused2
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Khuzadrepa. Playable at Thunder Cleft if the influence check is greater than 14. Modifications: influencer discards a major item (+3) or a greater item (+6); if a manifestation of Agburanar or Itangast is in play (-3). All attacks by manifestations of Khuzadrepa against any of your companies are cancelled. Any company moving in Forrhun, Grey Mountains, Iron Hills, Northern Rhovanion and/or Withered Heath faces an attack: Cold-dragon -- 2 strikes at 15/9 prowess/body (attacker chooses defending characters); +2 prowess against Dwarves.

Name: Made His Dwelling There2
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Playable on a non-Dragon's lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in a Wilderness [w], Border-land [b] or Shadow-land [s], if your Dragon-lord is there. The site becomes one of your Dragon's Dens [K] (place a copy of Dragon's Den with the site). If your Dragon-lord is at this site, the automatic-attacks for all other versions of this site are replaced with that of your Dragon-lord's home site.

Name: Marauding Fire2
Text: Fire-dragon only. Playable on a Fire-dragon facing a creature attack, before strikes are assigned. Make a roll and add the Dragon's prowess. If the result is higher than the attack's prowess, all of the attack's strikes fail; make a body check to see if the creature is defeated (the creature gains +1 body for every strike of the attack). If the creature is not defeated, the attack proceeds normally.

Name: Mating Duel2
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Playable on an untapped Daelomin or Leucaruth, if her company faces an attack by a non Daelomin non Leucaruth unique Dragon manifestation. Tap your Dragon-lord; the attack is cancelled. You may rotate Mating Duel by 90deg to cancel an attack by any manifestation of this Dragon against your Dragon-lord's company or convert the attack to detainment against any other of your companies. Discard Mating Duel when it is rotated 360deg.Cannot be duplicated for a given Dragon manifestation.

Name: Memories of Ancalagon2
Text: Dragon only. Dragon-magic. Any character at the same site as a Dragon character (or a site in the same region if for a winged Dragon-lord) must make a CP modified by -1. Alternatively, play to heal a Dragon character or ally (from wounded to tapped).

Name: Memories of Glaurung2
Text: Dragon only. Dragon-magic. Place this card on a Dragon character as he enters play. He may use spirit-magic and all spirit-magic cards are also considered Dragon-magic cards to him.

Name: Gem and Gold Crusted Belly
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Playable on your Dragon-lord if your Gleaming Golden Hoard in play. +1 to his body (to a maximum of 10).

Name: Hosts of the Dark Tower
Text: War Mode. Playable during the organization phase on your Ringwraith at a Darkhaven [K] if he is a Warlord. Your Ringwraith's company is in War Mode; discard any allies and/or mode card he controls. All characters in the company receive +1 to their prowess and -1 to body. Your Ringwraith's company may contain any overt characters; they may only use region movement, to a maximum of two regions. Discard during the untap phase if your Ringwraith is at a Darkhaven [K].

Name: Fire-storm2
Text: Fire-dragon only. Playable on a Fire-dragon facing an attack. +4 to the Dragon's prowess, -2 to the body of any strike he faces. Alternatively, playable on a Fire-dragon during CvCC, before strikes are assigned. Each opposing character must make a body check, modified by -1 for each armor, helmet and/or shield item he bears (only 1 item of the same type). If he fails this body check the character becomes wounded.Cannot be duplicated on a given attack or CvCC.

Name: Enchanted Stare
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Dragon-magic. Playable during the site phase on a character (even a non-Dwarf hero) in your Dragon-lord's company, who was just brought into play by your Dragon-lord (or on a character in your starting company). Target character requires 3 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by your Dragon- lord or GI. No rolls are required to keep him in play. Alternatively may also be played on a hero character that was just influenced away from an opponent's company by your Dragon-lord.Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Heed Not the Defence2
Text: Playable on a Man, Dunadan, or Wose attack, if your company contains more warriors than the attack has strikes (or any number of strikes if it contains an avatar or Warlord), The attack receives -2 prowess, -2 body and -2 strikes; if all strikes are defeated the and attack was an automatic-attack, the first item played does not tap the site this turn. Alternatively, if Skies of Fire is in play, you assign all strikes of the attack (even in CvCC). Cannot be duplicated on a given attack.

Name: Burned and Chopped-up
Text: Minion player only. Playable during the site phase at Minas Tirith (or any site where Mallorn or The White Tree is in play). The company faces 3 attacks (cannot be cancelled): Men -- 5 strikes with 9 prowess; Dunedain -- 4 strikes with 10 prowess; Dunedain -- 3 strikes with 12 prowess; afterwards tap an avatar or warrior to place this card with the company or discard this card. If Mallorn, The White Tree and/or Sapling of the White Tree is in play at the site (stored or otherwise), discard them and invert this card. This card may be stored at a Darkhaven [K]: 5 mp if inverted. Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

Name: All Else Is Conquered
Text: Minion only. Playable during the site phase on a company at a version of a hero Haven [H] if the bearer of The One Ring is there. The company faces 3 attacks (cannot be cancelled): Dwarves-- 5 strikes with 8 prowess; Dunedain -- 3 strikes with 10 prowess; Elves -- 2 strikes with 15 prowess. You must engage in CvCC with any of opponents' companies at the site (overriding any card effect; cannot be cancelled). Following these attacks, if opponent's bearer of The One Ring is wounded, discard The One Ring. Otherwise, tap your bearer of The One Ring and make a CP; if still in play afterwards, you win the game.

Name: Against the Eye
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Playable during the site phase on your Dragon-lord's current Shadow-hold [S], if you have at least 4P. Your Dragon-lord faces an attack: Troll - 1 strike at 15 (cannot be cancelled or redirected). Following the attack tap your Dragon-lord and the site or discard this card. All versions of this site become a Ruins & Lairs [R]; this site is never discarded and never untaps for you.

Name: Appetite
Text: Playable on a Dragon character not at a Dragon's Den [K]. -3 to all his rolls to bring a character into play or to keep a character in play. Discard this card if such a roll fails. Cannot be duplicated on a given Dragon.

Name: Army of Bats
Text: Flying. Playable at any tapped or untapped Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Each Great Bats or Swarm of Bats with the company (+2). Once in play, the number required to influence this faction is 0. This faction is worth 1 mp if you have a unique Orc faction in play at the site where it was played. tap: during your movement/hazard phase to cancel the effects of The Sun Shone Fiercely or Glance of Arien for one of your moving companies or characters this turn.Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

Name: Artful Words
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Dragon-magic. Playable on your Dragon-lord. +5 to his EI this turn, or +3 to one of his rolls for a flattery, riddling or offering attempt. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

Name: Aura of Fear
Text: Dragon-magic. Playable on a Dragon- character's company during CvCC, before strikes are assigned. Make a roll for each character in opponent's company. If the roll is higher than the character's mind, he is tapped. Alternatively, playable on a magic using Dragon character facing a non-automatic- attack. The attack is cancelled.Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

Name: Azog's Scimitar

Name: Beast-thrall
Text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at Tower of the Wolf-friend.Sage only: tap sage and make a roll (+3 for magic users)when facing a Drake creature attack against his company. If the result plus his mind is greater than the attack's prowess, place the creature with this item; it becomes an ally with a normal prowess -7 (cannot be influenced). Only one creature may be with this item at any time. During the untap phase, make the same roll as if the creature would attack (discard creature if the roll fails, or if you so choose). Values in parentheses apply when a creature is with this item.

Name: Breed Desire
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Your GI is increased bya number based on the mp of your stored hoard items: 1 - 5 mp: +1; 7 - 11 mp: +3; 12 - 17 mp: +5; 18 or more mp +7.Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Claws Sharpened
Text: Playable on a Dragon. Each strike against the Dragon receives -1 prowess and -1 body (-2/-2 for a non-warrior Dragon). Discard this card after a strike against the Dragon fails. Cannot be duplicated on a given Dragon.

Name: Dragon Mindbend

A character (even a non-Dwarf hero) with a mind up to 8 may be played with the company at a Dragon's Den [K]; place this card with the character. -2 to his mind to a minimum of 4. Alternatively, may also be played on a character in an opponent's company at your Dragon-lord's site. All influence attempts against this character are modified by +4; if the attempt is successfull, the characacter joins your company. Cannot be duplicated by a given Dragon-lord.

Name: Dragon's Abode
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Playable on a Dragon's Den [K]. The site is never discarded or returned to the location deck. You may discard this card during the organization phase. This card is worth 1 mp if played on a Dragon's Den that is not your Dragon-lord's home site. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Dragon's Dream
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Dream mode. Playable during the organization phase on your Dragon-lord at a Dragon's Den [K]. Return this card to your hand: when you play another mode card, or during your organization phase if you so choose. +5 to your GI. Discard this card if your Dragon-lord moves.

Name: Dragon's Nest
Text: Dragon-lord specific. Playable on a Daelomin or Leucaruth at a Dragon's Den [K], if you have Mating Duel in play. Tap the Dragon. +2 to her prowess. When this card is rotated 360deg, discard Mating Duel or discard this card. Discard this card if the Dragon moves. Cannot be duplicated on a given Dragon.

Name: Dragon-hatchling

Text: Balrog specific. Tap this card when an opponent plays a card normally giving him three or more marshalling points. This card does not untap. If tapped, you may discard this card during your organization phase to target a company allowed to move with region movement. The company may move up to two additional regions if moving to a site where an opponent's company is present and also, thereafter, when leaving this site.

Text: Tap your Ringwraith to discard one hazard permanent-event. Alternatively, during your organization phase, tap your Ringwraith to take up to two resources from your sideboard to your play deck and reshuffle.

Text: Balrog specific. Untap a character in The Balrog's company.

This only applies if the other site is normally a Shadow-hold, Ruins and Lairs, or Border- hold.

If the result is: less than 7, The Balrog is eliminated; 7 or 8, discard this card; 9 or 10, you gain 2 marshalling points and The One Ring affects the Balrog; greater than 10, you win the game. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

Name: Cloaked by Darkness
Text: Balrog specific. Playable on a company if Great Shadow is in play. You may bring this card from your sideboard into your play deck and reshuffle during your organization phase. The hazard limit against the company is reduced by one to no minimum.

If the result minus 1 is greater than the character's/ally's body, he is wounded or, if already wounded, eliminated. Tap all untapped allies and characters with a mind stat.

Name: Darkness Wielded
Text: Balrog specific. Playable on an attack against The Balrog's company if Great Shadow is in play. The Balrog's company faces 3 attacks (Trolls 5 strikes with 8 prowess, 4 strikes with 10 prowess, 3 strikes with 12 prowess). Following the attacks, tap The Balrog or discard this card. This site is never discarded and never untaps for you. Before a company can play any ally or item at any version of this site, it must tap two characters during the site phase.

Name: Evil Things Lingering
Text: Unique. Balrog specific. Spawn. Playable at The Under-galleries, The Under-courts, or Remains of Thangorodrim. Discard this ally if its company moves using region or starter movement. If this ally's controlling character is not The Balrog, your opponent makes a roll during your organization phase and subtracts four . The controlling character is eliminated if the result is greater than his mind.

Name: Flame of Udun

Return this card to your hand: when you play another Demon Fana card, or, if you choose, during your organization phase. Discard his allies. If The Balrog attacks successfully in company vs. company combat, +1 to defending character's body check.

Text: Balrog specific. +1 prowess against an attack for all characters in a leader's or The Balrog's company or +3 to an influence attempt by a leader or The Balrog.

Subtract the number of complete movement/hazard phases the company has taken so far this turn from its Under-deeps movement rolls. You may start the game with this card in lieu of playing a minor item. Cannot be duplicated.

Discard this card from play and make a roll to attempt to cancel an attack against them by an opponent's company. If the roll plus the number of scouts in the company is greater than 7, the attack is canceled. Discard during your organization phase if you choose. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

Name: The Great Eye
Text: Playable if you are Sauron. Hazard limit against all companies is decreased by one (to a minimum of two). If this card is in play, you can discard it to target and cancel the play of a hazard event played by your opponent.

The company faces a detainment attack - Orcs - 4 strikes at 6 prowess. Discard this card if the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Additionally, you may play Invade Their Domain on any Dwarf-hold (as if on Iron Hill Dwarf-hold) with an adjacent Under-deeps site that has Breach the Hold played on it. Leader only: +2 EI against Orcs. Orc with mind 7 or more: tap: during strike assignment to allow bearer to face all strikes from a Dwarf attack (as though he were a one-character company).

At the end of its movement/hazard phase, target company attempts to move to an additional Under-deeps site which it has not attempted to move to yet this turn. Another site card is played and a movement/hazard phase immediately follows. Return this card to your hand. All hazard creatures the company faces this turn keyed to Shadow-holds attack normally, not as detainment. May not be played by a lord player.

Name: Wain-easterlings2

If this card is discarded, the surviving Hobbits immediately form a company at the Orc's current site or new site. MPs are awarded if stored at Barad-dur, and the Hobbits are then eliminated.

Name: Troth-ring

Name: Great Shadow

The Balrog may tap to cancel an attack against his company.
