Name: Arcane School
Text: Pallando specific. Sage only. Playable on a non-Hobbit, non-Dwarf sage at one of your Wizardhavens (or in your starting company). The character may use sorcery, spirit- magic, and shadow-magic. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Await the Onset
Text: Gandalf specific. Playable if you are Gandalf and have at least: 12 stage points, two protected Wizardhavens, 4 factions, and 6 characters. Each faction you play after Await the Onset is worth 1 marshalling point regardless of other cards in play (place these factions under Await the Onset). Each of your marshalling point cards in a company not in one of your Wizardhavens when the game ends is worth 1 marshalling point regardless of other cards in play. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Bad Company
Text: You may play Orc and Troll characters and include them in your starting company. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. may not be played by a lord player.

Name: A New Ringlord
Text: Playable on your Fallen-wizard if he has The One Ring at one of your Wizardhavens. Only one A New Ringlord may be played in a given turn. Make a roll during each of your end-of-turn phases if your Fallen-wizard is bearing The One Ring and is at a Ruins and Lairs where Information is playable. Add 1 for each A New Ringlord you have in play. If the result is less than 6, your fallen-Wizard is eliminated. If the result is greater than 9, you win the game. may not be played by a lord player.

Name: An Untimely Brood
Text: Playable if you are Radagast or Alatar and have 6 or more stage points and a protected Wizardhaven. One non-unique ally with a mind of 1 is playable at one of your tapped or untapped protected Wizardhavens each of your site phases. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: A Strident Spawn
Text: Unique. Playable if you are Pallando or Saruman and have 6 or more stage points and a protected Wizardhaven. Each of your Half-orcs requires one less point of influence to control. During your organization phase, you may take one Half- orc character from your discard pile to your hand. You may play Half-orc characters at your Wizardhavens, and even if your Fallen-wizard is not there. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Blind to All Else
Text: Your ring items are each worth full marshalling points. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Bow of Alatar
Text: Unique. Bow. Alatar specific. Place this card on Alatar if he is in play. If on Alatar, you may tap Bow of Alatar to allow him to face a strike from an attack against his company regardless of the attack's normal capabilities and his status. If such a strike fails, the attack's body is reduced by 1.

Name: Chambers in the Royal Court
Text: Gandalf specific. Playable on one of your hero Free-hold sites in play. This site becomes a Wizardhaven for your companies, loses all automatic- attacks against your companies, and is one of Gandalf's home sites. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site card. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled. Other Fallen-wizards may not use this site as a Wizardhaven. Discard this card when the site is discarded or returned to its location deck. It cannot be discarded otherwise. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Delver's Harvest
Text: Ore. Playable during the site phase if one of your companies enters the Deep Mines site.

Name: Double-dealing
Text: Playable on a site. If the site is a minion site, you may play appropriate hero resources there. If the site is a hero site, you may play appropriate minion resources there. Discard when this site is discarded or returned to your location deck.

Name: A Merrier World
Text: Playable if you have more than 7 stage points. Hazards your companies defeat (for which you otherwise get 1 MP) are each worth full kill marshalling points. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Leucaruth the Wrathful
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Leucaruth. Female. Fire-dragon. May not move.If an opponent's company containing a Dwarf is at a site in Withered Heath or its adjacent regions she may move to that site without mode card. She must always (attempt to) move to a Dragon's Den [K] the next turn(s). +2 prowess against Dwarves, and -2 to the body of Dwarves strikes against her.

Name: A Good Bit Laid By
Text: Unique. Thorin specific. Playable on one of your Lordhavens [H] if you have stored at least two ore and/or treasure resources there. +3 to your GI. Your characters may play and make influence attempts here against any faction, as if at the site where the faction is normally playable: you must discard stored ore and/or treasure resources with a total mp value equal to the number of contiguous regions from this Lordhaven to the site where the faction is normally playable, minus 1 (resources worth 0 mp count as 1). After a successful influence attempt, a character in the company may tap to play a food item, which may be taken from your discard pile or sideboard.

Name: Oakenshield
Text: Unique. Shield. Place this card on Thorin II if he is in play. +1 body to a maximum of 10. tap: allow Thorin to face a strike from an attack against his company, regardless of the attack's normal abilities or his status. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Block from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Not Badly Off
Text: Unique. Thorin specific. Playable if you have 10 P or more, and you receive any mp for Hoard Gathering or have storedat least 3 major items at Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold. Each of your Dwarves with a home site Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold receives +1 to his CP and +1 mind; if such a character now has 3 mind, he gives 1 character mp and does not cost any influence to control.

Name: No Mouse Unnoticed
Text: Unique. Balin specific. Place this card on Balinif he is in play. Balin may make a CP and (if still in play afterwards) look at a card placed on-guard at his company's site.

Name: New Tunnels
Text: Playable on a Deep Mines site or on an Under-deeps Haven [H]. The Way Is Shut does not affect your companies moving to or from this site. At the end of the organization phase, you may reveal for a moving company at this site a Deep Mines (as an adjacent site; the required movement roll is 0). Place this card with the new Deep Mines site, as well as a surface site from your location deck located in the same or an adjacent region as the company's current surface site (or two regions away if you discard from play one Earth-eater). Target Deep Mines need not have a protected Wizardhaven as surface site to move there, and its surface site does not leave active play until the attached Deep Mines site leaves active play.

Name: More Than Meets the Eye
Text: Dwarf-lord only. If played as a starting stage card, your starting company may include Hobbits. Place this card on your Dwarf-lord if he is in play. +3 EI against Hobbits. You may play To Fealty Sworn at any site after successfully playing a Dwarf faction (as if at a Free-hold [F]). Additionally, during the organization phase you may bring a Hobbit character into play at his home site from your discard pile, if you tap either two Hobbits or four Dwarves in your company at the site. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Mining Settlement
Text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable during the site phase on a Ruins & Lairs [R] that is an ancient Dwarf-ruin or is in a mountain region. The site becomes one of your Lordhavens [H] and a Dwarf-hold. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site card. Attacks against your companies at this site receive -1 to prowess and strikes (to a minimum of 1). Discard this card when the site leaves active play, or after a Dragon or Spawn attack at the site. Alternatively, playable on a Dwarf-hold. The site becomes one of your Lordhavens [H]; if it is already a Lordhaven, the site is protected.

Name: Lust for Treasure
Text: Thranduil of Mirkwood specific. Playable if a ring or treasure item is in play. Reveal a treasure item from your sideboard and place it face down with this card. Opponent then places this card with a Dwarf-hold or site containing a hoard in Wilderland or its adjacent regions. The site card may come from either location deck (opponent's choice) and does not leave active play while the item is placed under it. Any version of the item may be played by any player at any version of the site (as if from hand and at the appropriate site). Keep this card with the item. If the item is stored, this card gives 1 mp to the player who has stored it. Cannot be discarded during the organization phase.

Name: Lord of Dwarrowdelf
Text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable on your Dwarf- lord, if he is at Moria or its adjacent sites and you have 8 P or more. +5 EI against Dwarves. Your Return to Old Dwellings, Halls of Khazad- dum and Reconquest of Khazad-dum are each worth full mp (if worth any). Unless a manifestation of Balrog of Moria has been defeated, discard this card if bearer is at a site that is not in Redhorn Gate or its adjacent regions and/or does not have Moria as adjacent site.

Name: Last of the Seven
Text: Thrain specific. As a permanent-event, playable on a Dwarven Ring borne by Thrain. Discard if Thrain does not bear the ring. -2 mp and -2 corruption points for the ring. Thrain must make a CP during his untap phase for every other Dwarven Ring in play; if he fails, discard a character in his company (ignore any other effects). Cannot be duplicated. As a short-event, playable on Thrain if no Dwarven Ring is in play. +2 prowess, +1 body, +2 EI, and you may keep one more card than normal in your hand this turn. Thrain makes a CP modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

Name: Knowledge of Arda's Treasures
Text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable on a Dwarf-lord. If the Dwarf-lord bears a Dwarven Ring, it is worth full mp and you may play ore resources at his current non- Haven surface site (if that resource is normally playable at the adjacent Under-deeps site). Additionally, you may tap a Dwarven Ring the Dwarf-lord bears to take one ore resource playable at his current site from your discard pile to your hand. The Dwarf-lord makes a CP modified by +2.

Name: King of Seven Houses
Text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable during the site phase on your Dwarf-lord, if he is at a Dwarf-hold and bears The One Ring. Up to 3 different avatar hazard manifestations which create an attack may now attack your Dwarf-lord's company (resolve separately; cannot be cancelled; 1 strike of each attack must be assigned to the Dwarf-lord). Opponent may play these from his hand, discard pile or play deck (reshuffle), or he may use events in active play (discard after the attack if not defeated). Afterwards, if your Dwarf-lord is unwounded, make a roll and add 1 for each King of Seven Houses you have in play. If the result is less than 5, your Dwarf-lord is eliminated; if greater than 8, you win the game. Only one King of Seven Houses may be played on a given turn. You may return this card to your hand during the organization phase.

Name: Jewel-healer
Text: Playable on a non-warrior or sage Dwarf at one of your Havens [H] (or in your starting company). Tap target character and a jewel or ore resource in his company, and make a CP: if still in play afterwards, a wounded Dwarf in the company may make a body check modified by -2 and (if still in play afterwards) heal from wounded to tapped.

Name: Ironfoot
Text: Unique. Armor. Place this card on Dain II ifhe is in play. +1 body to a maximum of 10. tap: give Dain +2 prowess against a strike from an Animal, Orc, Spider, or Wolf attack. tap: during the organization phase to take one Leg it Double Quick from your discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) to your hand.

Name: Great Miners
Text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable if you have 5 P or more. You may play Delver's Harvest and Earth-eater at any of your Under-deeps Dwarf-holds (as if at the Deep Mines site). Additionally, your Map to Mithril, Mithril, The Arkenstone, Gems of Arda, Vein of Arda, or any other ore resource in active play are each worth full mp. If you have stored at least 3 different of such cards, this card is worth 2 mp. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Great Achievement
Text: Place this card on your avatar if he is in play. If this card is on your avatar and you receive any mp for one of the following resources, place it with that card; Clean the Greenwood, Fate of the Ithil-stone, Into the Smoking Cone, King under the Mountain, Reconquest of Khazad-dum, Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur, Rescue Prisoners, Towers Destroyed, or Tower Raided. Target resource is now worth full mp, and this card gives 1 mp. Discard if target resource is discarded. Cannot be duplicated for each of the above named resources.

Name: Glades of Flowering Stone
Text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable on The Gem-deeps if you have a Dwarf-lord there and if Glittering Caves or The Gem-deeps isa Haven [H] or Border-hold [B]. You may place any of your Dwarf characters here "off to the side" with this card. Characters (and any cards they control) placed with this card are not worth any mp; you may bring them into play at The Gem-deeps as if from hand. The site does not leave active play while there is a Dwarf with this card. For every two Dwarves placed with it, this card is worth 1 faction mp (to a maximum of 4) and the prowess and strikes of automatic-attacks and attacks keyed to the site are reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

Name: Friendship of Old Renewed
Text: Unique. Dain specific. Playable on Dain during the site phase at Thranduil's Halls. Dain makes a CP modified by -3. Afterwards, tap Dain and make a roll (considered an influence attempt against an Elf character), or take this card to hand; modify the roll by +3 if you have the Wood-elves faction in play. If the result is less than 14, discard this card. Otherwise, this card is worth 1 item mp for each of your unique factions in play at sites in Wilderland and its adjacent regions (to a maximum of 4).

Name: Foundations of the Hoard
Text: Unique. Thrain specific. Playable on Thrain.You suffer no reduction in item mp at the end of the game if these are more than half of your mp total. Additionally, you may tap a Dwarven Ring Thrain bears to satisfy the hoard requirement for any items played with his company this turn. Thrain makes a CP.

Name: Dwarven Heirlooms
Text: Dwarf-lord only. You may play a hoard minor item with a company at a Dwarf-hold after the successful play of a resource that taps the site (instead of a normal minor item). Additionally, if this is one of your starting stage cards, your starting minor items may be non-unique hoard minor items.

Name: Dwarven Galleries
Text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable if you have 5 P or more. Your stored To the Uttermost Foundations are each worth 2 mp. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Dry Tunnels, Gnawed Ways, Into Dark Tunnels, New Tunnels, or Secret Ways from your discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) to your hand. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Dwarven Alchemist
Text: Playable on a Dwarf sage or a Dwarf with a mind of six or more at a Dwarf-hold. Target character gains the sage skill. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. tap: and tap target character during the organization phase at an untapped Dwarf-hold to play one technology special item with a character at the site. Recipient need not tap to receive this item and it may be taken from your discard pile or hand. Tap the site.

Name: Durin's Day
Text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable on one of your Dwarf characters if he is the highest mind Dwarf in play. Return this card to your hand if a Dwarf with a higher mind is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Dragon-lore, Dwarven Hoard, or An Unexpected Party from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Deep Mountain Fortress
Text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable during the site phase on an Under- deeps Ruins & Lairs [R] with a surface site that is not a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]. The company faces an attack: Drake -- 2 strikes with 13 prowess (cannot be cancelled). Following the attack, tap your Dwarf-lord or discard this card. The site becomes one of your protected Lordhavens [H] and a Dwarf-hold and loses all automatic-attacks. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site. The site does not leave active play until this card is discarded. Discard this card if Invade Their Domain is played on any version of the site.

Name: Crimson Hood
Text: Unique. Helmet. Place this card on Balin if heis in play. +1 body to a maximum of 10. +2 EI against Dwarves. Balin may use Pipe as if he were Gandalf.

Name: Clad for War
Text: All your battle-gear resources are worth full mp, ifyou have at least three of the four types of battle- gear resources (armor, helmet, shield, or weapon) in play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Born under the Mountains
Text: Dwarf-lord only. All your cards worth mp and located at Under-deeps sites count for the purpose of calling your Day of Reckoning. Any Under-deeps movement roll for your companies moving to a site where a minion company is present is automatically successful. You may discard this card at any time to cancel a Rock Fall attack against one of your companies, or to give all your Dwarves at an Under-deeps site +2 prowess in CvCC. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Behind Doors of Stone
Text: Playable on a Dwarf-hold if you discard (for no effect) a technology item stored at (or placed with) the site. Factions you have in play at this site are never worth more than 1 mp. Opponent's companies may not enter any version of the site and agents may not move to the site. The roll required to move between any version of the site and its adjacent Under-deeps sites is 13. Discard this card if Breach the Hold is played on any of its adjacent sites. Any opponent may tap three of his characters (or an avatar) at the site to discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Balin, Dwarf of All Trades
Text: Unique. Balin specific. Place this card on Balin if heis in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to search your play deck for a resource requiring one of Balin's skills to play it and take it to your hand (reshuffle). tap: during your organization phase to look at three random cards from your opponent's hand. If any of these cards is a hazard creature playable at Balin's current site or the region containing that site (by type or name), opponent must place it on the bottom of his play deck. t

Name: Amon Lanc
Text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable during the site phase on Dol Guldur. Attacks against companies at the minion version of Dol Guldur are not cancelled as per the site card. You may tap a Dwarf or sage at the site to search your play deck or discard pile and take one Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur or manifestation of Thrain II into your hand. Additionally, if Return to Old Dwellings is played on the site, all versions of Dol Guldur become a Border-hold [B] and a Dwarf-hold. A character in a minion company may tap to discard this card after CvCC at the site. Discard this card if the site leaves active play.

Name: Earth-eater
Text: Technology. Playable during the site phase if one of your companies enters the Deep Mines site and you have more Delver's Harvest cards in play than you have Earth- eater cards. Tap Earth-eater to take a minion non-unique weapon/armor/shield/helmet major item from your sideboard or discard pile to your hand.

Name: Fortress of the Towers
Text: Unique. May not be a starting stage card. Playable if you are Alatar, Pallando, or Saruman. Playable on The White Towers. The White Towers is protected. Other Fallen- wizards may not use the Wizardhaven card for The White Towers. Cards that give marshalling points are not playable at the site by your opponent in all cases. Discard this card when the site is discarded or returned to its location deck.

Name: Gatherer of Loyalties
Text: Playable if you have more than 3 stage points. Your unique factions are each worth 2 marshalling points. If you are Alatar, your unique Dragon factions are each worth 4 marshalling points. If you are Pallando, your unique factions normally worth 3 or more marshalling points are each worth 3 marshalling points. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Folk of Durin
Text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable at a tapped or untapped Moria if Reconquest of Khazad-dum is in play (or Mount Gundabad if Return to Old Dwellings is played on the site) and if the influence check is greater than 14. Standard Modifications: Longbeard Dwarf (+2), Lord of Dwarrowdelf Dwarf (+5)

Name: Pallando's Hood
Text: Unique. Pallando specific. Place this card on Pallando if he is in play. If on Pallando, you may tap Pallando's Hood during your end-of-turn phase to take Gifts as Given of Old, Wizard's Voice, or Eyes of Mandos from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Plotting Ruin
Text: Playable if you have more than 7 stage points. You must use minion site cards for Hero Havens, Free-holds and Border-holds.

Name: Valglin
Text: Unique. Elf. Noldo. Elf-lord or Pallando only. Playable at Amon Lind. Whenever you play Stars or The Evenstar during his company's current phase, you may name a hazard: if opponent has this hazard in his hand, he must reveal it, and choose to either discard it or lower the hazard limit against the company by one. Otherwise he must reveal his whole hand.

Name: Valglin2
Text: Unique. Elf. Noldo. Elf-lord or Pallando only. Playable at Amon Lind. Whenever you play Stars or The Evenstar during his company's current phase, you may name a hazard: if opponent has this hazard in his hand, he must reveal it, and choose to either discard it or lower the hazard limit against the company by one. Otherwise he must reveal his whole hand.

Name: Valglin3
Text: Unique. Elf. Noldo. Elf-lord or Pallando only. Playable at Amon Lind. Whenever you play Stars or The Evenstar during his company's current phase, you may name a hazard: if opponent has this hazard in his hand, he must reveal it, and choose to either discard it or lower the hazard limit against the company by one. Otherwise he must reveal his whole hand.

Name: Pocketed Robes
Text: Unique. Radagast specific. Place this card on Radagast if he is in play. If on Radagast, you may tap Pocketed Robes during your end-of-turn phase to take Crept Along Cleverly, Wizard's River-horses, or Herb-lore from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Prophet of Doom
Text: Pallando specific. Playable if you are Pallando and have at least 12 stage points and 5 factions in play. Pallando need not be at the appropriate site when making an influence attempt on an opponent's resource or character. Such an influence check is modified by half (rounded up) of Pallando's unused general influence (to a maximum of 10) instead of his unused direct influence. Subtract from the attempt the number of regions between Pallando's site and the site where the influence attempt would normally be made. Discard if you have fewer than 5 factions in play. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Radagast's Black Bird
Text: Unique. Flying. Radagast specific. Playable at one of your Wizardhavens [{H}]. You may return Radagast's Black Bird to your hand: during your organization phase or if its controlling character leaves active play. Radagast may play this ally at any site (tapped or untapped) and need not tap himself or the site to do so. This ally may attempt to influence factions as if he were a character. He may cancel a strike directed against him - tapping afterwards if not already tapped.

Name: Ring of Fire
Text: Unique. Gandalf specific. Place this card on Gandalf if he is in play. If on Gandalf, you may tap Ring of Fire during your organization phase to take Narya from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Saruman's Machinery
Text: Saruman specific. Playable, if you are Saruman, on your protected Isengard or your protected The White Towers. One Technology item is playable at the site during your site phase whether the site is tapped or untapped. Discard when this site is discarded or returned to your location deck. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Saruman's Ring
Text: Unique. Saruman specific. Place this card on Saruman if he is in play. If on Saruman, you may tap Saruman's Ring during your end-of-turn phase to take a ring item (other than The One Ring) from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Shameful Deeds
Text: Playable if you are not Alatar and have more than 6 stage points. Hazards with an asterisk [*] attack your companies normally, not as detainment. Such hazards your companies defeat while this card is in play give you full kill marshalling points. You receive no kill marshalling points from other hazards if this card is in play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Shifter of Hues
Text: Radagast specific. Shapeshifter. Place this card on Radagast if he is in play. Return this card to your hand: when you play another Shapeshifter card or, if you choose, during your organization phase. In addition to adopting the given attributes, Radagast's skills become Warrior/Diplomat. Radagast may not move. You may keep one more card than normal in your hand. Radagast can tap give +2 to the corruption checks of the characters in one company through your next organization phase (this company must be moving with at least one Wilderness in their site path). Radagast may bear, but may not use, items.

Name: Spells Born of Discord
Text: Your Fallen-wizard may use sorcery, spirit-magic, and shadow-magic. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Squire of the Hunt
Text: Unique. Alatar specific. Warrior only. Playable on one of your warrior characters at one of your Wizardhavens (or in your starting company). +1 to his direct influence. This character requires 2 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by general influence or Alatar.

Name: Stave of Pallando
Text: Unique. Pallando specific. Place this card on Pallando if he is in play. If on Pallando, you may tap Stave of Pallando during your end-of-turn phase to take a faction from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: The Forge-master
Text: Unique. Saruman specific. Playable on a non-Hobbit sage character or a Man. +1 to his direct influence. The character requires 2 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by general influence or Saruman. If at a Wizardhaven during your organization phase, you may tap this character to place a non-unique weapon/armor/ shield/helmet minor item with any character at The Forge-master's site. The recipient need not tap to receive this item, and the item may be taken from your discard pile, sideboard, or hand.

Name: The Fortress of Isen
Text: Unique. May not be a starting stage card. Playable if you are Alatar, Pallando, or Saruman. Playable on Isengard. Isengard is protected. Other Fallen-wizards may not use the Wizardhaven card for Isengard. Cards that give marshalling points are not playable at the site by your opponent in all cases. Discard this card when the site is discarded or returned to its location deck.

Name: The Great Hunt
Text: Alatar specific. Playable if you are Alatar and have at least 12 stage points. Your opponent reveals cards one at a time from his play deck or his discard pile (your choice). Any hazard creature revealed immediately attacks Alatar's company. This process stops when 5 creatures or all cards of the deck (or pile) have been revealed. Reshuffle play deck if used. Thereafter, your opponent discards face-up. Whenever your opponent discards a creature during your turn, you may choose to have it attack Alatar's company instead. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: The Grey Hat
Text: Unique. Gandalf specific. Place this card on Gandalf if he is in play. If on Gandalf, you may tap The Grey Hat during your end-of-turn phase to take New Friendship, Wizard's Test, or Hobbit-lore from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: The White Hand
Text: Saruman specific. Playable on Saruman if he has the following in play: at least 12 stage points, at least 3 factions, A Strident Spawn, and Saruman's Machinery. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Thrall of the Voice
Text: Instead of a normal character, during your organization phase you may bring into play one character (including a minion agent) with up to a 6 mind. Place this card with the character. -1 to his mind to a minimum of 1. Such a character may also be in your starting company.

Name: Truths of Doom
Text: Unique. Pallando specific. Your general influence is increased by 6 points. You may only use 2 of these 6 points to control characters.

Name: War-forges
Text: Playable on one of your protected Wizardhavens (not by Radagast). You may tap War-forges to make an additional non-hoard, non-unique minor item playable at this site this turn (if the site is tapped or not). The item may be taken from your discard pile or sideboard. Discard when this site is discarded or returned to your location deck. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Winged Change-master
Text: Radagast specific. Shapeshifter. Flying. Place this card on Radagast if he is in play. Return this card to your hand: when you play another Shapeshifter card or, if you choose, during your organization phase. In addition to adopting the given attributes, Radagast's skills become Scout/Diplomat. If no other characters or allies (except his Black Bird) are in his company: Radagast may move to a new site with no region card maximum, he has no site path, and he is considered to move through no regions. Radagast may bear, but may not use, items.

Name: Wizard's Myrmidon
Text: Playable on one of your non-Fallen-wizard characters. +1 to his direct influence. The character requires 3 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by general influence or a Fallen-wizard. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. May not be played by a lord-player.

Name: Wizard's Trove
Text: You may play The White Tree at one of your Wizardhavens if Sapling of the White Tree is stored there. Place Wizard's Trove with The White Tree - which is worth full marshalling points. Your Wizardhaven becomes protected. Ignore the text of The White Tree. Alternatively, you may store one miscellaneous marshalling point card at one of your Wizardhavens. Any reference to the site where the card can normally be stored are transferred instead to the Wizardhaven. Place Wizard's Trove with the stored card - which is worth full marshalling points.

Name: Pallando's Apprentice
Text: Unique. Pallando specific. Sage only. Playable on a non-Hobbit, non-Dwarf sage character at one of your Wizardhavens (or in your starting company). +1 to his direct influence. This character requires 2 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by general influence or Pallando. This character may tap to use a Palantir he bears.

Name: Friend of Secret Things
Text: Unique. Radagast specific. Your companies with a company size of 2 or less may play allies at tapped sites.

Name: Orome's Warders
Text: Unique. Alatar specific. Playable on Alatar if Join the Hunt is in play. Your weapon/shield/armor/helmet items are each worth full marshalling points. Your allies with a prowess attribute are each worth full marshalling points. Your Elf factions are each worth 2 marshalling points.

Name: Mischief in a Mean Way
Text: Playable during the site phase on a Border-hold site if you have 10 or more stage points. This site becomes one of your Wizardhavens and loses all automatic-attacks. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled. Other Fallen-wizards may not use this site as a Wizardhaven. Discard this card when the site is discarded or returned to its location deck. It cannot be discarded otherwise. May not be played by a Dwarf-lord or Elf-lord player.

Name: Gandalf's Friend
Text: Unique. Gandalf specific. Playable on one of your characters at one of your Wizardhavens (or in your starting company). +2 to his direct influence. This character requires 1 point of influence to control and may only be controlled by general influence or Gandalf.

Name: Thrain
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Thrain II. Longbeard. Leader. +3 EI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Dragons, Drakes, Orcs and Trolls. -3 mp if eliminated. If you are Thrain, values in brackets apply and your treasure items are worth full mp. If King under the Mountain and/or Lord of Dwarrowdelf is played on Thrain, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand.

Name: Thrain2
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Thrain II. Longbeard. Leader. +3 EI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Dragons, Drakes, Orcs and Trolls. -3 mp if eliminated. If you are Thrain, values in brackets apply and your treasure items are worth full mp. If King under the Mountain and/or Lord of Dwarrowdelf is played on Thrain, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand.

Name: Thorin
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Thorin II. Longbeard. Leader. +2 EI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Orcs, Trolls, and Wolves. -3 mp if eliminated. If you are Thorin, values in brackets apply and your hoard items are worth full mp. If you have Reconquest of Khazad-dum in play and/or King under the Mountain is played on him, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand.

Name: Promise of Treasure
Text: Playable on a non-avatar Dwarf in your avatar's company (or in your starting company). +1 to his mind and +1 to his CP. Additionally, each of your Return to Old Dwellings in play is worth full mp. Discard this card if bearer transfers an item to another character. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Dain
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Dain II. Longbeard. Leader. +2 EI against Dwarves and Men. +1 prowess against Dragons, Drakes, Orcs and Trolls. -3 mp if eliminated. If you are Dain, values in brackets apply and your Man factions played at sites in Wilderland are worth full mp. If King under the Mountain is played on him, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand.

Name: Ardagor2
Text: Unique. Half-troll. Warlord. Leader. Can use spirit-magic. +2 prowess against Orcs. +5 EI against Trolls. When he is at his home site, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. Discard any Orc characters in his company. tap: take Warlord's Lair from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Balin2
Text: Unique. Longbeard. Leader. +3 EI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Orcs, Trolls and Wolves. -2 mp if eliminated. If you are Balin, values in brackets apply and your ore resources are worth full mp. If you have Lord of Dwarrowdelf and/or Reconquest of Khazad-dum in play, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand.

Name: Girdle of Radagast
Text: Radagast specific. Playable on one of your protected Wizardhavens if you are Radagast and have at least 12 SP and 6 allies and/or unique factions in play (the factions must be playable at sites in the Wizardhaven's region or adjacent regions). The Wizardhaven's region and all adjacent regions become Wilderness. Cannot be duplicated.

Name: Give Welcome to the Unexpected
Text: Unique. Gandalf specific. Place this card on Gandalf if he is in play. If on Gandalf, your unique non-character cards normally worth 1 marshalling point are each worth 2 marshalling points.

Name: Glove of Radagast
Text: Unique. Radagast specific. Place this card on Radagast if he is in play. Any non-unique ally with 1 mind (a copy of which he does not already control) is considered playable with Radagast at his site. This ally may be taken from your discard pile or hand.

Name: Gnawed Ways
Text: Playable on one of your Deep Mines sites. The Deep Mines site is now adjacent to an Under-deeps site of your choice whose surface site is in a region containing or adjacent to the region containing the Deep Mines surface site. The movement number required to move between these two Under-deeps sites is (7). This card may also be played as a hazard on one of your opponent's Deep Mines sites. Discard this card when Deep Mines is discarded or returned to its location deck. Cannot be duplicated on a given Deep Mines site.

Name: Great Patron
Text: Your characters and allies that normally give 2 or more marshalling points are each worth 2 marshalling points. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Great Ruse
Text: Playable during the site phase on a Shadow-hold or Dark-hold hero site if you have an overt company there. Replace the hero site card with the corresponding minion site card. Discard when this site is discarded or returned to your location deck. may not be played by a lord player.

Name: Greater Half-orcs
Text: Playable at one of your protected Wizardhavens (if tapped or untapped) if you have A Strident Spawn and Half-orcs in play and if the influence check is greater than 11. may not be played by a lord player.

Name: Grey Embassy
Text: Unique. Gandalf specific. Place this card on Gandalf if he is in play. If on Gandalf, your unique hero factions normally worth 2 or fewer marshalling points are each worth 2 marshalling points. If on Gandalf, your unique hero factions normally worth 3 or more marshalling points are each worth 3 marshalling points.

Name: Guarded Haven
Text: Playable on one of your non-protected Wizardhavens other than Isengard, The White Towers, or Rhosgobel. The site is protected. Cards that give marshalling points are not playable at the site by your opponent in all cases. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Half-orcs
Text: Playable at one of your protected Wizardhavens (if tapped or untapped) if you have A Strident Spawn in play and if the influence check is greater than 9. may not be played by a lord player.

Name: Hidden Haven
Text: Playable on a non-Dragon's lair Ruins and Lairs in a Wilderness, Border-land, or Shadow-land ; the site must normally be a Ruins and Lairs. This site becomes one of your Wizardhavens and loses all automatic-attacks. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site card. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled. Other Fallen-wizards may not use this site as a Wizardhaven. Discard this card when the site is discarded or returned to its location deck. It cannot be discarded otherwise. May not be played by a Dwarf-lord or Atani-lord player.

Name: Huntsman's Garb
Text: Unique. Alatar specific. Place this card on Alatar if he is in play. If on Alatar, you may tap Huntsman's Garb during your end-of-turn phase to take Risky Blow, True Fana, or The Hunt from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Join the Hunt
Text: Unique. Alatar specific. Your weapon/shield/ armor/helmet items in Alatar's company are each worth full marshalling points. Your allies with a prowess attribute in Alatar's company are each worth full marshalling points.

Name: Keys of Orthanc
Text: Unique. Playable at Minas Tirith. During your organization phase, you may: take The Fortress of Isen card from your play deck or discard pile to your hand or discard The Fortress of Isen card if in play by another player. Reshuffle your play deck if searched. may not be played by a lord player.

Name: Keys to the White Towers
Text: Unique. Playable at Barrow-downs. During your organization phase, you may: take the Fortress of the Towers card from your play deck or discard pile to your hand or discard the Fortress of the Towers card if in play by another player. Reshuffle your play deck if searched. May not be played by a Dwarf-lord or Atani-lord player.

Name: Legacy of Smiths
Text: Playable if you have more than 6 stage points. Your non-ring items are each worth full marshalling points. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Man of Skill
Text: Unique. Saruman specific. Your permanent-events that require a site where Information is playable are each worth 2 marshalling points.

Name: Many-coloured Robes
Text: Unique. Saruman specific. Place this card on Saruman if he is in play. If on Saruman, he may tap during his end-of-turn phase to take Ringlore, Lordly Presence, or First of the Order from his discard pile to his hand. {cyan} UEP: Unique. Saruman specific. Place this card on Saruman if he is in play. If on Saruman, he may tap Many-coloured Robes during his end-of-turn phase to take Ringlore, Lordly Presence, or First of the Order from his discard pile to his hand.

Name: Master of Shapes
Text: Radagast specific. Shapeshifter. Place this card on Radagast if he is in play. Return this card to your hand: when you play another Shapeshifter card or, if you choose, during your organization phase. In addition to adopting the given attributes, Radagast's skills become Warrior/Ranger. Radagast's prowess is only modified by -1 when not tapping to face a strike. Radagast may bear, but may not use items.

Name: Never Refuse
Text: All corruption checks by your non-Wizard characters caused by your magic cards are modified by +2.

Name: Son of Dain
Text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable on Thorin III Stonehelm. He becomes a leader. +1 prowess against Men. If Dain II has been eliminated, you may take this card from your sideboard to your hand and Thorin III Stonehelm receives +3 EI. If you are Dain, Thorin III costs only 4 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by Dain or GI. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take a non- unique Dwarf character from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Cirdan the Shipwright
Text: Unique. Sinda. Manifestation of Cirdan. Leader. +3 EI against Elves. +2 EI against the Elves of Lindon faction. When Cirdan is at Grey Havens, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. tap: cancel an attack against his company keyed to a Coastal Sea [c] region or to Lindon (by name or type).

Name: Son of Nain
Text: Unique. Dain specific. If this is a starting stage card, one of your starting minor items may be Necklace of Silver and Pearls. Place this card on Dain if he is in play. tatap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Mining Settlement, Kingdom of Old Restored, Strength from the Ered Engrin, or a non-unique Dwarf character from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Lord Denethor
Text: Unique. Leader. Manifestation of Denethor II. +2 EI against Dunedain. +3 EI against characters with a home site in Gondor. +2 EI against the Tower Guard of Minas Tirith faction. May tap to use a Palantir he bears. When Lord Denethor is at Minas Tirith, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. tap: take Sworn to the Lord or Tower of Guard from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Throkmaw the Vain
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Throkmaw. Winged.Fire-dragon. +1 to all body checks resulting from failed strikes he has tapped to face. -3 to your influence attempts against manifestations of Angurth, Itangast, Scatha, and Smaug. tap: if at a Dragon's Den [K] to give +1 prowess and +1 body to all Orc characters in any of your companies this turn.

Name: Prince Imrahil
Text: Unique. Leader. Manifestation of Imrahil. +2 against Dunedain. +3 EI against characters with a home site in Anfalas, Belfalas, or Lamedon. +2 EI against the Knights of Dol Amroth faction. When Prince Imrahil is at Dol Amroth, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. tap: take Legacy of the Faithful or Tower of Amroth from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Smaug the Golden
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Smaug. Winged. Fire-dragon. +4 to his riddling rolls. -3 to your influence attempts against manifestations of Ando-anca, Angurth, Itangast, and Scatha. Your non-stored unique ring and treasure items are each worth full mp.

Name: Scatha the Worm
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Scatha. Cold-dragon.+2 prowess against Dragons, Drakes, Elves, and Dwarves. -3 to your influence attempts against manifestations of Ando-anca, Angurth, Itangast, and Smaug. tap: when at Gondmaeglom to bring a resource short-event that can be played on a Dragon from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle.

Name: Lomaw the Old
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Lomaw. Ice-dragon. Can use spirit-magic. +2 to his rolls for riddling and offering attempts. -3 to your influence attempts against manifestations of Agburanar, Gostir, Itangast, and Throkmaw. If an opponent's company moves through a region in The Northern Waste, you may look at a number of cards from opponent's hand equal the number of Wildernesses [w] in their site path.

Name: Leucaruth the Wrathful2
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Leucaruth. Female. Fire-dragon. +2 prowess against Dwarves and -2 to the body of Dwarf strikes against her. Your Dwarf gathered bones are each worth full mp. May normally move one region. If an opponent's company containing a Dwarf is at a site in Withered Heath or its adjacent regions, she may move to that site (this must result in a legal movement). She must always (attempt to) move to a Dragon's Den [K] the next turn.

Name: Itangast the Guest-eater
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Itangast. Fire-dragon. +2 prowess against Men and Dwarves. +4 to his rolls for offering attempts. -3 to your influence attempts against manifestations of Ando-anca, Smaug, Scatha, and Throkmaw. Your unique gathered bones normally worth 2 mp or more are each worth 2 mp. While Itangast is at Gold Hill, your Orcs and Trolls require one less influence to control.

Name: Earcaraxe the Sea-fang
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Earcaraxe. Female. Cold-dragon. May normally move two Coastal Sea [c] regions. -2 prowess while not at or moving to a site in a Coastal Sea region. +2 to her rolls to bring/keep characters and allies into play. +4 to her rolls for offering and flattery attempts. -3 to your influence attempts against manifestations of Canadras, Gondring, and Scorba.

Name: Daelomin the Ghost-Wing
Text: Unique. Manifestation of Daelomin. Female. Winged. Cold-dragon. Can use sorcery. +2 EI against male characters. +4 to her rolls for flattery and offering attempts. If no other characters or allies are in her company, her company's normal hazard limit is two. tap: if at a Dragon's Den [K] to cancel an effect that would raise the hazard limit for one of your companies.

Name: Wardens of the Woodland Realm
Text: Unique. Thranduil of Mirkwood specific. Woodland Realm becomes a Wilderness [w]. tap: and discard from hand an asterisk (*) creature playable keyed to Heart of Mirkwood, Western Mirkwood or Woodland Realm (not by region type), to cancel an attack against one of your companies moving to a site in Woodland Realm (or with only these regions in their site path). tap: during your end-turn-phase to take one Elf-path or Refuge from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Trusted Counsellor
Text: Lord-player only. Playable on a non-avatar character of the same race as your Lord in your Lord's company (or in your starting company). +1 EI for each of his skills against characters and factions of his race. Target character may only be controlled by your Lord or GI. If he has the same home site as your Lord he requires 3 fewer points of influence to control (to a minimum of 3). Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: The Trees Have Ears
Text: Playable if you are Alatar, Galadriel, Gandalf, Radagast or Thranduil. Your Ent allies and factions are worth full mp. When an opponent's company moves through a region containing a site where your avatar or one of your Ent allies or Ent factions is located (or region adjacent to this), you may look at 2 random cards from his hand for each Wilderness [w] in that company's site path.

Name: The Sea's Prowess
Text: Unique. Cirdan the Shipwright specific. Place this card on Cirdan if he is in play. Lindon becomes a Coastal Sea [c]. Cirdan may use Kindling of the Spirit as if he were a Wizard. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Belegaer, Kindling of the Spirit, The Reach of Ulmo, or a non-unique Elf character from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: The King's Hunting
Text: Unique. Thranduil of Mirkwood specific. Place this card on Thranduil if he is in play. Your Clean the Greenwood are worth full mp. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one warrior only resource or a non-unique Elf character from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: The Elf-king
Text: Unique. Elf-lord only. Playable on your Elf-lord, if he controls an avatar specific stage card and an item giving 7 or more mp and corruption points combined, and if you have in play at least: 12 P, 1 Elf faction, and 4 unique Elf characters. Discard this card if these conditions are not met. +3 EI. If he is at one of your protected Lordhavens [H], your Elf-lord may make influence attempts as if at a site in the same or an adjacent region.

Name: Sworn to the Lord
Text: Lord-player only. Place this card on your Lord whenhe is in play. Followers of your Lord cannot be the target of hazards that would return them to your hand (e.g. Call of Home). Additionally, +2 to your rolls for influence attempts against any of your characters that have the same home site as your Lord, and for rolls required by hazards that would return such a character to your hand or split him off from the company.Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Ring of Water
Text: Unique. Lady Galadriel specific. Place this card on Galadriel if she is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Nenya from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Ring of Air
Text: Unique. Elrond Half-elven specific. Place this card on Elrond if he is in play. This card gives two corruption points if Elrond is at Rivendell. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Vilya from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Realm of Narya
Text: Unique. Place this card on Cirdan if he is in play. Discard this card if Ring of Fire or a non- hazard, non-Fallen-wizard manifestation of Gandalf is in play. Ring of Fire cannot be played and Fallen Gandalf may not use Narya. Cirdan is considered Gandalf for the purpose of playing and interpreting Narya. tap: during your organization phase to take one Narya from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Prince of Mirkwood
Text: Unique. Thranduil of Mirkwood specific. Playable on Legolas. Legolas requires only 2 points of influence tocontrol and can only be controlled by Thranduil or GI. Additionally, he gains the ranger skill and receives +1 prowess against Orcs and Spiders. If he is the highest mind Elf in the company, he becomes a leader. Discard this card if Legolas is in a company without an avatar and moves to a site not in Woodland Realm or its adjacent regions. tap: during your end-turn-phase to bring one Many Turns and Doublings from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle.

Name: Possessions of the High-elves
Text: Elf-lord and Elessar only. Playable on a Lordhaven [H]. Your Palantiri are each worth full mp. tap: and tap an Elf with a mind of 5 or more (or any Noldo or Sinda) at the site to let him take control of one of the following items: Adamant Helmet, Elf-stone, Miruvor or Scabbard of Chalcedony. If Cirdan or Elrond taps, he may take control of Jewel of Beleriand instead. The item may be taken from your hand, discard pile, or sideboard. Afterwards, the Elf makes a CP. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Possessions of the Green-elves
Text: Elf-lord and Elessar only. Playable on a Lordhaven [H].If Cirdan, Bladorthin, or Thranduil bears Emerald of Doriath, your GI is increased by two. tap: and tap an Elf with a mind of 5 or more (or any Nando or Silvan Elf) at the site to let him take control of one of the following items: Arrows Shorn of Ebony, Bow of Yew, Elven Cloak, Elven Rope. If Galadriel or Thranduil taps, he may take control of Emerald of Doriath instead. The item may be taken from your hand, discard pile, or sideboard. Afterwards, the Elf makes a CP.Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

Name: Order of Jewel and Ring-smiths
Text: Elf-lord only. You may play and use miniontreasure items as hero items. Your ring and treasure items borne by Elves are worth full mp. Additionally, you may tap an Elf at a site in Hollin to take Gwaith- i-Mirdain from your discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. tap: and tap an Elf sage to store a Reforging in his company or to replace an ore resource in his company with a Reforging from hand (discard the ore resource).

Name: Moon-runes

Name: In Accord with Nature
Text: Playable if you are Alatar, Gandalf, Radagast, or an Elf-lord. You may only bring Elf, Hobbit, Wizard and Wose characters into play. Discard any characters you have in play of other races when you play this card. As long as you have more Wose characters and/or more Animal, Ent, Wolf and Wose allies and factions in play than your opponents, these are worth full mp to you. Additionally, your Animal, Ent, Wolf and Wose characters and allies may tap to cancel an attack of their corresponding type against their company (Awakened Plant for Ents). Discard this card if you defeat an attack of these types.

Name: Fosterhome of Royal Heirs
Text: Unique. Elrond Half-elven specific. You may bring Dunadan characters normally playable by Elrond into play at Rivendell (or at any of your Lordhavens [H] if he is a ranger). If this is a starting stage card, such characters may be in your starting company and you must start the game at Rivendell. Place this card on Elrond if he is in play. +3 EI against Dunedain. Your Dunadan characters and factions are each worth full mp.

Name: Drive back the Shadow
Text: Unique. Lady Galadriel specific. Each time you play Nenya while Galadriel is at or moving to a Ruins & Lairs [R], Shadow-hold [S]or Dark-hold [D] in Wilderland or its adjacent regions, place a token on that site; you may place the site with this card instead of discarding it from play. If placed with this card, all versions of the site become a Ruins & Lairs [R] and the region containing it becomes a Wilderness [w]. This card is worth 1 mp for each site placed with it (to a maximum of 4). A minion player may discard a site placed with this card during the site phase at the corresponding minion version of that site, if his company there: taps an avatar, plays a magic resource, or discards a technology item.

Name: Companions since the Eldar Days
Text: Elf-lord and Dunadan-lord only. You may play Elf and Dunadan characters with up to a 7 mind. Such characters may also be in your starting company. Your Elf and Dunadan characters and factions are each worth full mp. Additionally, when one of your Dunadan characters taps to support an Elf in his company (or vice versa), he gives +2 to the prowess or CP (instead of +1). You may discard this card during the organization phase to bring an Elf or Dunadan character into play at one of your Lordhavens [H]; the character must have a home site located in the same territory as the Lordhaven (or in an adjacent region). Discard this card if you have 12 P or more.

Name: Chief-guardian
Text: Unique. Lady Galadriel specific. Playable on Fanar. +1 EI against Elves. Fanar requires only 2 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by Galadriel or GI. Discard this card if Fanar is in a company without an avatar and moves to a site not in Wold & Foothills or its adjacent regions. Additionally, if he is the highest mind Elf in the company Fanar becomes a leader; you choose defending unwounded characters for any attack against his company that does not choose defending characters (and also during CvCC at a site in a Wilderness [w]).

Name: Captain of the House
Text: Unique. Playable on Glorfindel. Glorfindel becomesa leader. He receives +1 prowess against Dragons, Nazgul and Spawn, and the body of such strikes against him is modified by -1. Discard this card if Glorfindel is in a company without an avatar and moves to a site without automatic-attack that is not in Eriador. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Power Against the Shadow from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Forbidden Knowledge
Text: Dunadan-lord only. Playable on a Dunadan sage at oneof your Lordhavens [H], if you discard (for no other effect) a Lost Knowledge card from the company. You may play spirit-magic and shadow-magic resources. Target character may use spirit-magic and shadow-magic. If a character in the company is eliminated, rotate this card 90deg (or place a token) and you may take a magic card from your sideboard or discard pile to your hand. Target character receives +1 EI against Men and Dunedain for each time rotated (to a maximum of 4). Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

Name: Arsenal of Lindon
Text: Unique. Cirdan the Shipwright specific. Whenever a battle-gear item is stored at Grey Havens, it must be placed with this card instead and you may take one non-unique battle-gear item from your sideboard and place it with this card. Any item placed with Arsenal of Lindon is considered "off to the side"; it yields no mp and you may play it as if from hand. You receive this card's mp if there is an opponent's item placed with it.

Name: Accept the Offering
Text: Unique. Lady Galadriel specific. Playable on an untapped Galadriel at Lorien if The One Ring is also at Lorien. Tap Galadriel and the bearer of The One Ring (if untapped). Both characters must make a CP modified by -4. If both are still in play afterwards, Galadriel may bear The One Ring and she immediately takes control of it. +1 to her CP.

Name: A Long-hoarded Treasure
Text: Unique. Playable on Cirdan if he is at Grey Havens. If Reconstructed Towers is in play, Palantir of Elostirion is not discarded as per its card text when its bearer moves from The White Towers to Grey Havens (or vice versa). Additionally, if you are Cirdan you may play A New Ringlord; The White Towers must be used (regardless of its site type) to fulfill the site requirement for the roll of A New Ringlord.

Name: A Lady Rules upon Arda
Text: Lady Galadriel specific. Playable on Galadriel ifshe is at Lorien and bears The One Ring. Only one A Lady Rules upon Arda may be played in a given turn. Make a roll during each of your end- of-turn phases if Galadriel bears The One Ring and is untapped and at Lorien. Add 1 for each A Lady Rules upon Arda you have in play. If the result is less than 6, Galadriel is eliminated. If the result is greater than 9, you win the game.

Name: A Flush of Air
Text: Unique. Elrond Half-elven specific. Place this card on Elrond if he is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Far-sight, Moon-runes, Test of Lore, or Wisdom to Wield from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Allies in the East and South
Imagefile: Allies in the East and South.jpg
Text: Playable if you are a Dunadan-lord or Fallen-wizard with 6 P or more, and you have 2 or more unique hero factions playable at sites in The Sun-lands or the Great Central Plains in play. Discard if these conditions are not met. You may tap one unique faction playable at a site in one of these territories to give -1 to the prowess and strikes (to a minimum of 1) of one creature played against one of your companies moving through a region in such a territory. Additionally, all influence attempts made by your opponents against such factions are modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated by a given player

Name: Allies in the East and South2
Imagefile: Allies in the East and South.jpg
Text: Playable if you are a Dunadan-lord or Fallen-wizard with 6 P or more, and you have 2 unique hero factions playableat sites in The Sun-lands or Great Central Plains in play. Discard this card if these conditions are not met. You may tap one unique faction playable at a site in one of these territories to reduce the hazard limit against one of your companies moving through a region in such a territory by 1 (to a minimum of 2). Additionally, all influence attempts made by your opponents against such factions are modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated by a given player

Name: Beacon of Gondor
Text: Dunadan-lord only. Playable on a Border-hold [B]or Free-hold [F] in Greater Gondor. Any warrior with a mind of three or less (or any warrior, if your avatar is at the site) and a home site in Greater Gondor may be brought into play at this site. While your avatar is at this site, your characters may heal here, the site becomess a battleground, and you may bring any number of characters into play here during the organization phase. Discard this card when the site leaves active play.

Name: Blood of Numenor
Text: Unique. Lord Denethor specific. Playable on Lord Denethor if you have in play: 12 P or more, at least 2 Dunadan factions and 2 stored Stolen Knowledge cards. Discard this card if these conditions are not met. +1 to body. tap: during the organization phase to take a Dunadan character with a mind of 4 or less from your discard pile to your hand, or to modify an influence check made by a character in Gondor or by Denethor by +5.

Name: Captain of the Royal Rangers
Text: Unique. Lord Denethor specific. Playable on Faramir at Minas Tirith (or in your starting company). Faramir receives +1 prowess, and +2 EI against characters with a home site in Gondor. Unless he is in a company with Boromir II or Denethor II, he becomes a leader. While he moves to Henneth Annun, creatures cannot be played at the site against his company. While he is at Henneth Annun, all attacks or actions by agents at that site are cancelled.

Name: Captain of the Tower Guard
Text: Unique. Lord Denethor specific. Playable on Boromir II at Minas Tirith (or in your starting company). Boromir II becomes a leader. +2 EI against characters with a home site in Gondor. +1 to his CP. Attacks against his company keyed to Anorien by name are always detainment. If Lord Denethor is eliminated, Boromir II is considered Lord Denethor and a Dunadan-lord for the purpose of playing and interpreting resources.

Name: Envinyatar, the Renewer
Text: Unique. Elessar specific. Playable on Elessar during the site phase at Umbar, if you have Raid on Umbar in play. You may keep one more card than normal in your hand. +5 EI against factions playable at sites in Harnendor, Mordor, or the Great Central Plains. Regions in Harnendor are considered part of Greater Gondor. If you have Stone of Erech or Tarma of Ar-pharazon in play, this card is worth 5 mp and any influence attempt by an opponent against a faction, character, or ally playable at a site in Gondor or Harnendor is modified by -5. tap: take one Beacons of Gondor from your discard pile to your hand.

Name: Eyes of the White Tower
Text: Dunadan-lord only. Place this card on your Lord, if he bears a Palantir and is at one of your Lordhavens [[H]. You may return this card to your hand if you so choose during the organization phase. In addition to adopting the given attributes, your Lord's skills become sage/diplomat and he may not move. You may keep one more card than normal in your hand. Once per turn your Lord may make a CP instead of tapping to use a Palantir he bears. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

Name: Against All Counsel
Text: Playable only on Elrond Half-elven or Thranduil of Mirkwood, if he is at his home site and bears The One Ring. May also be played during the site phase. If your avatar bears The One Ring, he must make a CP during your end-of-turn phase for each hero character with a mind of 8 or more (10 for a wizard) at his current site. If still in play afterwards, make a roll and add 1 for each hero character with a mind of 8 or more (10 for a Wizard) at his site: if the result is less than 6, your avatar is eliminated. If the result is greater than 10, you win the game.

Name: Fuel for Furnaces
Text: Playable on a company containing an overt character at a non- Haven, non-Dark-hold site in a Jungle [j] region or in Mirkwood, Fangorn, Lotan, Old Forest, or Taur Romen. The company faces 3 attacks: Awakend Plants -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess; 2 strikes with 11 prowess; 1 strike with 14 prowess. These attacks can only be cancelled by discarding a Blasting Fire or Liquid Fire from the company. After the attacks, tap a character and the site or discard this card. If played at a site in Fangorn or Old Forest, invert this card. It may be stored at one of your protected Wizardhavens [H]; you may then take one stage resource playable on/at Deep Mines from your discard pile to your hand. If stored and inverted, this card gives 4 mp. Cannot be duplicated at a given site.
